 14.15. Todælde ða hys geferan færlice on þære nihte,
&amp; him on beræsde &amp; on eornost hi sloh &amp; afligde ða lafe, oð
ðæt hi comon to Fenicen.
 14.16. He lædde þa ongean Loth, hys broðor sunu, mid eallum
hys æhtum, &amp; ðæt oðer folc samod, mid wifum &amp; æhtum,
gewunnenum sige.
 14.17. Þa eode Sodomitiscra cyning sona him togeanes.
 14.21. &amp; bæd þæt he hæfde eall þæt he of ðam
here genam, buton þam mannum anum.
 14.22. &amp; Abram him cwæð to: Ic ahebbe mine hand to ðam
healican Gode.
 14.23. Se ðe ys agnigend eorðan &amp; heofonan, þæt ic ne
underfo furðon ænne ðwang of eallum þisum ðingum ðe þine ær
wæron, ðæt þu ne secge eft: Ic gewelgode Abram.
 14.24. Buton ðam anum ðingon, ðe mine geferan æton, &amp;
þæra manna dæl þe me mid comon, Anær, &amp; Escol, &amp; Mambre;
nymon þas heora dæl.
 14.18. Þær com eac Melchisedech, se mæra Godes man, se
wæs cyning &amp; Godes sacerd; &amp; he brohte hlaf &amp; win.
 14.19. &amp; bletsode Abram, &amp; cwæð: Gebletsod ys Abram
ðam healican Gode, se ðe gesceop heofenan &amp; eorðan.
 14.20. &amp; gebletsod ys se healica God: þurh hys scyldnysse
synd ða fynd on ðinum handum oferwunnene &amp; he sealde him þa
teoðunga of eallum ðam þingum.
 15.1. ÐA ðis gedon wæs, þa wearð Godes spræc to
Abrame ðurh gesyhðe him secgende: Ne ondræd þu ðe Abram; ic eom
ðin wergend, &amp; þin med byð swyðe mycel.
 15.2. Þa cwæð Abram: Eala þu min Drihten God, hwæt
gyfst þu me; ic fare butan bearnum.
 15.3. &amp; efne min inbyrdlincg byð min yrfenuma.
 15.4. Ðær rihte wearð Godes spræc to Abrame, þus
cweðende: Ne byð ðes þin yrfenuma, þe ðu embe spæce, ac ðone
þu hæfst to yrfenuman, þe of ðe sylfum cymð.
 15.5. God lædde hyne þa ut, &amp; het hyne locian to heofonum,
&amp; cwæð: Tell þas steorran, gyf ðu mæge; þus menigfeald byð
þin ofsprincg.
 15.6. Abram þa gelyfde Gode, &amp; hyt wæs him geteald to
rihtwisnysse.
 15.7. God cwæð eft to Abrame: Ic eom se God þe ðe lædde
of ðæra Chaldeiscra Hur, þæt ic ðe þis land forgeafe to agenne.
 15.8. Abram cwæð þa to Gode: Min Drihten God, hu mæg ic
witan þæt ic hyt agan sceal.
 15.9. God cwæð eft to him: Geoffra me to lace an þrywintre
hryðer &amp; ænne þrywinterne ram, &amp; ane ðrywintre gat, &amp; sume
turtlan, &amp; sume culfran.
 15.10. He dyde ða swa, &amp; todælde hi on twa, buton þa
fugelas he ne todælde.
 15.11. Þa woldon oðre fugelas fleogan to þam holde; Abram hi
afligde fram þam flæsce ealle.
 15.12. Eft ða on æfnunge befeol slæp on Abram, &amp; micel
oga him becom ða mid þeostrum.
 15.13. Him wæs ða gesæd swutelice ðurh God: Wite ðu
þæt ðin ofspring sceal wunian ælðeodig on oðrum earde, &amp; hi
hi yfele geswencað &amp; on þeowte gebringað feower hund geara.
 15.14. Ic deme swa ðeah þa ðeoda ðe hi on ðeowte
gebringað, &amp; hi cumað syððan ongean mid swyðlicum æhtum.
 15.16. On ðære feorðan mægðe hi gecyrrað eft hider:
ne synd na gyt gefyllede ðises folces unrihtwisnyssa, ðisra Amoreiscra,
oð ða andweardan tid.
 15.15. Þu soðlice forðfærst on sibbe, þonne ðin tima
cymð on godre ylde to þinum ealdfæderum.
 15.17. Ða ða sunne eode to setle, ða sloh ðær mycel
mist, &amp; ferde swylce an ofen eal smociende, &amp; leohtberende fyr ferde
ofer ða lac.
 15.18. On þam dæge sealde God him sylf hys wed Abrame, &amp;
cwæð: ðinum ofsprincge ic forgyfe þis land æfter ðe, fram
þære Egyptiscan ea oð Eufraten, ðe þas ðeoda habbað.
 15.19. Cynei &amp; Cenezei; Cetmonei.
 15.20. &amp; Ethei; Ferezei &amp; Raphaim.
 15.21. Amorrei &amp; Chananei; Gergessei &amp; Iebusei.
 16.1. Abrames wif wæs ða gyt wunigende butan cildum, &amp; heo
hæfde ane þinene, ða Egyptiscan Agar.
 16.2. &amp; cwæð to hyre were: þu wast þæt ic eom
untymende; nym nu mine ðinene to þinum bedde, þæt ic huru underfo sum
fostorcild of hyre; Abram ða dyde swa swa him dihte Sarai.
 16.4. &amp; Agar ða geeacnode, &amp; eac forseah hyre
hlæfdian.
 16.5. Ða cwæð Sarai to Abram: ðu dest unrihtlice wið me:
ic let mine wylne to ðe; nu wat heo þæt heo ys eacniende, &amp;
forsyhð me; for ði deme God betwux me &amp; ðe.
 16.6. Abram hyre andwyrde: Efne heo þin wyln under þinre handa;
ðrea hi locahu þu wylle; Sarai hig ða geswencte, &amp; heo sona fleah ut
to ðam westene.
 16.7. Ðær þær wæs an wylspring: þa ofseah hi Godes
engel.
 16.8. &amp; hi sona clypode: Agar, Saries þinen, hu færst
ðu, oððe hwyder wylt ðu; heo andwyrde þam engle: Ic forfleo mine
hlæfdian.
 16.9. Þa cwæð se engel hyre eft to: Gecyr to þinre
hlæfdian &amp; beo geeadmet under hyre handa.
 16.10. Ic secge ðæt þin sæd byð swa swyðe
gemenigfyld, þæt man hyt geriman ne mæg for þære meniu.
 16.11. Efne ðu geeacnodest &amp; þu acenst sunu, &amp; ðu
gecigst hys naman soðlice Ismahel, for þan ðe God sylf gehyrde ðine
geswencednysse.
 16.12. Ðes byð reðe mann, &amp; winð wið ealle &amp;
ealle wið hyne, and he gewislice arærð æfre hys geteld onnemn hys
gebroðra.
 16.13. Agar þa clypode Godes naman , þe hyre to spræc: þu
God ðe me gesawe; Heo cwæð: Soðlice ic geseah her þone bæftan
þe me geseah.
 16.14. And for þi heo het ðone wæterpytt Libbendes &amp;
Seondes Me; Se pytt ys betwux Cades &amp; Barath.
 16.15. Agar þa acende sunu Abrame, &amp; he het hys naman
Ismahel.
 16.16. Hundeahtatigwintre &amp; syxwintre wæs Abram, ða ða
Agar him acende Ismahel.
 17.1. EFT þa ða he wæs nygan &amp; hundnygantigwintre, ða
ætywde God hyne sylfne him, &amp; cwæð him to: Ic eom ælmihtig God:
gang ðu ætforan me &amp; beo fulfremed.
 17.2. &amp; ic sette min wed betwux me &amp; þe, &amp; ic þe
gemenigfylde swyðe ðearle.
 17.3. Ða feol Abram astreht to eorðan, &amp; God him to
cwæð.
 17.4. Ic eom &amp; min wed mid ðe, &amp; þu byst manegra
þeoda fæder.
 17.5. Ne ðin nama ne byð geciged heononforð Abram, ac ðu
byst gehaten Abraham, for þam ðe ic þe gesette manegra þeoda fæder.
 17.6. &amp; ic gedo þæt ðu wyxt, &amp; ic þe gesette on
ðeodum, &amp; cyningas cumaþ of ðe.
 17.7. &amp; ic sette min wed betwux me &amp; ðe &amp; betwux
þinum ofsprincge æfter ðe on ðinum mægþum ecum wedde, þæt ic
beo þin God &amp; ðines ofspringes æfter ðe.
 17.8. &amp; ic forgyfe ðe &amp; ðinum ofspringce þæt land
þinre ælðeodignysse, eal Chananeisc land on ece æht, &amp; ic beo
heora God.
 17.9. To Abrahame: And þu healtst min wed &amp; ðin ofsprinc
æfter ðe on heora mægðum.
 17.10. Þis ys ðæt wed, ðe ge healdan sceolon betwux me
&amp; eow &amp; ðin ofsprincg, þæt ælc hysecild betwux eow beo
emsniden.
 17.11. &amp; emsniðað þæt flæsc eowres fylmenes;
þæt beo tacn mines weddes betwux me &amp; eow.
 17.12. Ælc hysecild betwux eow beo ymsniden on þam eahteoðan
dæge hys acennednysse, &amp; ælc werhades man on eowrum mægþum &amp;
inbyrdlincg &amp; geboht þeowa beo ymsniden, þeah he ne beo eowres cynnes.
 17.13. &amp; beo min wed on eowrum flæsce on ecum wedde.
 17.14. Se werhades man þe ne byð emsniden on þam flæsce
hys fylmenes, hys sawul byð adylegod of hys folce, for þan þe he aidlode
min wed.
 17.15. God cwæð eac to Abrahame: ðin wif Sarai, ne hat ðu
hi heononforð Sarai, ac hat hi Sarra.
 17.16. Ic hi gebletsige, &amp; of hyre ic ðe forgyfe sunu, ðone
ic wylle bletsian; he byð on þeodum &amp; folca cyningas cumað of him.
 17.17. Þa feol Abraham on cneowum &amp; hloh, cweðende on hys
heortan: Wenst þu la ðæt sunu beo acenned hundwintrum men; Sarra
hundnygontigwintre nu acenne.
 17.18. He cwæð ða to Gode: Ic wisce þæt Ismahel lybbe
ætforan ðe.
 17.19. God cwæð to Abrahame: ðin wif Sarra þe acenð
sunu, &amp; ðu gecigst hys naman Isaac, &amp; ic sette min wedd to him on
ecne truwan, &amp; to hys ofsprinc æfter.
 17.20. Ofer Ismahel eac swylce ic gehealde þe: efne ic hyne
bletsige &amp; geeacnige, &amp; swyðe ic hyne gemenigfylde: twelf heretogan
he gestrynð &amp; ic hyne do mycelre mægþe.
 17.21. Min wedd soðlice ic sette to Isaace, þone ðe Sarra
þe acenð on þisre tide nu embe twelf monoð.
 17.22. God þa astah up fram Abrahame, syððan he þas
spræce geendod hæfde.
 17.23. Abraham soðlice ymbsnað hys sunu Ismahel on þone ylcan
dæg, swa swa God him bebead.
 17.24. &amp; he sylf wearð ymbsniden þa ða he wæs nygan
&amp; hundnygantig geara.
 17.27. &amp; ealle werhades men hys hiredes, ægðer ge
inbyrdlingas ge gebohte ðeowan &amp; ælðeodige men, þe him mid
wæron; ealle wurdon þæs dæges ymsnidene.
 17.30. Nu secge we betwux þisum þæt nan Cristen man ne mot
nu swa don.
 18.1. GOD þa æteowde eft Abrahame on þam dene Mambre,
þær þær he sæt on hys geteldes ingange on þære hætan
þæs dæges.
 18.2. &amp; Abraham beseah upp &amp; geseah þær ðry weras
standende him gehende; Mid þam ðe he hi geseah, þa efste he of þam
getelde him togeanes &amp; astrehte hyne to eorþan.
 18.3. &amp; cwæð: Min Drihten, gyf ðu me æniges þinges
tiðian wylle, ne far þu fram ðinum þeowan.
 18.4. Ær þan ðe ic fecce wæter &amp; eowre fet aðwea,
&amp; gerestað eow under ðisum treowe.
 18.5. Oð ðæt ic lecge eow hlaf ætforan, þæt ge eow
gereordion, &amp; ge farað syððan, for þi ge gecyrdon to eowrum
ðeowan; Hi cwædon: Do swa þu spræce.
 18.6. Abraham þa efste in to þam getelde to Sarran, &amp;
cwæð hyre to Gecned nu hrædlice þry sestras smedeman &amp; wyrc
focan.
 18.7. &amp; he arn him sylf to hys hryþera falde &amp; genam an
fæt cealf &amp; betæhte hys cnapan, &amp; se cnapa hyt mid ofste ofsloh
&amp; gearcode.
 18.8. Abraham ða nam buteran &amp; meolc &amp; þæt flæsc
mid heorðbacenum hlafum &amp; lede him ætforan, &amp; stod him under þam
treowe wið hi.
 18.9. Mid þam ðe hi æton, þa cwædon hi him to: Hwær
ys þin wif Sarra; he andwyrde: On þam getelde heo ys.
 18.10. He cwæð him to: Ic cume eft to ðe on þisne timan
&amp; ðin wif Sarra sceal habban sunu; Sarra þa gehyrde ðas word binnan
ðam getelde.
 18.12. &amp; hloh digollice ðus cweðende: Syððan ic ealdode
&amp; min hlaford geripod ys, sceal ic nu æniges lustes gyman.
 18.13. Þa cwæð God to Abrahame: Hwi hloh Sarra ðin wif
&amp; cwæð Sceal ic nu eald wif cennan.
 18.14. Cwest ðu la, ys ænig þing Gode earfoðe; be þam
gecwedenan anddagan ic cume to ðe &amp; Sarra hæfð sunu.
 18.15. Ða ætsoc Sarra: Ne hloh ic na, ac ic wæs afyrht; God
cwæð þa: Nys hyt na swa, ac þu hloge.
 18.16. Ða arison þa ðry weras, &amp; ða þanon eodon,
swylce hi woldon to ðære byrig Sodoma, &amp; Abraham eode forð mid &amp;
lædde hi.
 18.17. God cwæð þa: Hu mæg ic forhelan Abrahame þæt
ic don wylle.
 18.18. Ðonne he ys toweard on mycelre mægþe &amp; ðære
strengostan mægðe: nu ealre eorþan mægþa beoð on him gebletsode.
 18.19. Ic wat soðlice þæt he wyle bebeodan hys bearnum &amp;
hys hirede æfter him, þæt hi healdon Godes weg &amp; þæt hi don
rihtwisnysse &amp; rihtne dom, ðæt God gelæste for Abrahame ealle þa
ðing þe he him to spræc.
 18.20. God þa geopenode Abrahame hwæt he mid þære
spræce mænde, &amp; cwæð him to: þæra Sodomitiscra hream &amp;
ðære burhware of Gomorra ys gemenifyld, &amp; heora synn ys swyðe
gehefegod.
 18.21. Ic wylle nu faran to &amp; geseon hwæðer hi gefyllað
mid weorce þone hream ðe me to com, oððe hyt swa nys, ðæt ic
wite.
 18.22. Hi gewendon ða þanon &amp; eodon to Sodoman weard
Abraham soðlice stod þa gyt ætforan Gode.
 18.23. &amp; him to genealæhte, &amp; cwæð: La leof, nelt
ðu fordon þone rihtwisan mid þam arleasan.
 18.24. Gyf on ðære byrig beoð fiftig rihtwisra manna sceolon
hi ealle samod forwurþan, &amp; ðu nelt arian þære stowe for þam
fiftigum rihtiwsum, gyf hi þær swa fela beoð.
 18.25. Ne gewurðe hyt, la leof, þæt ðu yfelne dom
gesette.
 18.26. God cwæð þa to him: Gyf ic gemete on þære byrig
Sodoman fiftig rihtwisra wera, eallum ic gemiltsige for him.
 18.27. Abraham þa andwyrde, &amp; cwæð: Nu ic æne began
to sprecenne to minum Drihtne, þonne ic eom dust &amp; ahse.
 18.28. La leof, hwæt dest þu gyf ðær beoð fif &amp;
feowertig rihtwisra; wylt ðu adylegian ealle þa burh?
 18.29. God cwæð þa: Gyf ic þær gemete fif &amp;
feowertig rihtwisra, ne adylegie ic þa burh.
 18.29. Abraham cwæð ða: La leof, gyf þær beoð gemet
feowertig rihtwisra, hwæt dest þu ðone; God cwæð: Ne ofslea ic hi,
gyf þær beoþ feowertig.
 18.30. Abraham cwæð ða: La leof, ic bidde þæt ðu þe
ne belge wið me gyf ic sprece: Hwæt gyf þær beoð þrittig; God
cwæð: Ne do ic him lað, gyf þær beoð þrittig rihtwisra.
 18.31. Abraham cwæð þa gyt: Nu ic æne began to sprecenne
to minum Drihtne, ic wylle specan gyt: La leof, hu byð hyt gyf ðær
beoð twentig rihtwisra; God cwæð: Ne fordo ic hi gyf ðær beoð
twentig.
 18.32. Abraham cwæð ða gyt: La leof Drihten, ic bidde
þæt ðu ne yrsige gyf ic spece gyt æne: Hu byð hyt gyf þær
beoð tyn rihtwisra; God cwæð: Ne adilgie ic hi, gyf þær beoð
tyn.
 18.33. God þa ferde forð, swa he gemynt hæfde, &amp; Abraham
gecyrde to hys wununge.
 19.1. COMON ða on æfnunge twegen englas fram Gode asende to
þære byri Sodoma, &amp; Loð, Abrahames broðor sunu, sæt on
þære stræt &amp; geseah hi; He aras þa sona &amp; eode him togeanes,
&amp; astrehte hyne ætforan þam englum.
 19.2. &amp; cwæð: Ic bidde eow, Leof, þæt ge cyrron to
minum huse, &amp; þær wunion nihtlanges &amp; þweað eowre fet,
þæt ge magon faran to mergen on eowerne weg; Hi cwædon: Nelle we
nateshwon, ac we wyllað wunian ut on ðære stræt.
 19.3. Loð þa hi laðode geornlice, oð ðæt hi gecyrdon
to hys huse; He ða gearcode him gereord, &amp; hi æton.
 19.5. Se leodscipe wæs swa bysmorful, þæt hi woldon fullice
ongean gecynd heora galnyssæ gefyllan, na mid wimmannum, ac swa fullice
þæt us sceamað hyt openlice to secgenne, &amp; þæt wæs heora
hream, þæt hi openlice heora fylðe gefremedon.
 19.12. Þa cwædon þa englas to Lothe, se ðe rihtlice
leofode: Hæfst ðu sunu oððe dohtra on ðisre byrig, oððe aþum
oððe ænigne sibling; Gyf ðu hæbbe, læd hi ealle of þisre
byrig.
 19.13. We sceolon soðlice adylgian ealle þas stowe, for ðan
þe heora hream weox to swyðe ætforan Gode, &amp; God us sende, þæt
we hi fordon.
 19.14. Loð þa eode to hys twam aðumum, þe woldon wifian on
hys twam dohtrum, &amp; cwæð him to: Arisað &amp; farað of þissere
stowe, for þan ðe God wyle adylegian þas burh; þa wæs him geðuht
swylce he gamenigende spræce.
 19.15. Þa englas ða on ærnemergen cwædon to Loðe: Aris
&amp; nym ðin wif &amp; þine dohtra &amp; far ðe heonon, ðy læs þe
ðu losige samod mid þissere forscyldigan burhware.
 19.16. He wandode þa gyt, ac hi gelæhton hys hand, &amp; hys
wifes hand &amp; hys dohtra.
 19.17. &amp; gelæddon hi ut of þære byrig, for þan ðe
God heom arode; þa englas cwædon him to: Beorh þinum feore: ne beseoh
ðu underbæc; ne þu ne ætstand nahwar on ðisum earde, ac gebeorh
ðe on þam munte, þæt ðu samod ne losige.
 19.18. Ða cwæð Loð: Ic bidde þe, min Drihten.
 19.19. Nu þu ðine mildheortnysse me cyddest, for ðan ðe ic
ne mæg on þam munte me gebeorgan, þe læs ðe me ðær gefo sum
færlic yfel.
 19.20. Nu ys her gehende an gehwæde burh to þære ic mæg
fleon &amp; minum feore gebeorgan.
 19.21. Him wæs ða geandswarod þus: Ic underfeng ðine bene,
ðæt ic þa burh ne towende, nu ðu wylt ðyder bugan.
 19.22. Efst ardlice ðyder, for þan ðe ic nan ðing ne do,
ær þan ðe þu ðyder cume; &amp; seo burh wæs gehaten for ði,
Segor.
 19.23. Loð com þa to Segor þa ða sunne upp eode.
 19.24. &amp; God sende to þam burgum ealbyrnendne renscur mid
swefle gemencged, &amp; ða sceamleasan fordyde.
 19.25. God towearp ða swa mid graman ða burga, &amp; ealne
ðone eard endemes towende, &amp; ealle þa burhwara forbærnde
ætgædere, &amp; eall ðæt growende wæs, wearð adylegod.
 19.26. Þa beseah Lothes wif unwislice underbæc, &amp; wearð
sona awend to anum sealtstane na for wiglunge, ac for gewisre getacnunge.
 19.27. Þa beheold Abraham on ærnemerigen ðyderweard.
 19.28. &amp; geseah hu þa ysla upp flugon mid þam smice.
 19.29. &amp; God þa alysde Loð for Abrahame.
 19.30. Loth ða ne dorste leng wunian on Segor, ac ferde mid hys
twam dohtrum afyrht to þam munte, &amp; ðær on anum scræfe ealle
ðreo wunedon.
 19.31. Ða cwæð seo yldre dohtor to hyre gingran swyster: Vre
fæder ys eald man, &amp; nan oðer wer ne belaf on ealre eorþan, ðe unc
mage habban.
 19.32. Vton fordrencean urne fæder færlice mid wine, &amp;
uton licgan mid him, þæt sum laf beo hys cynnes.
 19.33. Hi dydon ða swa, &amp; fordrencton heora fæder, &amp;
eode seo yldre swustor ærest to hys bedde, &amp; se fæder nyste hu he
befeng on hi, ne hwænne heo aras, for ðære druncennysse, ne hu heo
dearnunga aras.
 19.35. Eft hi fordrencton ðone unwaran Loð, &amp; seo gingre
dohtor eode to hys bedde, &amp; se fæder nyste hu he befeng on hi, ne
hwænne heo aras, for hys druncennysse.
 19.36. Hi wæron ða eacnigende.
 19.37. &amp; seo yldre acende sunu, þone heo het Moab, se ys
Moabitiscra fæder oð ðisne andweardan dæg.
 19.38. And seo oðer acende sunu, ðone heo het Amon, ðæt ys
Mines folces sunu; he ys þæra Amonitiscra fæder oð ðisne andweardan
dæg.
 20.1. ABRAHAM þa ferde eft to suðdæle &amp; wunode
ælþeodig on þam earde Gerera.
 20.2. &amp; cwæð be hys wife ðæt heo wære hys swustor;
þa sende Abimelech ðære leode cyning to, &amp; het nyman þæt wif
for hyre wlite to him.
 20.3. Ac God sylf him com to on swefne, &amp; cwæð to him:
Efne ðu scealt sweltan nu Abimalech, for þam wife ðe þu name; heo
hæfð oþerne wer.
 20.4. Abimalech andwyrde earhlice &amp; cwæð: Ne ofsleh ðu
Drihten unscyldigne mannan.
 20.5. He sylf cwæð to me þæt heo hys swustor wære,
&amp; þæt wif eac sæde ðæt he wære hyre broðor: ðis ic
dyde/ mid bylewitnysse.
 20.6. &amp; Drihten him cwæð to: Ic wat þæt ðu swa
dydest, &amp; ic ðe eac for ði geheold ðæt þu wið me ne syngodest,
þæt ðu hi ne scyndest, &amp; ic þe swa geheold þæt ðu hi ne
hrepodest.
 20.7. Agyf nu þam were hys wif swyþe hraðe, for þan ðe he
ys witega &amp; for ðe gebitt; Gyf þu ðis don nelt, ðu byst dead
forhraðe &amp; þa ðe þe to lociað beoð liflease eac.
 20.8. Abimelech ða aras &amp; ealle hys men clypode &amp; sæde
him ða word þe he on swefne gehyrde, &amp; hi wurdon ealle wundorlice
afyrhte.
 20.9. He clypode eac Abraham on þære ylcan nihte, &amp;
cwæð: Hwi dydest ðu swa wið us &amp; swylce synne gebrohtest ofer me
sylfne &amp; ofer min rice.
 20.10. Hwæt gesawe ðu mid us, þæt ðu swa don woldest.
 20.11. Abraham him cwæð to: Ic cwæð on minum geðance:
Ic wene þæt Godes ege ne sy on þisre stowe &amp; þæt hi wyllað me
ofslean for mines wifes ðingon.
 20.12. &amp; heo ys swa ðeah min swustor to soðan, mines
fæder dohtor, &amp; na minre modor; ic hi genam þa to wife.
 20.13. &amp; unc gewearð syþþan þæt heo sceolde secgan,
þæt heo min swustor wære, swa oft swa wyt ferdon to fyrlynum eardum.
 20.14. Þa genam Abimalech oxan &amp; scep, wealas &amp; wylna,
&amp; forgeaf Abrahame, &amp; hys wif him betæhte ungewemmed.
 20.15. &amp; cwæð: Land lið beforan eow; wuna þær ðe
leofost ys.
 20.16. To ðam wife Sarra he cwæð: ðusend scyllinga ic
forgeaf on seolfre þinum breðer; þæt beo ðe to heafodgewædon,
þæt ðe huru ne sceamige wið ða þe ðe geseoð, &amp; swa hwyder
swa ðu færst: gemun ðæt þu gelæht wære.
 20.17. Abraham þa gebæd for Abimelech God.
 20.18. For þan ðe God gewitnode ealle hys wimmen, swa þæt
heora nan ne mihte habban ænig cild for Abrahames wife, ær þan ðe he
hyt eft abæd.
 21.1. GOD þa geneosode Sarran, swa swa he behet, &amp; gefylde
hys word.
 21.2. Swa þæt heo wearð mid cilde, &amp; on hyre ylde acende
sunu on þære ylcan tide ðe God gecwæð.
 21.3. Abraham ða gecigde Isaac hys sunu.
 21.4. &amp; on þam eahteðan dæge hyne eac ymsnað, swa swa
God him bebead.
 21.5. And he sylf wæs ða hundwintre.
 21.6. Sarra cwæð þa ofwundrod: God me worhte hlehter; swa
hwa swa hyt geaxað he hlyhð mid me.
 21.7. Hwa wolde gelyfan þæt Sarra lecgan sceolde cild to hyre
breoste to gesoce on ylde, þæt ðe heo Abrahame on hys ylde acende.
 21.8. Þæt cild soðlice weox &amp; wearð gewened, &amp;
Abraham worhte, swa swa heora gewuna wæs, micelne gebeorscipe to blisse his
mannum on þone dæg, þe man þæt cild fram gesoce ateah.
 21.9. Hyt gelamp eft syððan, þæt Sarra beheold hu Agares
sunu wið Isaac plegode.
 21.10. &amp; cwæð to Abrahame: Ado þas wylne heonon: ne
byð ðære wylne sunu soðlice yrfenuma mid minum bearne Isaace.
 21.11. Abraham þa undernam hefiglice ðas word.
 21.12. Ac God sylf him cwæð to: Ne sy ðe hefiglic geðuht
þæt þæt Sarra ðe sæde be ðinre cyfese, ac do swa swa heo
cwæð, for þan ðe þe byð geciged sæd on Isaace.
 21.13. &amp; ic eac swylce do þære wylne sunu mycelre
mægðe, for þan ðe he ys eac of ðinum sæde.
 21.14. Abraham ða aras on ærnemergen sona &amp; lædde aweg
ða wylne Agar &amp; Ismahel samod &amp; sealde him formete, hlaf, &amp;
wæter, &amp; gewende him ham.
 21.14. Þa ða hi comon to þam westene ða wurdon hi on
gedwolan.
 21.15. &amp; þæt wæter asceortode, þe wæs on ðam
buteruce: heo ða alede þone sunu under sumum treowe.
 21.16. &amp; sæt hyre feorran wepende, cwæð þæt heo
nolde geseon hu þæt cild swulte.
 21.17. God þa sylf gehyrde ðæs cildes stemne &amp; sende hys
engel, ðe ðis sæde Agare: Hwæt dest ðu Agar; ne beo þu afyrht:
God sylf gehyrde ðines suna stemne.
 21.18. Aris nu &amp; gym hys for þan ðe he wyrð gyt mycelre
mægðe, &amp; seo modor swa dyde.
 21.19. Heo geseah þa sona, swa swa hyre geswutelode God, sumne
wæterpytt þær onemn, &amp; heo of þam sealde þam cnapan drincan.
 21.20. &amp; heo wunode mid him; He weox þa.
 21.21. &amp; wearð on þam westene scytta, &amp; hys modor him
genam wif on Egypta lande.
 21.22. On ðære tide cwæð se cyning Abimelech &amp; hys
ealdorman Pichol to Abrahame ðus: God sylf ys mid ðe on eallum þinum
weorcum.
 21.23. Behat me nu ðurh God, þæt ðu me ne derige ne minum
æftergencgum ne minum ofspringe, ac cyð him mildheortnysse, swa swa ic
cydde ðe.
 21.25. Abraham þa ðreade Abimelech mid wordum for þam
waterpytte þe hys wealas him ætbrudon.
 21.26. Þa cwæð se cyning to him: Nyste ic nan þing
ðises, ne ðu me hyt ne sædest, ne ic sylf hyt ne gehyrde.
 21.27. Abraham forgeaf ða Abimeleche lac on oxum &amp; on
sceapum, &amp; hi slogon heora wed, ægðer to oðrum, þæt hi wurdon
gefrynd.
 21.28. Abraham ða gesette seofan lamb on sundron.
 21.29. &amp; Abimalech axode Abraham, &amp; cwæð: Hwæt
gemænað þas lamb ðe ðu gelogast on sundron.
 21.30. Abraham him andwyrde: Ic wylle þæt ðu underfo þas
seofan lamb æt me, þæt hi to swutelunge beon þæt ic dealf ðisne
pytt; &amp; he dyde þa swa.
 21.31. For ði wæs gehaten seo stow Bersabee, for þan ðe
heora ægðer sealde oþrum hys wed ðær, &amp; sworon him betwynan
þæt hi sibbe heoldon.
 21.33. Þa gewende Abimelech mid hys ealdormen Phichol to
Palestina lande, &amp; Abraham belaf ðær; Abraham ða plantode anne holt
on Bersabeae, &amp; ðær gecigde mid soþum geleafan ðæs ecean Godes
naman.
 21.34. &amp; he ðæt land bogode Philisteiscre ðeode fela
daga syððan.
 22.1. GOD wolde þa fandian Abrahames gehyrsumnysse, &amp; clypode
hys naman.
 22.2. &amp; cwæð him ðus to: Nym ðinne ancennedan sunu
Isaac, þe ðu lufast, &amp; far to þam lande Visionis hraðe, &amp;
geofra hyne þær uppan anre dune.
 22.3. Abraham ða aras on þære ylcan nihte &amp; ferde mid
twam cnapum to þam fyrlenum lande, &amp; Isaac samod, on assum ridende.
 22.4. Þa on ðone ðriddan dæg, þa hi ða dune gesawon,
ðær ðær hi to sceoldon to ofsleane Isaac.
 22.5. Ða cwæð Abraham to þam cnapum ðus: Anbidiað eow
her mid þam assum sume hwile: ic &amp; þæt cild gað unc to gebiddenne,
&amp; we syððan cumað sona eft to eow.
 22.6. Abraham þa het Isaac beran þone wudu to þære stowe,
&amp; he sylf bær hys swurd &amp; fyr.
 22.7. Isaac ða axode Abraham hys fæder: Fæder min, ic axige
hwær seo offrung sy; her ys wuda &amp; fyr.
 22.8. Him andwyrde se fæder: God foresceawað, min sunu, him
sylf ða offrunge.
 22.9. Hi comon þa to ðære stowe þe him geswutelode God,
&amp; he ðær weofod arærde on ða ealdan wisan, &amp; þone wudu
gelogode, swa swa he hyt wolde habban to hys suna bærnette syððan he
ofslagen wurde; He geband þa hys sunu.
 22.10. &amp; hys swurd ateah þæt he hyne geoffrode on þa
ealdan wisan.
 22.11. Mid ðam ðe he wolde þæt weorc begynnan, ða
clypode Godes engel ardlice of heofonum, Abraham; He andwyrde sona.
 22.12. Se engel him cwæð to: Ne acwel ðu þæt cild, ne
þine hand ne astrece ofer hys swuran: nu ic oncneow soðlice, þæt ðu
swyðe ondrætst God, nu þu þinne ancennedan sunu ofslean woldest for
him.
 22.13. Ða beseah Abraham sona underbæc, &amp; geseah ðær
ænne ram betwux þam bremelum be ðam hornum gehæft, &amp; he ahefde
ðone ram to ðære offrunge &amp; hyne þær ofsnað Gode to lace for
hys sunu Isaac.
 22.14. He het þa þa stowe <foreign>Dominus uidit</foreign>, þæt ys God
gesyhð, &amp; gyt ys gesæd swa: <foreign>In monte Dominus uidit</foreign>, þæt ys God
gesyhð on dune.
 22.15. Eft clypode se engel Abraham, &amp; cwæð.
 22.16. Ic swerige ðurh me sylfne, sæde se ælmihtiga, nu
ðu noldest arian þinum ancennedan suna, ac ðe wæs min ege mare þonne
hys lif.
 22.17. Ic ðe nu bletsige &amp; ðinne ofspringe gemenigfylde swa
swa steorran on heofonum &amp; swa swa sandceosel on sæ; þin ofsprincg
sceal agan heora feonda gatu.
 22.18. &amp; on þinum sæde beoð ealle ðeoda gebletsode,
for þan ðe þu gehyrsumodest minre hæse ðus.
 22.19. Abraham ða gecyrde sona to hys cnapum, &amp; ferde him ham
swa mid heofonlicre bletsunge.
 23.1. SARRA leofode hundteontig geara &amp; seofan &amp; twentig
geara.
 23.2. &amp; heo syððan forðferde, &amp; Abraham hi bestod on
þa ealdan wisan.
 23.3. &amp; wolde bicgan hyre byrgene æt þam mannum, ðe he
mid wunode; þæt wæron Ethes suna.
 23.5. Þa noldon hi nanes wurðes onfon, ac forgeafon him ða
byrgene hysge mæccean on to bebyrgenne.
 23.7. Abraham hi ða eadmodlice bæd, þæt hi bædon
Efron, Soares sunu.
 23.9. Þæt he him sealde wið feo þæt twyfealde scræf
ðe he hæfde on hys lande on heora gewitnysse him sylfum to byrgelse.
 23.10. Þa cwæð Effron.
 23.11. Þæt he him wolde lustlice þone æcer forgyfan mid
þam scræfe.
 23.16. Abraham þa awæh feower hund scyllinga be fullan gewihte
seolfres, &amp; sealde Effrone.
 23.17. Wið þam æcere, &amp; wið ðam scræfe, ðe
læg to Mambre.
 23.19. Þæt ys Ebron; &amp; he bebyrigde ðær Sarran.
 23.20. &amp; he hæfde þæt land syðþan him sylfum to
licreste.
 24.1. ABRAHAM wæs ða eald, &amp; God hyne bletsode on eallum
þingum.
 24.2. &amp; he clypode him to hys yldestan gerefan, þe ealle hys
ðing bewiste, &amp; cwæð to him: Sete þine hand under min ðeoh.
 24.3. &amp; swera me aþas ðurh þone heofonlican God, þæt
ðu næfre ne nyme wif Isaace minum suna of ðisum mennisce, ðe ic mid
wunige.
 24.4. Ac far to þam lande ðe ic of com, &amp; nym him ðær
wif.
 24.5. Þa cwæð se wicnere: Hu gyf þæt wif nele hider to
lande mid me; sceal ic lædan þinne sunu eft to þam lande ðe þu of
ferdest.
 24.6. Ða cwæð Abraham: Beo wær æt þam, þæt ðu
næfre minne sunu þyder ne læde.
 24.7. Se heofonlica God sent hys engel beforan ðe, &amp; he þe
wisað.
 24.8. Gyf þæt wif þonne hider mid þe nele faran, ne byst
ðu na forsworen.
 24.9. Se gerefa ða asette ða hys swyðran hand under Abrahames
þeoh, &amp; þone að him swor, swa he hyne sylf stafode, be hys sunu
wifunge.
 24.10. Se wicnere nam þa tyn olfendas, &amp; of hys hlafordes
godum þone dæl þe he wolde, &amp; lædde forð mid him, &amp; ferde
to þam lande, be hys hlafordes hæse, oð þæt he com to Nachores
byrig.
 24.15. &amp; he ðær Isaace wif gefette, swa swa hyne hys
hlaford het, &amp; him God wissode, swa hyt on þære Ledenbec awriten ys,
ræde se þe wylle; ðæs wifes nama wæs Rebecca, Bathueles dohtor.
 24.61. On ðære tide ðe se esne hi hamweard lædde to hys
hlaforde.
 24.62. Eode Isaac on þam wege þe scyt to þam pytte ðe ys
genemned <foreign>Puteus Viuentis, et Videntis</foreign>, þæt ys Lybbendes Pytt &amp;
Geseondes; He eardode soðlice on þam suðlandum.
 24.63. He eode ut on þæt land, ðencende; þa he hyne
beseah, ða geseah he olfendas ðyderweard.
 24.64. Rebecca lyhte of þam olfende þa heo Isaac geseah.
 24.65. &amp; cwæð to þam cnihte: Hwæt ys se man ðe
ongean us gæð; þa cwæð he þæt hyt wære hys hlaford, &amp;
heo nam hraþe hyre wæfels &amp; bewæfde hi.
 24.66. Se esne rehte ða Isaace eall hys færeld.
 24.67. Isaac gelædde Rebeccan in to Sarran getelde, hys modor,
&amp; underfeng hi to wife, &amp; lufode hi swa swyðe, þæt he ðæt
sar forgeat, þe him on hys modor deaðe gelamp.
 25.5. ABRAHAM sealde Isaace eal þæt he ahte.
 25.7. Soðlice Abraham leofode anhund wintra &amp; fif &amp;
hundseofontig wintra.
 25.8. &amp; he forðferde on godre ylde.
 25.9. &amp; Isaac &amp; Ismahel hys suna hi bebyrigdon on þam twy
fealdum scræfe ðe stynt on Effrones lande, Soares suna Etheiscean, ongean
Mambre.
 25.10. Þæt he bohte æt Ethes sunum: þær he ys bebyrged
&amp; Sarra hys wif.
 25.12. Ismahele wæron acennede twelf suna.
 25.13. Þæs yldestan nama wæs Nabaoth: &amp; Cedar, &amp;
Abdeel, &amp; Mabsam.
 25.14. &amp; Mamsa, &amp; Duma, &amp; Massa.
 25.15. &amp; Adad, &amp; Thema, &amp; Ithur, &amp; Naphis.
 25.17. Ismahel forðferde þa he wæs hundteontigwintre &amp;
seofan &amp; ðrittigwintre.
 25.20. Isaac wæs <foreign>xl</foreign>wintre ða he nam Rebeccan to wife,
Bathueles dohtor þæs Siriscean of Mesopotamia, Labanes swustor.
 25.21. &amp; Isaac bæd Drihten for hys wife, for þan ðe heo
wæs untymende, &amp; he hyne gehyrde, &amp; dyde þæt Rebecca wearð
geeacnod.
 25.22. Ac ða ða lytlingas fuhton on hyre innoðe, þa
cwæð heo: Gyf hyt swa mihte beon, hwæs wære me mare ðearf þonne
ic mid cilde wære; þa eode Rebecca to þam þæt heo Drihten ymbe
þæt axode.
 25.23. &amp; he cwæð: Twa þeoda synd on þinum innoðe,
&amp; twa folc beoð todælede on ðe; &amp; þæt folc oferswyð
þæt oðer folc, &amp; se mara ðeowað þam læssan.
 25.24. Ða com þære cennincge tima, &amp; heo acende twegen
suna.
 25.25. Se ðe ær com wæs reod &amp; eall ruh; &amp; his nama
wæs genemned Esau; &amp; se oðer com swa hraðe æfter þam oðrum,
þæt he hæfde þæs broðor fotwolman on handa, &amp; hyne man nemde
Iacob.
 25.26. Isaac wæs <foreign>lx</foreign>wintre, þa him wæron þas lytlingas
acennede; þa hi afedde wæron, þa wæs Esau gleaw hunta &amp;
eorðtilia.
 25.28. Iacob wæs bylewite man, &amp; wunode on geteldum.
 25.28. Isaac lufode Esau for hys huntnoðe &amp; Rebecca lufode
Iacob.
 26.34. ÐA Esau wæs <foreign>xl</foreign>wintre, þa nam he twa wif, Iudith,
Berithes dohtor ðæs Etheiscean, &amp; Basemat, Helones dohtor on ðære
ylcan stowe.
 26.35. Þa buta abulgon Isaace &amp; Rebeccan.
 27.1. ÐA Isaac ealdode &amp; hys eagan ðystrodon, þæt ne
he mihte nan ðing geseon, þa clypode he Esau hys yldran sunu.
 27.2. &amp; cwæð to him: þu gesyhst þæt ic ealdige,
&amp; ic nat hwænne mine dagas agane beoð.
 27.3. Nim þin gesceot, þinne cocur &amp; þinne bogan, &amp;
gang ut, &amp; þonne ðu ænig ðing begyte þæs ðe þu wene
þæt me licie.
 27.4. Bring me þæt ic ete, &amp; ic þe bletsige ær þam
ðe ic swelte.
 27.5. Ða Rebecca þæt gehyrde, &amp; Esau ut agan wæs.
 27.6. Ða cwæð heo to Iacobe hyre suna: Ic gehyrde þæt
ðin fæder cwæð to Esauwe þinum breðer.
 27.7. Bring me of þinum huntnoðe, þæt ic bletsige ðe
beforan Drihtne ær ic swelte.
 27.8. Sunu, hlyst minre lare.
 27.9. Far to þære heorde, &amp; bring me twa ða betstan
ticcenu, þæt ic macige mete þinum fæder ðærof, &amp; he ytt
lustlice.
 27.10. Þonne ðu ða inbringst, he ett &amp; bletsað þe
ær he swelte.
 27.11. Ða cwæð he to hyre: ðu wast þæt Esau min
broðor ys ruh &amp; ic eom smeðe.
 27.12. Gyf min fæder me handlað &amp; me gecnæwð, ic
ondræde þæt he wene þæt ic hyne wylle beswican, &amp; þæt he
wyrge me næs na ne bletsige.
 27.13. Þa cwæð seo modor to him: Sunu min, sy seo wyrignys
ofer me: do swa ic þe secge; far &amp; bring ða þing ðe ic þe bead.
 27.14. He ferde ða &amp; brohte &amp; sealde hyt hys meder, &amp;
heo hyt gearwode swa heo wiste þæt hys fæder licode.
 27.15. &amp; heo scrydde Iacob mid þam deorwurðustan reafe ðe
heo æt ham mid hyre hæfde.
 27.16. &amp; befeold hys handa mid þæra ticcena fellum &amp;
hys swuran, ðær he nacod wæs.
 27.17. &amp; heo sealde him ðone mete ðe heo seað, &amp;
hlaf, &amp; he brohte þæt hys fæder.
 27.18. &amp; cwæð: Fæder min, He andswarode &amp;
cwæð: Hwæt eart ðu, sunu min.
 27.19. &amp; Iacob cwæð: Ic eom Esau, ðin frumcenneda sunu;
ic dyde swa ðu me bebude; Aris upp &amp; site &amp; ett of minum huntnoðe,
þæt ðu me bletsige.
 27.20. Eft Isaac cwæð to hys suna: Sunu min, hu mihtest ðu
hyt swa hrædlice findan; ða andswarode he &amp; cwæð: Hyt wæs
Godes willa þæt hyt me swa hrædlice ongean com þæt ic wolde.
 27.21. &amp; Isaac cwæð: Ga hider near þæt ic æthrine
ðin, sunu min, &amp; fandige hwæðer ðu sy min sunu Esau ðe ne sy.
 27.22. He eode to þam fæder, &amp; Isaac cwæð ða, ða
he hyne gegrapod hæfde: Witodlice seo stemn ys Iacobes stemn, &amp; ða
handa synd Esaues handa.
 27.23. &amp; he ne gecneow hyne, for þam ða ruwan handa
wæron swylce ðæs yldran broðor; He hyne bletsode ða.
 27.24. &amp; cwæð: Eart ðu Esau, min sunu; &amp; he
cwæð: Ia, leof, ic hyt eom.
 27.25. Þa cwæð he: Bring me mete of ðinum huntnoðe,
þæt ic ðe bletsige; þa he ðone mete brohte, he brohte him eac win;
þa he hæfde gedruncen.
 27.26. Ða cwæð he to him: Sunu min, gang hider &amp; cysse
me.
 27.27. He nealæhte &amp; cyste hyne: sona swa he him to onleat,
he bletsode hyne, &amp; cwæð: Nu ys mines suna stenc swylce þæs
landes stenc, þe Drihten bletsode.
 27.28. Sylle þe God of heofones deawe &amp; of eorðan
fætnysse/ &amp; micelnysse hwætes &amp; wines.
 27.29. &amp; ðeowion þe eal folc, &amp; geeaðmedun ðe ealle
mægþa; beo ðu þinra broðra hlaford, &amp; syn ðinre modor suna
gebiged beforan ðe; Se ðe þe wyrige, sy he awyrged, &amp; se ðe þe
bletsige, sy he mid bletsunge gefylled.
 27.30. Vneaðe Isaac geendode þas spræce þa Iacob ut eode;
ða com Esau of huntoðe.
 27.31. &amp; brohte in gesodene mete, &amp; cwæð to hys
fæder: Aris, fæder min, &amp; ett of þines suna huntoðe, þæt
ðu me bletsige.
 27.32. Ða cwæð Isaac: Hwæt eart þu; he andwyrde &amp;
cwæð: Ic eom Esau.
 27.33. Ða aforhtode Isaac mycelre forhtnysse &amp; wundrode
ungemetlice swyðe, &amp; cwæþ: Hwæt wæs se ðe me ær brohte of
huntoðe &amp; ic æt ðærof ær ðu come, &amp; ic hyne bletsode,
&amp; he byð gebletsod.
 27.34. Þa Esau hys fæder spræca gehyrde, ða wearð he
swyðe sarig, &amp; geomormod cwæð: Fæder min, bletsa eac me.
 27.35. Ða cwæð he: þin broðor com facenlice &amp; nam
þine bletsunga.
 27.36. &amp; he cwæð eac: Rihte ys he genemd Iacob: nu he
beswac me; ær he ætbræd me mine frumcennedan, &amp; nu oðre syðe
he forstæl mine bletsunga; Eft he cwæð to þam fæder: Cwyst þu,
ne heolde þu me nane bletsunge.
 27.37. Þa andswarode Isaac &amp; cwæð: Ic gesette hyne ðe
to hlaforde &amp; ealle þine gebroðru beoð under hys ðeowdome; ic
sealde him mycelnysse hwætes &amp; wines; hwæt mæg ic leng don.
 27.38. Ða cwæð Esau to him: La fæder, hæfdest ðu gyt
ane bletsunga; ic bidde ðe þæt ðu me bletsige; ða he swyðe weop.
 27.39. Þa wearð Isaac sarig, &amp; cwæð to him: Bletsige
ðe God on eorþan fætnysse &amp; of heofones deawe.
 27.41. Soðlice Esau ascunode Iacob for ðære bletsunge ðe
hys fæder hyne bletsode, &amp; ðohte to ofsleane Iacob hys broðor.
 27.42. Þa cydde man ðæt Rebeccan heora meder; þa het heo
feccan hyre sunu, &amp; cwæð to him: Esau ðin broðor þe ðencð to
ofsleane.
 27.43. Sunu min, hlyste minra worda: Aris &amp; far to Labane minum
breðer on Aram.
 27.44. &amp; wuna mid him sume hwile oð ðines broðor yrre
geswice.
 27.45. &amp; oð þæt he forgyte ða ðing þe ðu him
dydest; &amp; ic sende syððan æfter þe &amp; hate ðe hider feccean;
Hwi sceal ic beon bedæled ægðer minra sunena on anum dæge.
 27.46. &amp; Rebecca cwæð to Isaace: Ic eom sarig for Ethes
dohtrum; gyf Iacob nymð wif of ðises landes mannum, nelle ic lybban.
 28.1. ISAAC clypode ða Iacob &amp; bletsode hyne, &amp; cwæð
to him: Ne nym ðu þe gemæccean of Chanan cynne.
 28.2. Ac far to Mesopotamia on Siria to Bathueles hiwrædene,
þinre modor fæder, &amp; nym ðe wif of Labanes dohtrum, ðines eames.
 28.10. Iacob ferde ða of Bersabe to Aram.
 28.11. Þa he com to sumre stowe &amp; wolde hyne þær restan
æfter sunnan setlunge, he nam stanas &amp; lede under hys heafod &amp; slep
on ðere stowe.
 28.12. Ða geseah he on swefne standan ane hlæddre fra eorþan
to heofonan &amp; Godes englas upp stigende &amp; nyðer stigende on
þære.
 28.13. &amp; he geseah Drihten on ufeweardre þære hlæddre,
&amp; Drihten cwæð to him: Ic eom Drihten God Abrahames ðines fæder,
&amp; Isaaces God; þæt land, ðe ðu on slæpst, ic sylle ðe &amp;
dinum ofsprincge.
 28.14. &amp; þin ofsprinc byð fram eastdæle oð westdæl
&amp; fram suðdæle oð norðdæl, &amp; ealle eorðan mægða
beoð gebletsode ðurh þe, &amp; þurh ðinne ofsprinc.
 28.15. &amp; ic healde þe swa hwær swa ðu færst, &amp; ic
ðe læde ongean to þison lande, &amp; gefylle ealle þa ðincg, þe ic
spræc.
 28.16. Þa Iacob awoc, þa cwæð he: Witodlice Drihten ys on
þisse stowe, &amp; ic hyt nyste.
 28.17. &amp; he cwæð eft: Eala hu egeslic ðeos stow ys; Nys
her nan ðing buton Godes hus, &amp; heofones geat.
 28.18. On morgen, ða he aras, he nam þone stan ðe he under
hys heafod lede, &amp; arærde hyne to mearce, &amp; get ele ðær on
uppan.
 28.19. &amp; nemde þa burh, Bethel, seo hatte ær Luza.
 28.20. Eac he behet behat, &amp; cwæð: Gyf Drihten byð mid
me &amp; gehealt me on þam wege ðe ic fare, &amp; sylð me hlaf to etene
&amp; reaf to werigenne.
 28.21. &amp; gyf ic gesund cyrre to mines fæder huse, Drihten
biþ God min.
 28.22. &amp; ðes stan þe ic arærde to mearce byð genemned
Godes Hus, &amp; of eallum þam ðingum þe ðu me sylst ic bringe ðe
teoðunge.
 29.1. WITODLICE þa he com to þam eastlande.
 29.2. Ða geseah he ðær anne pytt on þam lande, &amp;
ðreo heorda sceapa sittende wið þone pytt, &amp; se pytt wæs beheled
mid anum stane.
 29.3. Þæra hyrda gewuna wæs, ðonne hi heora heorda
gegaderodon, þæt hi awylton ðone stan of þam pytte &amp; heora orf
þær wæterodon, &amp; ðone pytt eft behlidon.
 29.4. &amp; he cwæð to þam hyrdum: Broðru, hwanon synd ge;
hi andswarodon &amp; cwædon: Of Aran.
 29.5. Þa cwæð he: Cunne ge Laban, Nachores sunu?
 29.5. Hi cwædon þæt hi hyne cuðon.
 29.6. Ða cwæð he: Hu mæg he?
 29.6. Hi cwædon þæt he wel mihte; ða hi ðus spræcon,
þa com Rachel, hys dohtor, mid hys heorde.
 29.10. Ða Iacob hi geseah &amp; wiste þæt hyt wæs hys
mage &amp; Labanes scep, hys eames, he fylste hyre &amp; wæterode hyre
heorde.
 29.13. Ða Laban gehyrde þæt Iacob wæs cumen, his swuster
sunu, þa arn he togeanes &amp; clypte hyne &amp; cyste &amp; lædde hine in
to his huse.
 29.14. &amp; cwæð to him: ðu eart min ban &amp; min
flæsc; &amp; þa an monoþ agan wæs.
 29.15. Ða cwæð he to him: Nelle ic þæt ðu me to gyfe
hyrsumie; hwæt wilt ðu to medes habban.
 29.16. Laban hæfde twa dohtra; seo yldre hatte Lia, &amp; seo
gyngre Rachel.
 29.18. Iacob lufode Rachel, &amp; cwæð: Ic hyrsumie þe
seofon gear wið þinre gingran dehter.
 29.19. Þa cwæð Laban: Leofre me is þæt ic hi sylle þe
ðonne oðrum men; wuna mid me.
 29.20. Iacob him hyrsumode þa seofan gear for Rachele, &amp; hit
him þuhte feawa daga for þære lufe þe he to hyre hæfde.
 29.21. Ða ða seofan gear agan wæron.
 29.22. &amp; man sceolde hi him gyfan.
 29.23. Þa lædde Laban hys dohtor to him.
 29.24. &amp; sealde hyre ane ðinene, seo hatte Zelpha: &amp; he
underfeng Lian to wife.
 29.25. On mergen, þa he Lian geseah, he cwæð to hys sweore:
Hwi dydest ðu ðus; hu ne ðeowode ic ðe seofan gear for Rachele?
 29.26. Þa andswarode Laban, &amp; cwæð: Hyt nys ðeaw mid
us þæt man ða gingran ær forgyfe þonne ða yldran.
 29.27. Ac hafa ðe þas ane wucan to gemæccan, &amp; ic gyfe
ðe þa oðre, wið ðam þu hyrsumige me oðre <foreign>vii</foreign> gear.
 29.28. He cwæð þæt he swa don wolde: ða seo wucu agan
wæs, þa nam he Rachel to wife.
 29.29. &amp; se fæder hyre sealde ane ðeowene, Bala hatte.
 29.32. Iacob gestrynde þa be Lian, Ruben &amp; Simeon &amp; Levi
&amp; Iuda.
 30.1. RACHEL wæs untymende.
 30.4. Ac heo nam Balan, hyre ðeowene, &amp; sealde Iacobe to
gerestan.
 30.5. &amp; he gestrynde be hyre Dan &amp; Neptalim.
 30.9. Þa Lia undergeat þæt heo leng ne tymde, ða sealde
heo Zelfan, hyre ðinene, Iacobe to wife.
 30.10. &amp; he strynde be hyre Gad &amp; Aser.
 30.18. Eft he gestrynde fiftan sunu &amp; syxtan, Isachar &amp;
Zabulon, &amp; ane dohtor, Dina hatte.
 30.22. Witodlice God gehyrde Racheles bene, &amp; he gestrynde be
hyre Iosep.
 30.25. Ða Iosep wæs geboren, þa bæd Iacob hys sweor
þæt he lete hyne faran to hys lande.
 30.26. Mid hys wifum &amp; mid hys bearnum, ðe he him fore
hyrsumode.
 30.43. Iacob wæs þa swyðe welig, &amp; hæfde manega
heorda &amp; þeowas &amp; ðeowena, olfendas &amp; assan.
 31.1. ÐA cwædon Labanes bearn: Iacob hæfð genumen ealle
ures fæder æhta, &amp; he ys welig &amp; mære ðurh ures fæder
speda.
 31.4. He sende ða &amp; clypode Rachel &amp; Lian.
 31.5. &amp; cwæð to him: Ic geseo on eowres fæder ðeawum
þæt he nys swa wel wið me geworht swa he wæs gyrsan dæg &amp;
þis æran dæg.
 31.11. Mines fæder God cwæð to me.
 31.13. Far of ðis lande, &amp; cum to þam lande ðe þu on
wære geboren.
 31.14. Þa andswarode Lia &amp; Rachel, &amp; cwædon:
Hwæðer wyt ænig ðing agon of uncres fæder æhton.
 31.15. He sealde us swa fremde &amp; fræt uncer wurð.
 31.16. Ac God nam uncres fæder æhta &amp; sealde hi unc &amp;
uncrum bearnum: do for þam ða ðingc þe Drihten ðe bebead.
 31.17. Iacob aras &amp; sette hys gemæccan uppan hys olfendas,
&amp; hys bearn.
 31.18. &amp; nam ealle ða ðing, þe he on Mesopotamia begeat,
forð mid him, &amp; ferde to Isaace hys fæder, to Chanaan lande.
 31.19. On ðære tide ferde Laban to hys scepscere, &amp; Rachel
forstæl hyre fæder hæðenan godas.
 31.20. Þa nolde Iacob cyðan hys scæcdom hys sweore.
 31.21. Þa he ferde mid þam ðingum ðe hys on riht wæron.
 31.22. Þa cydde man Labane on þam ðriddan dæge þæt
Iacob wæs asceacen.
 31.23. Ða ferde Laban &amp; hys gebroðru æfter Iacobe seofan
dagas, &amp; gemetton hyne on Galaad.
 31.24. Ða ætywde God Labane on swefne, &amp; cwæð to him:
Warna ðe þæt ðu nan ðing wiðerweardlices ne spece ongean Iacob.
 31.25. &amp; Iacob sloh hys geteld on ðære dune.
 31.26. Þa cwæð Laban to Iacobe: Hwi dydest ðu swa,
þæt ðu ætlæddest me mine dohtra swylce hyt gehergode hæftlingas
wæron.
 31.27. Hwi woldest ðu sceacan butan minre gewitnysse; hwi noldest
ðu hyt secgan me, þæt ic fyligde ðe mid blisse &amp; mid lofsangum
&amp; mid timpanum &amp; mid hearpan?
 31.28. Ne þu ne bide þæt ic mine suna cyste, &amp; mine
dohtra, &amp; dyselice ðu dydest.
 31.29. Nu ic wolde ðe þone unðanc mid yfele leanian, ac
ðines fæder God cwæð to me gyrsandæg: Warna þæt ðu nan
ðing styrnlices ne sprece on Iacob.
 31.30. Be ðinum agenum wille ðu ferdest to ðines fæder
hiwrædenne: hwi forstæle ðu mine godas.
 31.31. Þa cwæð Iacob: Ic for fram ðe butan ðinre
gewitnysse, for ðam ic ondred þæt ðu me bereafodest þinra dohtra.
 31.32. Nu ðu me stale tihst, sy se man ofslagen beforan us eallum
þe ðu þine hæðenan godas mid finde; Sece þine ðing, &amp; nym
swa hwæt swa þu ðines finde; Iacob nyste ðæt Rachel hæfde ða
anlicnyssa forstolen.
 31.33. Eft Laban eode ða in to Iacobes geteldum &amp; sohte hys
hæðenan godas, &amp; hi nahwar þær ne funde.
 31.34. Rachel hi hæfde gehydd under anes olfendes seame.
 31.36. Þa wearð Iacob yrre, &amp; cwæð to him: For hwylcum
gylte ferdest ðu þus æfter me &amp; towurpe eall min innorf.
 31.37. Hwæt fundest ðu þinra æhta þæron?
 31.37. Lege hyt her beforan ðinum freondum &amp; beforan minum
freondum, &amp; demon hi betwux me &amp; ðe.
 31.38. Wæs ic for þam nu twentig wintra mid ðe?
 31.38. Næron þine heorda stedige, ne ic ðærof ne æt.
 31.39. Swa hwæt swa man ðærof forstæl oððe wildeor
abiton, ic hyt forgeald.
 31.40. Dæges &amp; nihtes ic swanc, on hætan &amp; on cyle
&amp; on wæccan.
 31.41. Ðus ic þeowode ðe twentig wintre, feowertyne for
ðinum dohtrum &amp; syx for ðinum heordum.
 31.42. Nu þu me woldest forlætan nacodne, gyf Abrahames God
nære mid me, &amp; Isaaces ege; God geseah min geswinc &amp; ðreatode ðe
gyrsandæg.
 31.43. Þa cwæð Laban: Mine dohtra &amp; þine suna &amp;
þine heorda, &amp; ealle þa ðing ðe þu gesyhst, synd mine: Hwæt
mæg ic þeah don minum sunon &amp; minum magon.
 31.44. Ga hider near, &amp; uton syllan wedd, þæt freondscipe
sy betwux me &amp; ðe.
 31.53. Abrahames God &amp; Nachores God, &amp; heora fæder God
deme betwux unc; &amp; Iacob swor ðurh hys fæder ege, Isaaces.
 31.54. &amp; geofrode lac on þære dune, &amp; clypode hys
gebroðra ðæt hi æton; þa hi eten hæfdon, hi wunedon ðær.
 31.55. &amp; Laban aras on niht &amp; cyste hys suna &amp; hys
dohtra, &amp; bletsode hi, &amp; cyrde to hys agenum hame.
 32.1. WITODLICE ða Iacob ferde, he geseah Godes englas beforan
him.
 32.2. &amp; he cwæð: ðis ys Godes fyrdwic; &amp; he nemde
þære stowe naman Manaim, þæt ys Wicstow.
 32.3. Soðlice he sende bodan beforan him to Esau hys breðer on
Seir lande.
 32.4. &amp; cwæð to him: Secgað Esauwe minum hlaforde,
þæt ic wracnode mid Labane &amp; fleah hyne oð ðisne dæg.
 32.5. Nu ic hæbbe oxan &amp; assan &amp; sceap, þeowas &amp;
ðeowena, &amp; ic sende ærendracan to minum hlaforde, þæt he min
freond sy.
 32.6. Ða ða bodan ongean comon to Iacobe, ða cwædon hi: We
comon to Esauwe þinum breðer, &amp; he efst nu ongean ðe mid feower hund
mannum.
 32.7. &amp; Iacob ondred him swyðe, &amp; todælde þæt
folc on twa, &amp; þa heorda &amp; þa olfendas.
 32.8. &amp; cwæð: Gyf Esau cymð to anum flocce &amp; þone
ofslyhð, se oðer floc byð gehealden.
 32.9. &amp; heft he cwæð: Abrahames God, mines fæder, &amp;
Isaaces God, Drihten, þu ðe me bude þæt ic ferde to þam lande þe
ic wæs on geboren &amp; bletsode me.
 32.10. Ic eom læssa ðonne ealle ðine miltsunga &amp; þonne
þin soðfæstnys, ðe ðu þinum ðeowe sealdest; mid minum stafe ic
oferferde Iordane, &amp; ic hi eft ongean oferfare mid twam floccum.
 32.11. Alyse me of Esaues handa, mines broðor, for þam ðe ic
hyne swyðe ondræde, þe læs ðe he cume &amp; ofslea ðas modra
mid heora cildum.
 32.12. Þu cwæde þæt ðu me woldest wel don, &amp;
þæt ðu woldest minne ofspring gemenigfyldan swa sæceosol ðe nan
atellan ne mæg.
 32.13. He asyndrode ða lac of þam ðe he hæfde Esauwe hys
breðer, twahund gata &amp; twentig buccena, &amp; twahund ewena &amp; twentig
rammena, þrittig gefolra olfendmyrena mid heora coltum, &amp; feowertig cuna,
&amp; twentig fearra, &amp; twentig asmyrena mid hyra tyn coltum.
 32.16. &amp; he asende hys þeowas &amp; ælc ðæra heorda
onsundrum beforan him, &amp; cwæð to him.
 32.17. Gyf ge gemitton Esau minne broðor &amp; he eow axige
hwæs ge synd, oððe hwyder ge wyllon, oððe hwa þa ðing age, þe
ge mid farað.
 32.18. Þonne cweðe ge þæt hit synd Iacobes, &amp; he hi
sent hys hlaforde Esauwe to lace, &amp; he cymð him sylf æfter.
 32.20. Þæt he þe mid hys lacum gegladige &amp; hæbbe
ðine miltse.
 32.21. Ða lac ferdon ða beforan him, &amp; he wunode on
þære nihte on wicstowe.
 32.22. He aras ða on dægred, &amp; nam his wif mid heora
endleofan sunum, &amp; oferfor þone ford ðe man Iacob nemð.
 32.23. Þa he ealle ða þing ofer gebroht hæfde, ðe hys
wæron.
 32.24. He ana belaf ðær bæftan: ða wraxlode an engel
wið hyne on merigen.
 32.25. Ða he geseah þæt he hyne oferswyðan ne mihte, ða
æthran he hys sine on hys ðeo, &amp; heo þærrihte forscranc.
 32.26. Ða cwæð se engel to Iacobe: Forlæt me; nu gæð
dægsteorra upp; He andswarode &amp; cwæð: Ne forlæte ic ðe ær
ðu bletsige me.
 32.27. Þa cwæð se engel: Hwæt ys þin nama; Iacob,
cwæð he.
 32.28. Þa cwæð he: Ne byð þin nama nateshwon Iacob
genemned, ac Israhel, for ðam þe ðu wære strang ongean God, &amp; þu
byst strengra ongean men.
 32.29. Ða axode Iacob hyne hwæt hys nama wære; ða
cwæð he: Hwi axast ðu minne naman; &amp; he bletsode hyne on ðære
ylcan stowe.
 32.30. &amp; Iacob nemde ðære stowe naman Phanuel, &amp;
cwæð: Ic geseah Drihten of ansyne to ansyne &amp; wæs hal.
 32.31. &amp; sona eode sunne upp, þa he hæfde oferfaren
Phanuel: he wæs healt.
 32.32. For þam nellað Israhela folc etan sine gyt oð ðisne
dæg, for þam ðe heo forscranc on Iacobes ðeo &amp; astifode.
 33.1. SOðLICE þa Iacob hyne beseah, þa geseah he Esau him
toweard mid fowerhund mannum; Iacob todælde ða Lian bearn &amp; Rachele
&amp; begra ðæra ðinena.
 33.2. &amp; sette þa ðinena &amp; hyra bearn on on forewerdum,
&amp; Lian mid hyre bearnum on þære æftran stowe, &amp; Rachel &amp;
Iosep on æfteweardan.
 33.3. &amp; he eode forð &amp; feol niwel on ða eorðan seofan
syðon, oð ðæt hys broðor com.
 33.4. Esau arn ongean hys broðor &amp; clypte hyne &amp; cyste
hyne.
 33.5. Þa he hyne beseah, þa geseah he þa wif &amp; heora
lytlingas, &amp; cwæð: Hwæt synd ðas; Gebyrað him aht to ðe; He
andswarode &amp; cwæð: Hyt synd þa lytlingas þe Drihten me forgeaf,
ðinum þeowe.
 33.8. Þa Esau ða lac geseah, þa cwæð he: Hwæt synd
ðas floccas þe ongean me comon; he him andswarode &amp; cwæð: Hyt synd
þa ðing þe ic sylle þe, hlaford min, wið ðinum freondscipe gyfan.
 33.9. &amp; he cwæð: Broðor min, hafa ðe ðin; ic
hæbbe genoh.
 33.10. Þa cwæð he: Ic bidde ðe þæt ðu onfo þissa
laca þe ic ðe brohte &amp; me God sealde.
 33.11. Ða underfeng he hi uneaþe.
 33.12. &amp; cwæð to him: Vton faran ætgædere.
 33.13. Þa cwæð Iacob: ðu wast þæt ic hæbbe hnesce
lytlingas &amp; geeane eawa &amp; gecealfe cy mid me; gyf ic hi to swyðe
drife, ealle hi forwurþað.
 33.14. Ac fare min hlaford beforan hys þeowe, &amp; ic fare
æfter swa ic geseo ðæt mine litlingas magon, oð ðæt ic cume to
minum hlaforde on Seir.
 33.15. Ða cwæð Esau: Ic bidde ðe þæt ðu nyme þe
ladmenn of minum geferum, ðæt þe wegas wission; ða cwæð he: Nys
me ðæs nan þearf; ðæs anes ic ah ðearfe, ðæt ðu min freond
sy, &amp; ic ðine miltse hæbbe.
 33.16. Esau ferde þa to Seir.
 33.17. &amp; Iacob com to Sochot, &amp; arærde ðær hys
geteld &amp; nemde ðære stowe naman, Sochot, ðæt ys geteld.
 33.18. And com to Salem cester on Sichem, þæt his in Chanaan
lande &amp; þær wycnigede, &amp; bohte land æt Emore, Sichemes
fæder, &amp; arærde weofod on Godes name.
 34.1. Lian docter Dina for hut to hisywen þas landes wyfmen,
&amp; Emores sunu Sichem ræfode hi &amp; slæp mid hire, him &amp; ælle
is mægum to muculum hærme, swa seo Leden bec spryceð Genesis &amp;
ræde/ se þe wyle, hu ornoslice Iacobes sunes Dina, hære suster, hut
ledde, &amp; Emor &amp; Sichem is sune, &amp; hære mægion, &amp; eac
ælla þa to ham comen ofslogon mid swurdes ecge &amp; gecyrdon gesunde to
hæra getelde.
 35.6. &amp; Iacob &amp; is sununes mid hære wycstowe ywenden to
Bethel, &amp; herde Godes name.
 35.8. On þan time forðferde Debbora, Rebecca fostermoder, &amp;
heo bebyrigde on nyþewærde Bethel hunder ane ache, &amp; me cwæð
þane steðe Ache wop.
 35.1. GOD spræc to Iacobe, &amp; cwæð to him: Aris &amp;
far to Bethel &amp; earda þær, &amp; arære weofod on þære stowe
Drihtne, þe he ðe æteowde þa þu fluge Esau ðinne broðor.
 35.5. Iacob ferde ða mid ealre hys hiwrædene, swa him God
wisode.
 35.9. Eft God æteowde Iacobe &amp; bletsode hyne.
 35.10. &amp; cwæð: Ne byð þin nama leng Iacob genemned ac
Israhel.
 35.11. Eac he cwæð: Ic eom ælmihti God; weax &amp; beo
gemenigfyld on ðeoda &amp; mægþa.
 35.12. Folc cumað of ðe &amp; cyningas cumað of ðe.
 35.12. Þæt land ðæt ic sealde Abrahame &amp; Isaace, ic
sylle þe &amp; ðinum ofspringe æfter ðe.
 35.13. &amp; he ferde fram him.
 35.19. Soðlice Rachel forðferde, þa heo gebær hyre sunu
Beniamin, &amp; Iacob hi bebyrigde on þam wege ðe lið to Eufrate,
þæt ys Bethel.
 35.22. Iacobe hæfde twelf suna; Lian sunu, se frumcenneda Ruben,
&amp; Simeon &amp; Leui &amp; Iudas &amp; Isachar &amp; Zabulon; Rachele suna,
Iosep &amp; Beniamin; Balan suna, Rachele ðinene, Dan &amp; Neptalim; Zelphan
suna, Lian þinene, Gad &amp; Aser; þis synd Iacobes suna, þe him wæron
acennede on Mesopotamia Sirie.
 35.27. He com þa to Isaace hys fæder on Mambre, Arbea
cæstre, þæt ys Ephron, ðær wræcnode Abraham &amp; Isaac.
 35.28. &amp; gefyllede synd dagas Isaac hundteontig wintra &amp;
hundeahtatig wintra.
 35.29. &amp; Isaac forðferde on godre ylde, &amp; hys suna hyne
bebyrigdon, Esau &amp; Iacob, on Ephron.
 36.6. Esau nam hys wif &amp; hys suna &amp; hys dohtra &amp; ealle
hys æhta &amp; hys men &amp; hys heorda &amp; eall þæt he ahte on
Chanan lande, &amp; for to oþrum rice, &amp; gewat fram Iacobe hys breðer.
 36.7. Soðlice hi wæron swyþe welige &amp; ne mihton
ætgædere wunian, ne þæt land hi ne mihte acuman, for þam þe hi
hæfdon manega heorda.
 36.8. &amp; Esau eardode on Segir dune, þæt ys Edom.
 37.1. IACOB eardode on Chanaan lande, þær hys fæder
wracnode; Her cydde God ælmihtig hys mildheortnysse þe he Abrahame behet
on Iosepe, Abrahames ofsprincge.
 37.2. Ða Iosep wæs syxtynewintre, he heold hys fæder heorde
mid hys broðrum, &amp; he wæs mid Balan sunum &amp; Zelphan hys fæder
wifa; he gewregde hys broðru to heora fæder ðære mæstan wrohte.
 37.3. Soþlice Israel lufode Iosep ofer ealle hys suna, for þam
ðe he hyne gestrynde on hys ylde, &amp; het him wyrcean hringfage tunecan.
 37.4. Þa hys gebroðru þæt gesawon, þæt hys fæder
hyne swyðor lufode þonne hys oðre suna, ða onscunodon hi hyne &amp; ne
mihton nane freondrædene wið hyne habban.
 37.5. Witodlice hyt gelamp þæt hym mætte, &amp; he rehte
þæt hys gebroðrum; þurh þæt hi hyne hatedon þe swyðor.
 37.6. &amp; he cwæð to him: Gehyrat min swefn, ðe me
mætte: Me ðuhte þæt we bundon sceafas on æcere &amp; þæt min
scef arise &amp; stode upprihte on middan eowrum sceafum, &amp; eowre gylmas
stodon ymbutan &amp; abugon to minum sceafe.
 37.8. Þa cwædon hys gebroðru: Cwyst ðu la, byst ðu ure
cyning oððe beoð we ðine hyrmen; witodlice þurh ðis swefen &amp;
þurh þas spræca hi hyne hatedon, &amp; hæfdon andan to him.
 37.9. Oðer swefen hyne mætte, &amp; he rehte þæt hys
broðrum, &amp; cwæð: Ic geseah on swefne swylce sunne &amp; mona &amp;
endleofan steorran, &amp; ealle onbugon me.
 37.10. Þa he þæt hys fæder &amp; hys broðrum rehte,
ða aðreatode se fæder hyne, &amp; cwæð: Hwæt sceal ðis swefen
beon þe ðu gesawe; Sceolon we abugan þe, ic &amp; ðin modor &amp;
ðine gebroðru?
 37.11. Witodlice hys gebroðra yrsodon swyðe wið hyne: se
fæder hyt gemænde stille.
 37.12. Þa hys gebroðru wæron to lange on Sichem mid heora
fæder heordum on læswum, ða cwæð Israel to him: þine gebroðru
healdað scep on Sichima.
 37.14. Far to him &amp; loca hwæðer hyt wel sy mid him &amp;
mid heora heordum, &amp; cum to me &amp; cyð me hu hyt sy; He com ða to
Sichem fram Ebron dene.
 37.15. &amp; hyne gemitte ðær an man, þa he eode on
gedwolan, and axode hyne hwæt he sohte.
 37.16. He andswarode and cwæð: Ic sece mine gebroðru, hwar
hig healdon heora heorda.
 37.17. Ða cwæð se man to him: Hi ferdon of ðisse stowe; ic
gehyrde ðæt hi cwædon þæt hig woldon to Dothaim; Iosep ferde to
Dothaim æfter hys gebroðrum.
 37.18. Þa hi hyne feorran gesawon, ær ðam þe he him to
come, hi ðohton hyne to ofsleane.
 37.19. &amp; cwædon him betwynan: Her gæð se swefniend;
Vton hyne ofslean &amp; don hyne on þone ealdan pytt, &amp; secgan þæt
wildeor hyne fræton; þonne byð gesyne hwæt him hys swefen fremion.
 37.21. Soðlice þa Ruben ðis gehyrde, he ðohte hyne to
generienne of heora handum, &amp; cwæð.
 37.22. Ne ofslea we hyne, ne we hys blod ne ageoton, ac wurpað
hyne on ðone pytt, &amp; healdað eowre handa unbesmitene; þæt he
sæde, for þam ðe he wolde hyne generian of heora handum, &amp; hys
fæder agyfan.
 37.23. Sona swa he to hys broðrum com, swa bereafodon hi hyne hys
tunecan.
 37.24. &amp; dydon hyne on þone wæterleasan pytt.
 37.25. &amp; þa hi woldon etan, hi gesawon twegen Ismahelitisce
wegfarende men cuman of Galaad, &amp; læddon wyrtgemang on heora olfendon,
&amp; tyrwan &amp; stacten, on Egypta land.
 37.26. Þa cwæð Iudas to hys gebroðrum: Hwæt fremað us
ðeah we urne broðor ofslean?
 37.27. Selre ys þæt we hyne syllon to ceape Ismaelitum,
þæt ure handa beon unbesmitene; he ys ure broðor &amp; ure flæsc;
þa cwædon hys gebroðru þæt hyt swa mihte beon.
 37.28. &amp; þa ðær forun Madianisce cypan, hi tugon hyne up
of þam pytte &amp; sealdon hyne Ismaelitum wið ðrittigum penegum, &amp;
hi hyne læddon on Egypta land.
 37.29. Þa Ruben eft com to þam pytte &amp; ðone cnapan
ðær ne funde, ða tær he hys claðas.
 37.30. &amp; cwæð to hys broðrum: Nys se cnapa her; hwyder
ga ic?
 37.31. Ða namon hi an ticcen &amp; ofsnidon hyt, &amp; bedypton
hys tunecan on þam blode.
 37.32. &amp; brohton to heora fæder, &amp; cwædon: þas
tunecan we fundon; sceawa hwæðer hyt sy ðines suna þe ne sy.
 37.33. Ða cwæð se fæder ða ða he hi gecneow: Hyt ys
mines suna tunece; þa cwædon hi: Wildeor fræton Iosep.
 37.34. He totær hys reaf &amp; scrydde hyne mid hæran &amp;
weop hys sunu lange tide.
 37.35. Soðlice hys bearn hi gesamnodon to þam þæt hi heora
fæder gefrefrodon: he nolde nane frefrunge underfon, ac cwæð wepende:
Ic fare to minum suna to helle.
 37.36. Ða Madianiscean sealdon Iosep on Egypta land Putifare,
þam afyredan, Faraones cempena ealdre.
 38.1. ON ða tid for Iudas fram hys broðrum to anum
Adolamitiscum men.
 38.2. &amp; nam ðær an Chananeisc wif, seo wæs genemned
Sue.
 38.3. Be ðære he gestrynde ðry Suna: Her &amp; Onam &amp;
Sela.
 38.6. Soðlice Iudas sealde Here hys suna wif; seo wæs genemned
Thamar.
 38.7. Here forðferde butan bearnum.
 38.11. Þa cwæð Iudas to Thamare hys snore: Beo wydewe oð
þæt Sela min sunu geweaxe; ða for heo &amp; wunode on hyre fæder
huse.
 38.12. Æfter manegum dagum forðferde Iudas wif: þa for he to
his scepscere, he &amp; Hyras hys scephyrde, se Odolamitiscea, on Thamnaða.
 38.13. Ða cydde man þamare þæt hyre sweor for to
ðamnatha hys scep to scyrene.
 38.14. Ða dyde heo of hyre wydewan reaf &amp; nam hyre walcan
&amp; scrydde hi mid oðrum reafe &amp; sæt on þam wege ðe læg to
þamnaða, for þam ðe Sela for hys geogoðe hi ne nam to gemacan.
 38.15. Þa Iudas hi geseah, ða wende he þæt hit wære sum
myltystre; heo helede hyre neb þæt he hi ne mihte gecnawan.
 38.16. &amp; he cwæð to hyre: Læt me habban ðe; He nyste
þæt heo wæs hys snoru; þa cwæð heo: Hwæt sylstu me wið
ðam þe ðu mines gemanan bruce?
 38.17. Ða cwæð he: Ic sende ðe an ticcen of minre heorde,
&amp; heo cwæð eft: Ic ðolige locahwæt ðu wylle, gyf ðu me sylst
underwedd oð þæt ðu me sende þæt ðu me behætst.
 38.18. Þa cwæð Iudas: Hwæt wylt ðu to underwedde nyman;
ða cwæð heo: ðinne hring &amp; ðinne beah &amp; þinne stæf,
ðe þu on handa hæfst; Witodlice æt þam ylcan cyrre heo wearð mid
cilde.
 38.19. &amp; heo eode ða þanon.
 38.20. Iudas sende an ticcen wið hys Odolamitiscean hyrde,
þæt he fette ðæt underwedd þe he ðam wife sealde.
 38.21. Ða he hi findan ne mihte, ða axode he ða landes men
hwar þæt wif wære, þe æt ðæra wega gelæta sæt; ða
cwædon hi þæt ðær nan myltystre on lande nære.
 38.22. Ða cyrde he to Iudan, &amp; cwæþ to him: Ne myhte ic
hy fyndan &amp; þa landes men cwædon þæt þær nan myltystre ne
sæte.
 38.23. Þa cwæþ Iudas: Hæbbe hire, ne mæg heo us lease
tellan: ic hire sende þæt ic hyre behet, &amp; ðu hy ne fundest.
 38.24. Þa æfter þrim monþum hi cwædon to Iudan: Thamar
þin snoru is forlegen &amp; hire innoð is weaxende; þa cwæþ Iudas:
Lædaþ hi forþ, &amp; forbærnaþ hi.
 38.25. Þa heo wæs to þam witum gelæd, þa sende heo to
hire sweore, &amp; cwæþ: Be þam men ic eom mid cylde, ðe þysne hring
ah &amp; þisne beah &amp; þisne stæf; sceawa hwa hi age.
 38.26. Þa he þa lac gecneow, þa cwæð he: Heo is
rihtwisre þonne ic, for þam ic hi ne sealde Sela minum suna; &amp; þeah
næfde he hi siþþan.
 38.27. On þære cenningtide æteowdon twegen getwisan on hire
innoþe: &amp; on þæra cilda forðcyme, se oþer ræhte forð his
hand, &amp; seo byrþerþinenu wraþ wyrmreadne þræd þæron, &amp;
cwæþ: þes cymþ hraþor.
 38.29. &amp; he teah þa hand ongean, &amp; se oþer com þa;
ða cwæþ ðæt wif: Hwi is weall todæled for þe; &amp; for þam
heo nemde his naman Phares.
 38.30. Syððan com se oþer on þæs handa wæs se
ðræd; þone heo nemde Zara.
 39.1. Witodlice man lædde Iosep on Egypta land &amp; hine
gebohte Putiphar se afyreda, Pharaones heres ealdor, Egiptisc man, æt þam
Ismaelitiscum mannum þe hine þyder læddon.
 39.2. &amp; Drihten wæs mid him: se man wæs weldonde on
eallum þingum, &amp; wunode on his hlafordes huse.
 39.3. He wiste ful georne þæt God hine lufode, &amp; ealle
þa þing þe he dide, he dide be his dihte.
 39.4. Iosep hæfde micle gyfe æt his hlaforde &amp; þenode
him; &amp; betæhte him eal þæt he ahte to bewitenne.
 39.5. &amp; Drihten bletsode þæs Egiptiscean æhta for
Iosepes þingon, &amp; gemænifylde his speda ægþer ge on tunum ge on
landum.
 39.6. Iosep wæs fæger &amp; wlitig on ansine.
 39.7. Witodlice his hlæfdige lufode hine, &amp; cwæþ to
him: Slap mid me.
 39.8. &amp; he nateshwon hire þæs tiðian nolde, ac he
cwæþ: Min hlaford me hæfþ betæht ealle his þing, &amp; he nat
hwæt he ealles hæfþ.
 39.9. Næfþ he nan þing þæt ne sy on minum anwealde
buton þu þe his wif eart: hu mæg ic swa ifele wiþ hine don &amp; wiþ
God singian?
 39.10. Þylcum wordum heo him befealh ælce dæg, &amp;
þæt wif wearþ wraþ þam geongum cnapan; &amp; he ascunode
unrihthæmed.
 39.11. Hit gelamp sume dæg þæt Iosep wæs ana innan his
hlafordes huse, &amp; heo teah hine be his claþum, &amp; cwæþ to him:
Slap mid me; þa ætarn he ut &amp; forlet his wæfel on hire handum.
 39.14. Þa hrymde heo to hyre hywum, &amp; cwæþ: Nu he
lædde inn þysne Ebreiscean man, þæt he bysmrode us; he eode in to me
to ðam þæt he me ofername, &amp; þa he gehyrde þæt ic hrymde,
þa forlet he hys wæfels &amp; fleah ut.
 39.16. Þysne unwrenc heo geðohte; &amp; þa hire hlaford ham
com, þa cwæþ heo: Se Ebreiscea wealh þe ðu hider brohtest eode in to
me þæt he me bysmrude, &amp; ða ic hrymde, þa forlet he hys wæfels
&amp; arn ut.
 39.19. Ða se hlaford þæt gehyrde, þa wearþ he swiþe
yrre, &amp; gelyfde swiðe wel hyre wordum, &amp; wearp Iosep on cweartern
þær man þæs cyninges ræplingas heold, &amp; he wæs þær
belocen.
 39.21. &amp; Drihten wæs mid him &amp; miltsode him &amp; gedide
ðæt þæs cwearternes ealdor him wearþ swiðe hold.
 39.22. Se him betæhte ealle þa gebundenan men ðe þær
gehæfte wæron.
 39.23. &amp; he ne cuþe nan þing þæron, þa hi him
betæhte wæron; ac Drihten wæs mid him &amp; dihte him hwæt he don
sceolde.
 40.1. Þa þis wæs þus gedon, þa gelamp hit þæt
twegen afyrede men agylton wyþ heora hlaford, Egypta cynges byrle &amp; his
bæcestre.
 40.2. &amp; Pharao wearþ swyðe yrre.
 40.2. Ðara oþer bewiste hys byrlas, oþer hys bæcestran.
 40.3. Ða dide hi man on cwearten, on þam wæs eac Iosep
gebunden.
 40.4. &amp; þæs cwearternes hyrde hi betæhte Iosepe, &amp;
he þenode him.
 40.5. Binnan fyrste hi gesawon begen swefn on anre nihte.
 40.6. Ða wæron hi swiþe unrote on merigen.
 40.8. &amp; cwædon to Iosepe: Wit gesawon swefn, ac wit nyton
hwa hit unc atelle hwæt hit behealde; ða cwæþ Iosep: Secgaþ me
hwæt gyt gesawon.
 40.9. Þa rehte þæra byrla ealdor him his swefn, &amp;
cwæþ: Ic geseah wingeard.
 40.10. On þam wæron þreo clystru, &amp; ic geseah þæron
weaxende blostman litlum &amp; litlum, &amp; æfter þam blostmum
winberian.
 40.11. &amp; Pharaones drincefæt on minre handa, &amp; ic nam
þa winberian &amp; wrang on þæt fæt &amp; sealde Pharaone.
 40.12. Ða cwæþ Iosep: þys is þin swefn: ða þreo
clystru, þæt sind gyt þry dagas.
 40.13. Æfter þam Pharao geþencþ þine ðenunga &amp; he
geset þe to þære ylcan note þe þu ær hæfdest, &amp; þu sylst
him hys drincefæt swa þu ær didest.
 40.14. Geþence me þonne þe þin wise licie, &amp; lære
Pharao þæt he me ut alæde of þison cwearterne.
 40.15. For ðam þe ic wæs dearnunga forstolen of Ebrea lande
&amp; her unscyldig on pit beworpen.
 40.16. Ða þæra bæcestra ealdor gehyrde hu gleawlice he
þæt swefn rehte, ða cwæð he: Ic geseah swefn, þæt is ðæt
ic hæfde ðry windlas mid melewe ofer min heafod.
 40.17. &amp; on þam yfemestan windle wære manegra cynna
gebæc, &amp; fugelas ætan of þam.
 40.18. Ða andswarode Iosep, &amp; cwæð: þys is þin
swefn: ða þri windlas, þæt synd þry dagas nu gyt.
 40.19. &amp; æfter þam hæt Farao þe ahon on rode &amp;
fugelas fretaþ ðyn flæsc.
 40.20. Syððan wæs se þridda dæg Pharaones gebyrdtid:
þa worhte he micelne beorscipe his cnihtum; gemang þam ða geþohte he
þæra byrla ealdor &amp; þæra bæcestra.
 40.21. &amp; he gesette þæra byrla magyster to þære note
þe he ær hæfde.
 40.22. Þone oþerne he het hon on gealgan.
 40.22. Ða wæs Iosepes soþfæstnys afandod.
 40.23. &amp; þeahhwæþere þæra byrla ealdor forgeat

 41.1. ÆFTER twam gearum Pharao mætte þæt he stode be

 41.4. &amp; abiton þa fætte oxan &amp; fræton hi; ða awoc

 41.5. &amp; slep eft, &amp; hine mætte oþer swefn; Him þuhte

 41.11. Þa mætte unc begen swefen on anre nihte.
 41.12. Þa wæs þær an Ebreisc cnapa inne mid unc; þam

 41.13. &amp; he sæde unc eal swa hit syððan aeode: ic wæs

 41.14. Hine man dide up be þæs cynges bebode &amp; hine man

 41.15. Farao cwæþ: Ic geseah swefn &amp; ic ne mæg nanne

 41.16. Þa cwæþ Iosep: Hwæt mæg ic don butan me God

 41.17. Witodlice Pharao rehte Iosepe þa swefn, þe hine

 41.24. &amp; cwæð: Ic hit rehte þam yldestan Egypta witan,

 41.25. Þa andswarode Iosep &amp; cwæþ: þys swefn is

 41.26. Þa seofon fægeran oxan &amp; þa seofon fægeran

 41.27. Þa seofon hlænan oxan &amp; þa seofon liþran ear

 41.29. Nu her cumaþ seofon swiþe wæstmbære gear &amp;

 41.30. &amp; þæræfter cumaþ oðre seofone mid swa

 41.34. &amp; gesette gerefan geond eal þæt rice, þæt hi

 41.35. &amp; þæt ælc hwæte, þe on Pharaones anwealde
sy, sy belocen &amp; on burgum gehealden.

 41.38. &amp; he cwæþ to him: Hwar magon we findan swilcne man,

 41.42. &amp; he nam hys hring on hys agenra handa &amp; dide on his

 41.43. &amp; sette hyne on hys oþer cræt &amp; se bydel bead
þæt eal folc bygdon heora cneowa beforan him &amp; wiston þæt he
wære gerefa ofer eal Egypta land.
 41.44. Eft se cyning cwæþ to Iosepe: Ne færþ nan man
butan þinum gebode ne hyder ne þider on eallum Egypta lande.
 41.45. &amp; he awende hys naman &amp; nemde hine on Egyptisc,

 41.46. Witodlice Iosep wæs þrittigwintre þa he embefor ealle

 41.47. &amp; gegaderode on ðam seofon wæstmbærum gearum swa
micel hwætes, þæt his ne mihte nan man witan nan gemet, &amp; beleac
hine on burgum.
 41.50. Ioseph gestrinde twegen suna ær þa hungergearas comon,
Mannases, &amp; Effraim.
 41.53. Witodlice, þa þa <foreign>vii</foreign> godan gear agane wæron, þa

hunger.
 41.55. Þa þæt folc hingrode, þa clipodon hi to Pharaone,
&amp; bædon him metes; He andswarode &amp; cwæð: Gaþ to Iosepe &amp;

 41.56. Dæghwamlice hunger weox, &amp; Iosep ontinde ealle þa
bernu, &amp; sealde hwæte þam Egyptiscum mannum to ceape.
 42.1. ÐA gehyrde Iacob secgan þæt man sealde hwæte on
Egypta lande, ða cwæþ he to hys sunum: Ic gehyrde secgan þæt
hwæte wære on Egypta lande to ceape: farað &amp; bicgaþ us mete,
þæt we ne forwurþon.
 42.3. Ða foron Iosepes tyn gebroþro to Egyptum &amp; woldon
bicgan hwæte.
 42.4. &amp; Iacob hæfde Beniamin æt ham.
 42.5. Hy foron mid oþrum cypmannum; witodlice hungor wæs on
Chanaan.
 42.6. &amp; Iosep wæs Egypta ealdor, &amp; on his anwealde man
sealde þone hwæte.
 42.7. Þa his gebroþru to him comon, he gecneow hi ealle, &amp;

 42.9. Ða gemunde Iosep þa swefen þe hine æt sumum cyrre
ær gemætte, &amp; cwæþ to hym: Ge syndon sceaweras.
 42.10. Ða cwædon hi: Nis hit swa, hlaford, ac we sind þine

big libban.
 42.11. Ealle we sind anes esnes suna; mid sibbe we comon hider
næs mid searwum.
 42.12. Ða cwæþ he: On oþre wisan hit is; ge comon þis

 42.13. Ða cwædon hi: þa twelf þine þeowas sind
gebroþru; hi sind anes esnes suna on Chanaan lande, &amp; se gyngsta ys mid
urum fæder &amp; na ma.
 42.14. Ðæt is þæt ic eow ær sæde, cwæþ he, ge
sind sceaweras.
 42.15. Swa ic age Pharaones helde, ne faraþ ge ealle heonon,
ær þam þe eowwer læsta broþor cume hider.
 42.16. Ac fare eower an &amp; bringe hine hider, þæt ic wite
hwæð hit sy þe soþ þe leas þæt ge secgaþ.
 42.17. He betæhte hi ða þri dagas to hyrdnysse.

 42.19. Beo eower an broðor her on cwearterne &amp; fare ge mid

 42.21. &amp; cwædon him betwynan: Be gewyrhtum we þoliaþ

þa he us georne friðes bæd &amp; we him nanes ne tiðodon; for þam

 42.22. Ða cwæþ Ruben: Cweþe ge , ne sæde ic eow: Ne

 42.23. Hy niston þæt Iosep hy gecneow.
 42.24. &amp; he wende hine lithwon fram him &amp; weop, &amp; wende
eft to him &amp; nam Simeon &amp; band hine beforan him.
 42.25. &amp; bead his þegnum þæt hi gefyldon heora saccas

 42.26. &amp; hi foron &amp; læddon heora hwæte on heora
assan.
 42.27. Ða hi be wege wæron, þa undide heora an hys sacc

 42.28. Þa cwæþ he to his gebroþrum, þa he þæt feoh

 42.29. Þa comon hi to Iacobe heora fæder on Chanaan lande,

 42.31. &amp; we cwædon: We sind ful getriwe; ne þence nanes

 42.32. We <foreign>xii</foreign> gebroðra wæron anes esnes suna; se an is dead,

 42.33. Ða cwæþ he to us: Ic wille fandian hwæþer ge

 42.35. Ða hi ðus spæcon þa guton hi heora hwæte of

 42.36. Ða cwæð Iacob heora fæder: Bearnleasne ge habbað

 42.37. Ða andswarode Ruben &amp; cwæþ: Ic hæbbe twegen

hand &amp; ic hine agyfe eft þinre handa.
 42.38. Ða cwæð Iacob: Ne færþ Beniamin mid eow: Iosep

 43.1. GEMANG þam hungre, þa se mete geteorode, þe hi of
Egypta lande brohton, Iacob cwæþ to his sunum: Faraþ &amp; bicgaþ us

 43.3. Ða cwæð Iudas: þæs landes ealdor swor aþas
beforan us þæt we ne moston cuman beforan him butan we bringon urne
gyngestan broþor myd us.
 43.4. Witodlice gyf ðu wilt hine mid us sendan we farað
ætgædere &amp; bicgaþ ða þing þe we beðurfon.
 43.5. Gyf þu þonne nelt, ne cume we þonne þær.
 43.6. Ða cwæþ Ysrahel to him: Earmlice didon ge wið me,
þa ge him sædon þæt ge a ma gebroþra hæfdon.

 43.8. Iudas cwæþ eft to his fæder: Send þone cnapan mid

 43.9. Ic underfo þone cnapan: bide hys me eft, &amp; buton ic

 43.10. Gyf þeod ylding nære, nu we wæron cumene oþre

hnyte/.
 43.12. &amp; twa swa micel feos swa ge ær hæfdon, þe læs
ðe ge sind gedwelode.
 43.13. &amp; nimaþ eowerne broðor &amp; faraþ to þam men.
 43.14. Min Drihten hine gedo glædne wiþ eow, þæt he agyfe

 43.15. Ða namon hi ða lac &amp; twifeald feoh &amp; Beniamin

 43.16. Þa he hi geseah &amp; Beniamin mid him, ða cwæþ he

 43.17. &amp; he dide swa him beboden wæs; þa hy þærinne

 43.19. Ða cwædon hi to þam wicnere.
 43.20. We biddaþ þe, leof, þæt þu hliste ure spæce:
Hwilum ær we wæron her &amp; bohton us hwæte.
 43.21. Ða we geceapod hæfdon &amp; we hamweard wæron, þa

 43.22. &amp; eac oþer seolfor mid to ceapianne; nyte we hwa hit

 43.23. Ða cwæþ se gerefa: Sib sy mid eow: ne ondræde ge

 43.24. &amp; þwogon heora fet &amp; he sealde heora assan

 43.25. Soþlice hi ledon forð heora lac ongean þæt Iosep in

 43.26. &amp; feollon on þa eorþan &amp; geeaðmeddon wiþ

 43.30. &amp; he wearð swa swiðe astyrod, þæt him feollon

 43.31. &amp; þa he þæs geswac, þa eode he ut to him, &amp;

 43.32. On sundron þa Egyptiscean, hit næs na alifed þæt
hi ætgædere æton.
 43.34. &amp; hi man oferdrencte.
 44.1. ÐA bead Iosep his gerefan, &amp; cwæþ: Fille heora
saccas mid hwæte &amp; lege heora ælces feoh on his agenne sac.
 44.2. &amp; nim minne sylfrenan læfel &amp; þæs hwætes
wurð þe he sealde &amp; do on þæs gyngestan sacc; &amp; he dyde swa.
 44.3. On merigen þa hy ferdon.
 44.4. &amp; hi wæron butan byrig &amp; hæfdon sumne dæl
weges gefaren, ða cwæþ Iosep to his gerefan: Aris &amp; far æfter

 44.5. &amp; se læfel þe ge forstælon wæs minum hlaforde
swyðe dyre; yfele ge dydon.
 44.6. He dyde swa hym beboden wæs; &amp; þa hi gefangene
wæron, hi cwædon.
 44.7. Hwi tyhð ure hlaford us swa miceles falses?
 44.8. Þæt feoh þe we fundon on urum saccum, we læddon to
þe of Chanaan lande; wenstu þæt we stælon þines hlafordes gold
oþþe hys seolfor?
 44.9. Sece hit, &amp; si he ofslegen, se þe þu hit mid fynde.
 44.10. Ða cwæþ he: Sy hit swa ge cwædon; mid swa hwam swa

 44.11. Hi efston þa, &amp; didon heora saccas niþer.

 44.13. &amp; hy wurdon swiþe dreorie, &amp; semdon heora assan

 44.18. Ða eode Iudas hym near &amp; spræc þristlicor wið

 44.19. Þu axodest us ær hwæþer we hæfdon fæder

 44.20. &amp; we cwædon: We habbaþ ealdne fæder, &amp; he

 44.32. &amp; ic swor aþas minum fæder þæt ic hine ham
