 22.10. Gyf hwa befæste his nyxtan ænig nyten &amp; hit bið
dead oþþe gelewed oþþe ætbroden, &amp; hit nan man ne gesyhð,
Sylle him aþ &amp; ne nyde hine to gylde.
 22.12. Gyf hit forstolen beo, gylde þam hlaforde þone byrst.
 22.13. Gif hit wildeor abitað, bere forð þæt abitene &amp;
ne agyfe.
 22.14. Se þe æt his nextan hwæt to læne abit, gif hit
gelewed bið oððe dead bæftan þam hlaforde, nyde man hine þæt he
hit gylde.
 22.15. Swiðost gif hit beforan þam hlaforde wæs for his
weorces hyre.
 22.16. Gyf hwa lið mid unbeweddodre fæmnan, nime hi to
rihtwife.
 22.17. Gyf se fæder hi him syllan nelle, gylde be ðære
gyftan mæðe.
 22.18. Ne læt þu libban þa þe unlibban wyrcon.
 22.19. Þone þe hæme wið nyten, ne læt ðu hine
libban.
 22.20. Se þe godum offrie buton Gode anum, slea man hine.
 22.21. Ne geunret ðu elðeodigne; ge wæron elþeodige on
Egypta lande.
 22.22. Ne deriaþ wudewum ne steopcildum.
 22.23. Gyf ge him deriað, hi hrymaþ to me &amp; ic gehyre
heora hream.
 22.24. &amp; ic eow ofslea mid swurde, &amp; eowwer wif beoð
wudewan, &amp; eowre bearn steopcild.
 22.26. Gyf ðu wed nime æt ðinum nextan, agyf him his reaf
ær sunnan setlunge.
 22.28. Ne tæl ðu, ne wirig ðu þines folces ealdor.
 22.29. Ne yld þu mid teoþungum, ne mid frumsceattum: syle me
þin forme bearn.
 22.30. Do eal swa of hryðerum &amp; of sceapum: seofon dagas hit
bið mid his meder; syle hit me on ðam eahtoþan.
 22.31. Þæt flæsc þæt wildeor abiton, ne ete ge, ac
wurpaþ hit hundum.
 23.1. NE underfo ge lease gewitnesse.
 23.2. Ne filig ðu þam folce þe yfel wille don: ne beforan
manegon soþes ne wanda.
 23.3. Ne miltsa ðu þearfan on gemange.
 23.4. Gyf ðu gemete þines feondes oxan oþþe assan, læd
hine to him.
 23.5. Gyf ðu geseo his assan licgan under byrðene, ne ga ðu
þanon, ac hefe hine up mid him.
 23.6. Ne þu ne wanda on þerfan dome.
 23.7. Fleoh leasunga: unscyldigne &amp; rihtwisne ne ofsleah ðu.
 23.8. Ne nim þu lac, þa ablendaþ gleawne &amp; awendaþ
rihtwisra word.
 23.9. Ne beo þu elðeodigum gram, for þam þe ge wæron
elþeodige on Egypta lande.
 23.10. Saw six gear þin land &amp; gadera his wæstmas.
 23.11. &amp; læt hit restan on þam seofoþan, þæt
þearfan eton þærof, &amp; wildeor; do þu on þinum wingearde &amp; on
þinum elebeamon.
 23.12. Wyrc six dagas &amp; geswic on þam seofoþan, &amp; þin
oxa &amp; þin assa hi gerestan, &amp; þæt þinre wylnan sunu si gehyrt,
&amp; se utacymena.
 23.13. Healdaþ ealle þa þing þe ic eow sæde, &amp; ne
swerie ge þurh utancymena goda naman.
 23.14. Ðriwa on geare gewurþiaþ minne freols: þu ytst
þeorfsymbel.
 23.15. Seofon dagas ge etaþ ðeorf, swa ic þe bebead, on
þæs monþes tid niwra wæstma, þa þu ut fore of Egypta lande; Ne
cymstu butan ælmessan on mine gesyhðe.
 23.16. Heald þa symbeltide þæs monþes frumsceatta þines
weorces, þe ðu on lande sæwst, &amp; on geres utgange, þonne þu
gegaderast þine wæstmas togædere.
 23.17. Þriwa on geare ælc wæpnedman ætywð beforan
Drihtne.
 23.18. Ne ofra þu þinre onsægdnyssae blod uppan beorman: ne
rysle ne belifð oð merigen.
 23.19. Bring þine frumsceattas to Godes huse.
 23.20. Nu ic sende minne engel, þæt þe læde in to
þære stowe þe ic gegearwode.
 23.21. Gym his &amp; gehyr his stemne, for þam þe he forgyfð
þone ge syngiað, &amp; min nama is on him.
 23.22. Ic beo þinra feonda feond.
 23.23. &amp; þe in gelæde to Amareus lande.
 23.24. Ne geeaðmed þu heora godas, ac tobrec hyra anlicnyssa.
 23.25. Þeowiaþ Drihtne; ic bletsige eow &amp; do ælce
untrumnyssae eow fram, &amp; geice eower dagas, &amp; aflyme þine fynd
beforan þe.
 23.28. &amp; ic asende hyrnetta, þe aflymeþ Efeum &amp;
Chananeum twelf monðum, ær ðu in fare.
 23.31. Ic sette þine gemæro fram þare Readan Sæ, &amp;
fram þam westene oþ flod.
 23.32. Nafa þu nane sibbe wið heora godas, ði læs ðe hi
þe beswicon.
 24.1. HE cwæþ to Moyse: Astih to Drihtne, þu &amp; Aaron,
Nadab &amp; Abiu &amp; hundseofontig ealde of Israhela folce, &amp;
geeadmedaþ feor.
 24.2. Moyses ana astihð to Drihtne.
 24.3. Moyses com eft, &amp; rehte þam folce ealle Drihtnes word,
&amp; hi cwædon anre stemne: We doþ ealle Drihtnes word, þe he
spræc.
 24.4. Moyses wrat ealle Drihtnes spæca, &amp; aras on morgen
&amp; getimbrode an weofod æt þam munte nyðeweardon &amp; twelf mearca
on twelf Israhela mægðum.
 24.5. Moyses sende cnihtas, ðæt offrodan twelf cealfas.
 24.6. &amp; Moyses nam healf ðæt blod &amp; dyde on geryde
orcas &amp; geat þæt oþer uppan þæt weofod; &amp; rædde his boc
þam folce, &amp; hi cwædon: We doð ealle þa ðingc þe Drihten
bebead, &amp; beoð gehyrsume.
 24.8. &amp; he nam þæt blod &amp; sprengde þæt folc,
&amp; cwæð: þis is ðære treowðe blod, þe Drihten eow behet be
eallum/ þison spræcon.
 24.9. Moyses &amp; Aaron, Nadab &amp; Abiu &amp; hundseofontig
Israhela folces ealdro astygon.
 24.10. &amp; hi gesawon Israhela God, &amp; under his foton wæs
swylce þæs stanes ðe man saphiros on Leden nemð, &amp; swylce seo
heofone þonne heo smylte bið.
 24.11. Israhela bearn gesawon Drihten, &amp; æton &amp;
druncon.
 29.9. SYÐÐAN þu gehalgast heora handa, þu offrast an cealf;
Aaron &amp; his suna settaþ heora handa uppan his heafod.
 29.11. &amp; þu cwelst hit on Drihtnes gesihðe wið þære
cyðnysse geteldes dura.
 29.12. &amp; þu smitst þæs cealfes blod mid ðinum fingre
on þæs weofodes hyrnan &amp; gytst þæt oþer undernyþan.
 29.13. &amp; þone rysle &amp; þære lifre net &amp; twegen
lundlagan mid gelynde, þu bærnst þar uppan.
 29.14. Þæs cealfes flæsc &amp; fell &amp; gor, þu
bærnst ute butan þam fyrdwicon, for ðam hit is for synne.
 29.15. Nim ænne ram; Aaron &amp; his suna settaþ heora handa
uppan his heafod.
 29.16. Þonne ðu hine cwelst, þu nymst his blod &amp; gytst
abutan þæt weofod.
 29.17. Þone ram þu sniþst to sticcon; his innewearde &amp;
his fet þu legst uppan his heafod.
 29.18. &amp; þu offrast ealne þone ram on fyres bryne uppan
þam weofode; he is Drihtne wynsum onsægdnys.
 29.19. Þu nimst oþerne ram: &amp; Aaron &amp; his suna settaþ
heora handa ofer his heafod.
 29.20. &amp; þonne ðu hine offrast, þu nimst his blod &amp;
smitst ofer uteweard Aarones swyðre eare &amp; his suna &amp; ofer hyra handa
þuman &amp; þæs swyðran fotes miclan tan, &amp; þu gytst þæt
blod uppan ðæt weofod &amp; ymbe utan.
 29.21. &amp; þonne ðu nimst of ðam blode þe is uppan þam
weofode, &amp; of ðam smyringcele, þu sprængst Aaron &amp; his reaf
&amp; his suna &amp; heora reaf.
 29.22. Þu nimst þone rysle of ðam ramme &amp; þone tægl
&amp; þone heorthaman &amp; þære lifre net &amp; twegen lundlagan mid
gelynde &amp; þone swyþran boh, for þam hit is halgungram, &amp; anne
holne hlaf mid ele gesprengedne &amp; ænne gebigedne hlaf of ðæra
þeorfa windle beforan Drihtne.
 29.24. &amp; þu setst ealle þa uppan Aarones handa &amp; his
suna, &amp; gehalgast hi &amp; up ahefst beforan Drihtne.
 29.25. &amp; þu nimst eall of heora handum &amp; onælst
beforan Drihtne, for ðam hit is his offrung.
 29.26. Ðu nimst ðæt andrib of ðam ramme, þe Aaron
gehalgod wæs, &amp; gehalgast hit &amp; up ahefst beforan Drihtne, &amp; hit
gescyt to his dæle.
 29.27. &amp; eac þu gehalgost þæt gehalgode andrib &amp;
ðone boh þe ðu of ðam ramme asyndrodest, þe Aaron of gehalgod wæs
&amp; his suna, &amp; hig gesceotað to Aarones dæle &amp; his suna ecre
lage fram Israhela bearnum.
 29.29. Ðæt halige reaf þæt Aaron werað, his suna
habbað æfter him, þæt hig syn gesmyrede on þam &amp; heora handa
gehalgode.
 29.30. Seofon dagas he weraþ ðæt, se þe to bisceope bið
geset for hine, þæt he þenie on ðam halierne.
 29.31. Þu nimst þære halgunge ram &amp; syþst his flæsc
on haligre stowe.
 29.32. &amp; Aaron &amp; his suna etaþ of ðam; hig etaþ ða
hlafas on þam windle on þæs geteldes forebyrig.
 29.33. Ne ete nan utancymen of þam.
 29.34. Gif þær hwæt to lafe beo, bærn þæt on
morgen.
 29.35. Do ealle þa þingc þe ic þe bebead ofer Aaron &amp;
ofer his suna: seofon dagas þu gehalgast hyra handa.
 29.36. &amp; ðu offrast ælce dæg an cealf for synne, &amp;
þu aclænsast þæt weofod &amp; smyrest &amp; gehalgast.
 29.37. Seofon dagas þu feormast þæt weofod &amp; halgast,
&amp; hit bið haligre halig, &amp; ælc þæra þe his onrinð bið
gehalgod.
 29.38. Þu dest ælce dæg on þæt weofod twa enetre lamb,
An lamb on morgen, oþer on æfen, Teoðan dæl smedman mid gecnucedum
ele gesprengcgende &amp; win to offrungae.
 29.41. Oþer lamb þu offrast on æfen æfter þære
dægredoffrunge gewunan æt þæs geteldes dura beforan Drihtne,
þær ic gesette þæt ic spræce to ðe.
 29.44. &amp; þær ic halgie þæt geteld &amp; þæt
weofod &amp; Aaron &amp; his suna.
 29.45. &amp; ic eardige on middan Israhela bearnum Ic Drihten, þe
eow ut alædde of Egypta lande.
 31.12. DRIHTEN spræc to Moyse, &amp; cwæþ: Healdað minne
restedæg; he is tacn betwux me &amp; eow.
 31.14. Se þe hine besmit, swelte he deaðe; se ðe weorc weorce
forweorðe he.
 31.15. Syx dagas ðu wyrcst; on þam seofoðan þu rest.
 31.17. On six dagon God geworhte heofonan &amp; eorðan &amp; on
þam seofoþan he hine reste.
 31.18. He sealde Moyse twa stænene wexbreda mid Godes handa
agrafene on Sinai dune.
 32.1. ÞA ðæt folc geseah, þæt Moyses wæs to lange
uppan þam munte, &amp; nyðer ne eode, hi gegaderodon hi ealle togædere
ongean Aaron, &amp; cwædon: Aris &amp; wyrce us godas þæt faran beforan
us: we nyton hwæt Moyses gefaren hæfð, ðe us ut alædde of Egipta
lande.
 32.2. Þa cwæð Aaron to heom: Nimaþ gildene earhringas of
eower wifa earon &amp; of eowwer dohtra &amp; bringað to me.
 32.4. Þa nam he þæt gold, &amp; geat þæroff an cealf,
&amp; hi cwædon: Israhel, þis is ðin god, þe ðe ut alædde of
Egipta lande.
 32.5. Ða Aaron þæt geseah, þa timbrode he weofod beforan
him &amp; het bydelas beodan &amp; ðus cweðan: To morgen bið Drihtnes
symbeltid.
 32.6. &amp; he aras on morgen, &amp; hi brohton offrunga &amp;
gesibsume onsægednyssa, &amp; þæt folc sæt &amp; æt &amp; dranc
&amp; arison &amp; plegodon.
 32.7. Drihten spræc to Moyse: Ga nyðer; þin folc hæfð
gesyngod, þe ðu ut alæddest of Egypta lande.
 32.8. Hi bugon raðe of þam wege þe þu him tæhtest; hi
habbaþ him gegoten an gilden cealf, &amp; habbað him for god &amp;
gebiddaþ hi ðærto &amp; ofriað him; &amp; þæt Israhela folc
cweð: þis is ure god þe us ut alædde of Egypta lande.
 32.9. &amp; eft Drihten cwæð to Moyse: Ic geseo ðæt þis
folc is heardes modes.
 32.10. Læt me þæt ic hi fordo, nu hi me abolgen habbað,
&amp; ic sette þe to ealdre ofer micele ðeode &amp; mære.
 32.11. Moyses gebæd hine to Drihtne, &amp; cwæð: Drihten,
ne beo ðu yrre ongean þin folc, þeah hi agilt habban, þæt þa
Egiptiscean ne cweðon þæt ðu hi litelice ut alæddest &amp;
syððan acwealdest; Miltsa þinum folce, þeah hit gesyngod hæbbe, For
þam getreowðum þe þu Abrahame behete, þæt þu woldest his cynn
gemænifyldan swa steorran beoþ on heofonum.
 32.14. &amp; Drihtnes yrre wearð geliþegod ongean þæt
folc.
 32.15. Moyses eode þa adun of ðam munte, &amp; hæfde him on
handa twa stænene tabulan.
 32.16. Þa wæron mid Godes agenum fingre awritene.
 32.17. Ða cwæð Iosue to Moyse: Hwæt is þes hream þe
ic gehyre on þis folce swilce hit gefeoht sy?
 32.18. Ða cwæð Moyses to him: Nis se hream to gefeohte, ac
singende stefne ic gehire.
 32.19. Ða Moyses to þam fyrdwicon com, þa geseah he þæt
gyldene cealf, þe hi geworht hæfdon him to gode, &amp; þæt folc eal
singende abutan þæt cealf; þa wearp he ða tabulan of his handa,
þæt hi eal toburston.
 32.20. &amp; nam þæt gildene cealf þe hi geworht hæfdon,
&amp; forbærnde &amp; forbrytte eall to duste.
 32.21. Ða cwæð Moyses to Aarone: Hwæt hæfð þis
folc gedon?
 32.21. Hit hæfð geworht þa mæstan synne &amp; Gode þa
laþustan.
 32.22. Ða andswarode Aaron Moyse, &amp; cwæð: Hlaford, ne
belh ðu ongean me; þu canst þis folc, þæt hit eall to yfele gewend
is.
 32.23. Hi cwædon to me, þa ðu him fram wære &amp; wiþ
God spæce: Nyton we hwæt Moyses gefaren hæfð, ðe us ut alædde
of Egipta lande; And þæt folc bæd me þæt hi moston him wyrcean
godas, swa þa Egyptiscean dydon.
 32.24. Ða cwæð ic to him: Nimað eall eowwer gold &amp;
bringað to me &amp; eower wifa earhringas &amp; eowwer dohtra, &amp; hi
brohton ða heora gold to me, &amp; ic hit het wurpan on fyr &amp; wyrcean
þæroff anes cealfes gelicnysse.
 32.25. Ða geseah Moyses þæt Aaron hæfde bereafod þæt
folc æt heora golde for þam unrihte þe hi gedon hæfdon, &amp;
þæt Moyse wellicode, þæt hi æt heora golde bereafode wæron.
 32.26. Ða cwæþ Moyses to þam folce: ælc þæra þe
Godes freond sy, fylie me to dæg, þæt we magon wrecan Godes yrre on
þam mannum þe God forlæten habbaþ; ða beah eal Leuies mægð to
Moyse.
 32.27. Ða cwæþ Moyses to Leuies mægðe: Nimaþ eowre
wæpn &amp; gað forð mid me &amp; wrecað Godes yrre on þam mannum
þe hine forlæten habbað, &amp; ne sparige eowwer nan ne broþor ne suna
ne mæg, þe þæt unriht ongean God worhton.
 32.28. &amp; Leuies mægð dyde eal swa Moyses him bebead, &amp;
ofslogon on heora agenum cynne þreo &amp; twentig þusenda manna.
 32.29. Þa cwæþ Moyses to him: To dæg ge habbað Gode
gecwemed, &amp; eowre handa gehalgode, for þam þe ge eowre agene nextan
ofslogon, þe Gode abulgon.
 32.30. Æfter oþrum dæge Moyses spræc to Israhela folce,
&amp; cwæð to him: Ge syngodon þa mæstan synne ongean God, &amp; gyf
ic Drihten æniges ðinges biddan dear for eowre scylde, ic wille for eow
gebiddan.
 32.31. Þa gebæd Moyses to Drihtne, &amp; cwæð: Ic halsie
ðe, Drihten, milsa þisum folce, þeah hit gesyngod hæbbe; hi worhton
him gildene godas &amp; forletan ðe.
 32.32. Forgyf heom þa synne, &amp; gif ðu him gemiltsian nelt,
adylega me of þinre bec ðe ðu me on awrite.
 32.33. Drihten andswarode Moyse, &amp; cwæþ to him: Se þe on
me gesyngað, ic hine adylgie of minre bec.
 32.34. Ga ðu &amp; læd þis folc þider þe ic þe ær
sæde, &amp; min engel færð beforan þe, &amp; on þam ytemestan
dæge ic gewrece þa synne, þe þis folc wið me geworht hæfð.
 32.35. &amp; þis Israhelisce folc is ofslagen for ðam gylte,
þe hi worhton þæt gyldene cealf &amp; wurþodon hit for god &amp;
forleton me.
 33.1. DRIHTEN cwæþ to Moyse: Far of þisse stowe, &amp; þin
folc, to þam lande þe ic behet Abrahame &amp; Isaace &amp; Iacobe; &amp; ic
hit sylle þinum cynne.
 33.2. &amp; ic sende minne engel beforan þe &amp; adrife ut
Chananeum &amp; Amorreum &amp; Etheum &amp; Pherezeum &amp; Eueum &amp;
Iebuseum.
 33.3. &amp; þu færst on þæt land þe is wæstmbære
ægðer ge on hunige ge on meolce; ne fere ic sylf mid þe, for þan ðe
þis folc is heardheort, þe læs ic þe be wege fordo.
 33.4. Þæt folc weop ða hi þis gehyrdon, &amp; heora nan
hine ne scrydde swa heora gewuna wæs.
 33.5. Drihten cwæð to Moyse: Sege ðam folce þæt hig
synd heardheorte: æne ic fare to þe &amp; adylgie ðe: alege nu þine
glenga, þæt ic wite hu ic þe embe do.
 33.6. Þæt Israhelisce folc aledon heora glencga on Oreb dune.
 33.7. Ða het Moyses slean an geteld butan hyra wicstowe, &amp;
nemde hit Godes Geteld, &amp; þæt folc þe hæfde ænige spæce
eode ut to þam getelde.
 33.8. Ða Moyses ut eode to þam getelde, eall þæt folc aras
&amp; stodon on hyra getelda durum &amp; beheoldon Moyses oþ he inn eode to
þam getelde.
 33.9. Þonne he inn eode, þonne com genip &amp; stod æt
þære dura, &amp; God spræc wið Moyses.
 33.10. &amp; hi ealle gesawon þæt þæt genip stod æt
þæs geteldes dura, &amp; hi stodon &amp; gebædon hi æt heora getelda
durum.
 33.11. Drihten spræc wið Moyses swa mann sprycþ wið his
freond; &amp; þa he cyrde to þære wicstowe, þa gebad Iosue, Nunes
sunu, on þam getelde.
 33.12. Moyses cwæð to Drihtne: þu bytst me þæt ic
læde ut þis folc &amp; ne segst me hwæne þu mid me sendan wille,
&amp; cwyst: Ic can þe be naman &amp; þu hæfst gyfe beforan me: Gyf ic
ænige gyfe hæbbe beforan þe, ætyw me þinne ansyne, þæt ic
cunne þe &amp; hæbbe gyfe beforan þinum eagum; Sceawa þis folc.
 33.14. &amp; Drihten cwæð: Min ansyn færð beforan þe
&amp; ic sylle þe reste.
 33.15. Ða cwæð Moyses: Gif ðu sylf mid us ne færst, ne
læd ðu us of ðisse stowe.
 33.16. Be hwan magon we witan þæt we gyfe habbon beforan þe
buton þu fare mid us, þæt us ealle men wurðion þe ofer eorðan
eardiaþ?
 33.17. Drihten cwæð to Moyse: Ic do swa ðu cwæde; þu
hæfst gyfe beforan me &amp; ic can ðe be naman.
 33.18. &amp; Moyses cwæð: ætyw me þin wuldor.
 33.19. Ða andswarode he &amp; cwæð: Ic ætywe ðe ælc
god &amp; ic beo genemned, þin Drihten, &amp; ic gemiltsige þam þe ic
wille &amp; þam þe me licað.
 33.20. &amp; eft he cwæð: Ne miht ðu me geseon; ne syhð me
nan libbende man.
 33.22. Ic gescylde þe mid minre swyðran handa, þa hwile þe
ic forð ga.
 33.23. &amp; ic do mine hand aweg, &amp; þu gesixð me
æfterweardne; ne miht ðu mine ansyne geseon.
 34.1. &amp; he cwæð syððan: Wyrc þe twa stænene
tabulan þam oþrum gelice, &amp; ic write þæron ða word þe on þam
oþrum wæron þe ðu bræce.
 34.2. Beo to morgen gearu &amp; ga uppan Sinai dune &amp; stand mid
me uppon þære dune ufeweardre.
 34.3. Ne cume nan man uppan ðære dune, ne nan nyten.
 34.4. He worhte twa stænene tabulan swylce þa oþre wæron,
&amp; aras on niht &amp; eode uppan Sinai dune, swa Drihten him bebead, &amp;
bær þa tabulan mid him.
 34.5. &amp; þa Drihten eode nyðer þurh þæt genip, &amp;
Moyses stod mid him &amp; nemde Drihtnes naman.
 34.6. &amp; cwæð, þa he forþ eode: Drihten waldend,
mildheort God, arfæst &amp; geðyldig &amp; soþfæst, ðu þe
gehyltst mildheortnysse &amp; agyltst fædera unrihtwisnysse heora bearnum.
 34.8. &amp; Moyses cwæþ: Gif ic gyfe hæbbe on þinre
gesihðe, ic bidde þe, þæt þu fare mid us, for þam þis folc is
heardheort; forgyf us ure synna þæt we beon þine agene.
 34.10. Drihten him andwyrde &amp; cwæþ: Ic sylle mine tryfþe
eallum geleaffullum &amp; ic wyrce þa tacnu, þe næfre nan man ne geseah
ær on nanum lande, þæt þis folc geseo Drihtnes egeslice weorc, þe
ic wyrce betweox him.
 34.11. Heald ealle þa þincg þe ic ðe to dæg bead: ic
sylf adrife ut beforan þe Amorreum, &amp; Chananeum, &amp; Etheum, Ferezeum
&amp; Eueum &amp; Iebusseum.
 34.12. Warna þe þæt þu næfre freondrædene ne genime
wið þa landes men.
 34.13. Ac towurp heora weofodu &amp; tobrec heora anlicnyssa &amp;
forceorf heora wudas.
 34.14. Ne geeadmede þu þe to heora unrihtum godum.
 34.15. Ne nim þu nane sibbe wiþ ðæs landes menn, þe
læs þe hyra ænig þe swice; Ne et ðu of heora offrunga þe hi
offriaþ heora godum &amp; geeaðmedaþ heora hearga.
 34.16. Ne nim ðu wif of heora cynne þinum sunum, þe læs
þe hi gedon þæt þine bearn singian on heora godas, æfter þam þe
hi syngiað.
 34.17. Ne wyrc þu ðe gegotene godas.
 34.18. Ðeorfne hlaf þu scealt etan seofon dagas, swa ic þe
bebead, on niwra monþa tide; soðlice on lenctenmonþes tide ðu fore off
Egypta lande.
 34.19. Ælc frumcenned ðingc wæpnedcynnes bið min of
eallum nytenum ge of hryðerum ge of sceapum.
 34.20. Assan frumcennedne þu scealt alysan mid sceape; gyf þu
þonne wurþ for hit ne sylst, hit sceal sweltan; þinra bearna frumcenned
þu scealt alysan: ne cum ðu to minum huse idelhende.
 34.21. Wyrc six dagas &amp; freolsa þone seofoðan.
 34.23. Þriwa on geare ælc wæpnedmann sceall cuman to Godes
huse.
 34.24. &amp; ic adrife hæþene fram ðe &amp; gerime ðine
gemæro.
 34.27. Drihten cwæð to Moyse: þæt ic behet þe
freondscipe, &amp; Israhela folce.
 34.28. Moyses wæs ða mid Drihtne feowertig daga &amp;
feowertig nihta, swa he ne ætt ne ne dranc, &amp; wrat þa tyn word þe
Drihten him bebead.
 34.29. Ða Moyses nyðer eode of Sinai dune, he hæfde þa
tabulan on handa, &amp; nyste þæt he wæs gehyrned, for ðam þe he
wið God spræc.
 34.30. Aaron &amp; Israhela folc gesawon þæt Moyses wæs
gehyrned, &amp; ne dorston him neah cuman.
 34.31. Þa clypode he hi, ða cyrde Aaron &amp; þa yldestan men
to him, &amp; syþþan he wiþ hi spræc.
 34.32. Þa com eall Israhela folc to him, &amp; he bebead him
ealle þa þinc þe Drihten him bebead on Sinai dune.
 34.33. &amp; þonne he wið hig gesprecen hæfde, he heng
hrægl beforan his neb.
 35.1. MOYSES cwæþ to eallum Israhela folce: ðis synd þa
þinc þe Drihten bebead: Wyrceað six dagas &amp; freolsiaþ þone
seofoþan Gode to wurþminte; se þe wyrcþ on þam seofoþan dæge,
sy he ofslagen.
 35.3. Ne onæle ge nan fyr on þam dæge.

B8.1.4.3.
Leviticus (London, British Library, MS. Cotton Claudius B.IV): Crawford 1922, 286-303.



 1. Her ongynð seo ðridde boc, ðe is genemned on Ebreis
<foreign>Uaiccra</foreign>, &amp; <foreign>Leuiticus</foreign> on Grecisc, &amp; <foreign>Ministerialis</foreign> on Leden,
ðæt is ðenungboc on Englis, for ðan ðe ðæra sacerda ðenunga
synd ðæron awritene.
 1.1. Drihten clypode to Moyse on þære halgan wurþungstowe,
&amp; ðus cwæð: Sege Israhela bearnum: Gyf hwilc eower wille Gode
offrunga bringan of nytenum, þæt is of hryþerum &amp; of sceapum, &amp;
seo offrung be þam fullan beon sceole, þonne bringe he of hryþerum an
unwemne/ oxancealf to þære halgan stowe dura Drihten myd to gegladienne.
 1.4. &amp; sette his hand ofer þære offrunge heafod: þonne
biþ heo andfenge &amp; fremiende to his clænsunge.
 1.5. Ofrie þonne þæt cealf beforan Drihtne, &amp; Aarones
suna, þæs sacerdes, offrian þæs cealfes blod &amp; geoton embutan
þæt weofod þe is beforan þære halgan stowe dura.
 1.6. &amp; hyldon þa offrunga &amp; ceorfan to sticcon.
 1.7. &amp; don fyr innan þæt weofod uppan þam sticceom þe
ðær tosnidene beoþ, þæt heafod &amp; ealle ða þingc ðe to
þære lifre clyfiaþ.
 1.9. &amp; waxan þæt innewearde &amp; þa fet; &amp; se
sacerd forbærne ða Drihtne to leohte &amp; to wynsumum stence.
 1.10. Gyf seo offrung þonne beo of sceapon oððe of gaton,
bringe enytre offrunga &amp; unwemme.
 1.11. &amp; offrie ða beforan Drihtne æt þæs weofodes
sidan þe is on norþhealfe, &amp; geoton Aarones suna þæt blod uppan
þæt weofod ymbutan.
 1.12. &amp; todælon þa lima &amp; þæt heafod &amp; ealle
þa þingc þe on þære lifre clifiað, &amp; lecgon uppan þone wudu
þe man þæt fyr sceal under don.
 1.13. Waxan þonne þæt innewearde: &amp; se sacerd bærnþ
hit eall uppon ðam weofode to wynsumum swæcce.
 1.14. Gyf seo offrung þonne biþ of fugelum, þonne bringe he
turtlan &amp; culfran briddas, &amp; offrie se sacerd æt ðam weofode &amp;
bige þone swuran &amp; læte yrnan þæt blod nyðer andlang þæs
weofodes.
 1.16. &amp; wurpe þone cropp &amp; þa feþera wiðæftan
þæt weofod on easthealfe, on þære stowe þe man þa axan gyt.
 1.17. Ætbrede of þa feþeru, næs ne ceorfe, &amp; bærne
hi uppan þam weofode Drihtne to offrunge &amp; to wynsumum swæcce.
 2.1. Þonne man bringe offrunge Drihtne, nime smedman &amp; geote
ele on uppan &amp; stor, &amp; bringe to Aarones sunum, þæs sacerdes,
&amp; nime heora an ane handfulle smedeman &amp; eles &amp; stores, &amp; lecge
uppan þæt weofod Drihtne to wurþunga.
 2.3. &amp; þæt þær to lafe bið, þæt bið Aarones
&amp; his bearna.
 2.4. Bring clæne ofenbacene hlafas mid ele gesmyrede butan
beorman.
 2.6. Tobrec hi lytlum &amp; geote ele on uppan.
 2.11. Ne do man nanne beorman ne hunig to nanre offrunga.
 2.12. Bringað dæl þærof &amp; ne cume hit uppan þam
weofode.
 2.13. Þu scealt to ælcere offrunga.
 3.1. Gyf he hryðeru offrian wille, bringe unwemne fearr oþþe
heafare.
 3.2. &amp; setton Aarones suna heora handa uppan þære offrunga
heafod, &amp; geoton þæt blod ymbutan þæt weofod.
 3.3. &amp; bringon þone rysle, þe þa heortgesidu mid beoþ
oferwrogen, to þam weofode, &amp; eall þæt þærinne fættest sy
&amp; þa lundlagan mid hire rysle, &amp; bærnon uppan þam weofode
Drihtne to lace.
 3.6. Gif he sceap bringe, ramm oððe eowe, syn hi unwemme.
 3.7. Gyf he lamb bringe, Geoton Aarones suna his blod ymbutan
þæt weofod.
 3.9. &amp; bringon Drihtne þone rysel &amp; tægl &amp;
gelyndu.
 3.11. &amp; bærne se sacerd hit uppan þam weofode.
 3.12. &amp; gyf man gat offrige, do man on ða ylcan wisan.
 3.14. Ælc rysel sceal Drihtne to leohte.
 3.17. Ne ete ge naþer ne rysel ne blod.
 4.3. Gyf se gehalgode sacerd syngað &amp; deþ ðæt ðæt
folc syngie, offrie Drihtne unwemme cealf.
 4.4. &amp; læde hit to þæs temples dura.
 4.5. Nime þonne of þæs cealfes blode &amp; sprencge seofon
syþon on ðæs temples wahryft.
 4.13. Gyf eall Israhela folc singað þurh ungewiss, bringe an
cealf to þam temple, &amp; læde hit to ðære dura.
 4.15. &amp; setton þæs folces ealdoran hyra handa uppan his
heafod, &amp; þonne þæt cealf geoffrod sy, nime se sacerd his blod,
&amp; dyppe his finger þæron &amp; sprenge seofon syðon on þæt
wahrift.
 4.18. &amp; smite of ðam sylfan blode on þæs weofodes
hyrnan, &amp; geote þæt þær to lafe bið æt ðam weofode
nyðan.
 4.19. &amp; bærne þone rysel uppan þam weofode.
 4.20. &amp; gebidde se sacerd for hi.
 4.21. &amp; forbærne þæt cealf butan ðære wicstowe.
 4.22. Gyf se ealdor syngað, bringe anne buccan to bote.
 4.27. Gyf folces man syngað þurh nytennysse &amp; his gilt
undergyt, bringe ane gat to bote to ðam temole.
 5.1. Gyf man wat þæt oðer man sweraþ, he bið scyldig gyf
he hit forhylð.
 5.4. Se man þe swerað man &amp; eft his gilt ongyt bringe an
cylferlamb to bote, oþþe gat, for hine &amp; for his synne.
 5.7. &amp; gyf he nyten næbbe, bringe twa turtlan oððe
twegen culfran briddas, ænne for þære synne, oþerne to offrunga.
 5.11. Gyf he næbbe turtlan ne culfran, bringe melu.
 6.19. Drihten spræc to Moyse, &amp; þus cwæþ: Beod Aarone
&amp; his sunum þæt hi bringon Drihtne to offrunge, on ðam dæge þe
hi man smyrað &amp; halgað, melues ðone teoðan dæl þæs gemetes,
ðe man nemneð ephi, healf ær undern, healf efer undern; þa sceolon
beon elebacene &amp; wearme.
 6.23. Ne ete nan man of þæra sacerda offrunga, ac forbærne
hi man ealle.
 6.24. Drihten spræc to Moyse, &amp; þus cwæþ: Ne ete nan
man of ðære offrunga þe man Drihtne bringþ butan þa sacerdas &amp;
heora cynn.
 7.17. &amp; Gyf þær hwæt to lafe biþ ofer twegen dagas,
forbærne hit man þæs ðriddan dæges.
 7.25. Gyf hwa þæt smeru oþþe þæt blod ytt, þe bið
Gode geoffrad, he sceal forwurðan.
 7.31. Se swyðra boh &amp; þa rib sceolon beon Aarones &amp; his
sunena of ðære offrunga þe man for gesibsumnysse offrað.
 8.1. Drihten spræc to Moyse, &amp; þus cwæþ: Nim Aaron
&amp; his suna &amp; heora reaf &amp; smyringele &amp; an cealf for synne &amp;
twegen rammas &amp; þeorfe hlafas.
 8.3. &amp; gadera eall folc to ðæs temples dura.
 8.4. Moyses dyde swa Drihten him bebead, &amp; cwæþ to þam
folce: þis Drihten bebead.
 8.6. He þwoh ða Aaron &amp; his suna.
 8.7. &amp; scrydde ðone bisceop mid linenum reafe &amp; gyrde
hine &amp; dyde ymbe hine blæhæwene tunecan &amp; lede eaxclað ofer
hine.
 8.8. &amp; band to ðam rationale, on ðam wæs awriten Lar
&amp; Soþfæstnys.
 8.9. &amp; band his heafod mid claðe &amp; mid gehalgodan

 8.10. &amp; he nam ðone smyringcele, &amp; smyrode ða halgan
stowe &amp; ðæt weofod &amp; ealle heora fatu &amp; halgode ðæt
arfæt.
 8.12. &amp; he geat ele uppan Aarones heafod &amp; smyrode hine
&amp; gehalgode.
 8.13. &amp; he scridde his suna midd &amp; gyrde hi &amp; hufode,
swa Drihten bebead.
 8.14. &amp; brohte an cealf for synne, &amp; Aaron &amp; his suna
setton heora handa uppan his heafod, &amp; offrodon hit &amp; smyrodon þæs
weofodes hyrnan mid ðam blode, &amp; guton ðæt þær to lafe wæs
under ðæt weofod.
 8.16. &amp; bærndon ðone rysle &amp; þa lundlagan uppan
ðam weofode.
 8.17. &amp; ðæt cealf hi bærndon butan ðære wicstowe
mid felle &amp; mid flæsce, swa Drihten him bebead.
 8.18. Hi offrodon anne ramm, &amp; guton his blod ymbutan ðæt
weofod.
 8.20. &amp; curfon ðone ram eall to sticceon.
 8.21. &amp; forbærndon uppan þam weofode, for ðan ðe he
wæs Drihtnes offrung.
 8.22. Ða Moyses ðone ramm offrode, he æthran mid ðam blode
Aarones swyðre eare &amp; his swyðran ðuman &amp; ðæs wynstran fotes
miclan tan.
 8.24. Ða he ðus gedon hæfde, he geat ðæt blod uppan
ðæt weofod, þe ðær to lafe wæs.
 8.25. Ðone tægl &amp; eall ðæt smeru &amp; twegen
lundlagan mid gelyndum, Hi forbærndon uppan ðam weofode.
 8.31. &amp; ða he hi ðus gehalgod hæfde, ða cwæð he:
Seoðað eowwerne mete beforan ðæs temples dura &amp; etað þær
þa/, swa Drihten bebead, &amp; ðus cwæð: Ete Aaron &amp; his suna.
 8.32. &amp; swa hwæt swa ðær to lafe beo, oððe of
flæsce oððe of hlafe, forbærne man þæt.
 8.33. Ne fare ge seofon dagon of ðære stowe durum.
 8.35. Ac healdað ðær wearde dæges &amp; nihtes, swa
Drihten bebead.
 8.36. Aaron &amp; his suna dydon ealle ða þingc, ðe Drihten
him bebead þurh Moysen.
 9.1. Æfter seofon dagum, Moyses clypode Aaron &amp; his suna
&amp; þa betstborenan of Israhela folce, &amp; cwæð to him: Offriað an
cealf &amp; anne ram for synne, ægðer unwemme.
 9.3. &amp; beodað Israhela folce, þæt hi offrion for synne
buccan &amp; cealf &amp; lamb, ælc anwintre &amp; unwemme; &amp; for
sibsumnesse oxan &amp; ramm: to dæg Drihten ætywð.
 9.5. Hi namon þa ealle ða ðingc ðe Moyses him bebead, &amp;
brohton to ðæs temples dura.
 9.6. &amp; Moyses cwæð to þam folce: Wyrceað þæt
Drihten eow bebead, &amp; Drihten eow ætywð.
 9.23. Ða Aaron geofrod hæfde &amp; ðæt folc gebletsod,
swa Moyses him bebead, ða eode he nyðer; ða ætywde Godes wuldor eallum
þam folce.
 9.24. &amp; com fyr of Gode &amp; forbærnde ealle ða ofrunga
þe uppan þam weofode wæron; &amp; ða þæt folc þæt geseah,
þa feollon hi nyðer &amp; heredon Drihten.
 10.1. ÞA namon Aarones suna, Nadab &amp; Abiud, heora storcyllan,
&amp; onældon þæron unhalgod fyr, ðæt him forboden wæs, beforan
Gode.
 10.2. &amp; fyr com þærrihte &amp; forbærnde hi to
deaðe.
 10.3. Þa swugode Aaron &amp; wæs sarig.
 10.4. Ða bead Moyses Missabele &amp; Elifafan, Aczicheles sunum,
Aarones fæderan, ðæt hi namon heora maga lic &amp; bæron butan
wicstowe.
 10.5. &amp; hi eodon sona &amp; bæron hi aweg &amp; wurpon hi
ut, swa him beboden wæs.
 10.6. Moyses cwæð to Aarone &amp; to Eleazare &amp; to
Iðamare, his sunon: Forlætað eowre hreowsunga, ðe læs ge habbon
Godes yrre.
 10.8. Drihten spræc to Aarone &amp; to his sunum: Ne drince ge
nan ðingc ðæs ðe man mæg druncen of beon ðonne ge gan in to
ðære halgan stowe, ðe læs ge swylton.
 11.1. Drihten spræc to Moyse &amp; to Aarone: Secgað Israhela
bearnum, ðæt hi eton þa nytenu ðe heora clawa todælede beoð &amp;
ceowað.
 11.4. Ne ete ge þa ðingc ðe ceowað &amp; clawa ne
todælað, swa olfend.
 11.6. Hara &amp; swyn synd forbodene to æthrinene.
 11.9. Ne ete ge nanne fisc, buton ða þe habbað finnas &amp;
scylla.
 11.12. Ða oþre synd unclæne.
 11.13. Ne ete ge nan ðingc hafoccynnes ne earncynnes, Ne ulan, ne
nan þingc hrefncynnes.
 18.16. Ne hæme nan man wið his magan, Ne wiþ his mæges
wif.
 18.30. Healdað mine bebodu; ne do ge nan dingc ðe ða dydon,
þe beforan eow wæron, ðe læs ge beon besmitene: ic eom Drihten eower
God.
 19.3. Arwurðiað eowerne fæder &amp; eowre modor, &amp;
healdað mine fæstendagas.
 19.11. Ne stel ðu, ne leoh ðu, ne beswic ðu ðinne nextan.
 19.12. Ne swera ðu man on minum naman: ic eom Drihten.
 19.13. Ne bysmra ðu ðinne mæg; nafa ðu ane niht
unforgolden þæs weorc ðe ðe wyrce.
 19.14. Ne wyrie ðu deafe; ne scremme ðu blinde; ondræd
ðinne God.
 19.15. Ne dem nan unriht; ne forseoh ðu ðearfan; ne arwurða
þone rican; deme rihte ðinum nextan.
 19.16. Ne beo ðu sacful.
 19.17. Ne hata ðu þinne nextan on þinre heortan ac þrea
hine openlice.
 19.18. Ne tyn ðu þine neahgeburas; lufa þinne freond swa ðe
sylfne: ic eom Drihten.
 19.19. Healdað mine æ; ne do ðu þæt nytenu hæmon mid
oþres cynnes nytenum: ne saw ðu ðinne æcer mid gemengdum sæde.
 19.23. Ne ete ge þæra treowa bleda ðe ge plantiað, ær
ðam fiftan geare.
 19.26. Ne ete ge blod, ne ne gyman hwata ne swefna.
 19.27. Ne ge eow ne efesion, ne beard ne sceron.
 19.29. Ne læt ðu þine dohtor beon myltestre, þe læs
ðin land sy mid mane gefylled.
 19.31. Ne gym ðu drycræfta ne galdra.
 19.32. Arwurðe ealdne man &amp; ondræd þe ðinne God.
 19.33. Ne hyrwe ge utancymene man, ac si he gemang eow swa
inlendisc, &amp; lufiað hine swa eow sylfe, for ðam ðe ge wæron
utacymene on Egypta lande.
 19.35. Habbað rihtne anmittan, &amp; emne wæga &amp; emne
gemetu &amp; sestras: ic eom Drihten, eower God, þe eow ælædde of
Egypta lande.
 19.37. Healdað mine bebodu &amp; mine domas.
 20.2. Gyf ænig man gelyfe on Moloches hearh, swelte he deaðe;
hæne hine man mid stanum.
 20.9. Gyf hwa wirigð his fæder &amp; his modor, he sceal
sweltan.
 20.27. Se man þe bega wiccecræft, swelte he deaðe.
 23.1. Drihten spræc to Moyse, &amp; ðus cwæð: Sege
Israhela folce; þis synd ða dagas, ðe ge sceolon Drihtne halgian &amp;
wurðian.
 23.5. On ðam feowerteoðan dæge þes forman monðes on
æfen bið Drihtnes færeld.
 23.10. &amp; ðonne ge in cumað on þæt land þe ic eow
sylle, ne ripe ge to clæne, ne ge ne gaderian ða ear þe bæfton eow
beoð, ac lætað ðearfan &amp; utancymene hi lesan.
 24.10. Sum Egyptisc man gestrynde sunu be Israheliscon wife onmang
Israhela folce; þa flat he wið anne Israheliscne man, &amp; hyrwde Godes
naman &amp; wirigde hine; þa lædde hine man to Moyse His modor hatte
Salomith, Dabrius dohtor, of Danes cynne, &amp; hig dydon hine on cweartern,
oð hi wiston hwæt Drihten be him tæhte.
 24.13. Ða cwæð Drihten to Moyse: Læd ut þone hyruwend
wiðutan þa wicstowe, &amp; setton ealle ða þe his word gehyrdon heora
handa uppan his heafod, &amp; oftorfie eall ðæt folc hine: &amp; cweð to
Israhela folce: Se mann ðe wyrigð Drihtnes naman, swelte he deaðe.
 24.17. Se ðe man ofslyhð oþþe gewundað, he sceal
sweltan.
 24.18. Se ðe orf ofslyhð, gilde heafod wið heafde.
 24.19. Gif neahgebur wið oþerne agylte, do him man ðæt
ylce ðæt he ðam oðrum dyde.
 24.20. Gylde eage mid eagan &amp; toð mid teð, si he landes
man, sy he utlendisc.
 24.23. Israhela bearn dydon swa Drihten Moyse bebead.
 25.1. Drihten spræc to Moyse on Synai dune, &amp; cwæð:
Sprec to Israhela folce ðas word; þonne ge inn cumað on ðæt land
þe ic eow sylle, freolsiað Drihtnes restendæg.
 25.3. Syx gear ðu scealt sawan &amp; wyrcean ðinne wingeard
&amp; gaderian heora wæstmas.
 25.4. Ðæt seofoðe gear ðæt land bið freoh þurh
Drihtnes gyfe; ne saw ðu þonne, ne ne rip, ne ðinne wingeard ne wyrc.
 25.5. Ne heora wæstmas ne gadera þonne hi weaxað sylfwilles,
for þam ðe hit bið restengear.
 25.10. &amp; þæt fifteoðe gear bið halig &amp;
forgyfenesse gear; on ðam forgyfennysse geare man sceall freogean ælcne
ðeowan, butan he fram his halforde nelle.
 25.11. Gyf he þonne fram his hlaforde nelle, læde man hine to
þæs temples dura, &amp; þyrlie his eare mid anum æle, &amp; beo he
æfre syððan ðeow.
 25.17. Ne swenceað eowre magas: ondrædað eowerne Drihten,
eowerne God.
 25.18. Healdað mine bebodu &amp; mine domas, ðæt ge libbon
eower lif butan ælcere sorhge.
 25.20. Gyf hwa þonne cwyð: Hwæt ete we on þam seofoðan
geare, gyf we ne sawað ne ne gaderiað ure wæstmas?
 25.21. Ic eow sylle mine bletsunga, ðæt an gear bringð
ðreora geara wæstmas.
 25.22. Sawað on þam eahtoðan geare, &amp; etað ealde
wæstmas of ðæt nygoðe gear &amp; of niwe cumað.
 25.23. Ne sylle ge ðæt land on ece yrfe, for þam ðe hit is
min, &amp; ge syndon utancymene &amp; mine tilian.
 25.25. Gyf ðin wanspediga mæg beo mid ðe, ne nim ðu na
mare æt him to hyre ðonne ðu sealdest.
 25.37. Ne syle ðu ðin feoh to hyre.
 25.39. Þeah ðin nexta for his yrmðe gange on ðeowet, nafa
ðu hine for wealh ac for medgyldan.
 25.42. Hi synd mine ðeowas &amp; ic hi gelædde of Egypta
lande.
 25.44. Nabbon ge wealas ne wylna of eowrum cynne, ac of ðam
ðeodum ðe eow abuton synd, &amp; of utancymenum.
 25.55. Israhela bearn synd mine ðeowan, ðe ic ut alædde of
Egypta lande.
 26.1. IC eom Drihten eowwer God; Ne wyrce ge eow hearga ne agrafene
godas: ic eom Drihten.
 26.3. Gyf ge healdað mine beboda, ic eow sylle fulle wæstmas
&amp; ge etað to fylle &amp; ge eardiað butan ege on eowrum lande.
 26.6. &amp; ic sylle sibbe on eowrum gemærum &amp; ge beoð
butan brogan; ic afyrre yfele wildeor &amp; gewin fram eow.
 26.7. Ge feohtað wið eowre fynd &amp; hi hreosað beforan
eow.
 26.8. Fif eowre fliað heora hundteontig, &amp; hundteontig eowre
fliað/ heora tyn ðusenda; eowre fynd feallað beforan eow.
 26.9. Ic eow geseo, &amp; do ðæt ge weaxað; &amp; ge beoð
gemænifylde, &amp; ic fæstnie min wed mid eow.
 26.10. Ge etað ealde mettas oð eow niwe cumon.
 26.11. Ic sette mine halgan stowe tomiddes eowre, &amp; ne awurpe
ic eow.
 26.12. Ac ic ga betwux eow, &amp; ic beo eower God &amp; ge beoð
min folc.
 26.13. Ic eom Drihten eower Godd, ðe eow ut alædde of Egypta
lande, ðæt ge me ðeowodon; &amp; ic eom se ðe tobræc ða racyntan
ymbutan eowrum swuran &amp; alysde eow.
 26.14. Gyf ge me ne gehyrað &amp; mine bebodu forhogiaþ, &amp;
mine æ &amp; mine domas forseoð, &amp; ne doð min wedd for naht, ic gedo
eow ðas ðingc: ic sende hrædlice fyr &amp; gewyrce eow to wædlan; on
idel ge swincað &amp; eowre fynd his brucað.
 26.17. Ic wiðstande ongean eow, &amp; ge feallað beforan eowrum
feondum &amp; ge hyrað ðam ðe eow hatiaþ; ge fleoð þeah eow man ne
drife.
 26.18. Ic eow do seofonfealdne ege.
 26.19. &amp; ic forbrece eowre ofermodignysse heardnysse, &amp; ic
gedo ðæt eow bið ægðer heard ge heofone ge eorðe.
 26.20. &amp; eall eowre geswinc beoð idele; ne bringð seo
eorðe eow nane wæstmas.
 26.22. &amp; ic sende on eow wildeor, þæt forspillon eow &amp;
eowre nytenu.
 26.23. Gyf ge nellað onfon mine lare, &amp; gað ongean me, ic
ga ongen eow &amp; slea eow.
 26.25. &amp; þonne ge fleoð fram byrig to byrig, ic sende
cwealm on eow, &amp; hungor, swa ðæt fif bacað on anum ofne, &amp; ge
etað hlaf be gewihte &amp; ge ne beoð fulle.
 26.28. &amp; ic witnige eow seofon witon, swa ðæt ge etað
eowre suna &amp; eowre dohtra flæsc.
 26.30. &amp; ic towurpe eowre heagan getimbru, &amp; eowre hearga
ic tobrece, &amp; ge feallað betwux eowrum deofolgyldum &amp; ic onscunige
eow, swa ðæt ic do eowre burga weste &amp; eowra stowe, &amp; ic fordo
eow, &amp; eowre fynd wafiað eower.
 26.33. Ic todrife eow, &amp; þæt land lið on reste, for
ðan ðe hit ne reste ða hwile ðe ge ðæron wunodon.
 26.36. &amp; ða þe þær to lafe beoð, ða beoð on swa
miclum ege, þæt hi fleoð leafes sweg swylce hit swurd sy; hi feallað,
þeah hi nan man ne slea, &amp; fleoð, ðeah him nan man wið ne feohte.
 26.39. &amp; for eowrum agenum gilte ge beoð geswencte, oð
ðæt ge andettan eowre synna &amp; eower yldrena, mid ðam hi me gremedon
&amp; eodon ongen me.
 26.41. &amp; ic ga ongean eow, &amp; læde eow on feonda land,
oþ eower lyðre mod ablysige; ðonne gebidde ge for eowrum arleasnyssum.
 26.42. &amp; ic gime min wedd, ðe ic behet Abrahame &amp; Isaace
&amp; Iacobe.
 26.43. Ic gyme ðæs landes, þonne ge hit forlætað; hit
licað me, þeah hit weste sy.
 26.44. Ic eom Drihten eower God, ðe eow ut alædde of Egypta
lande beforan ealles folces gesyhðe; ðis synd ða bebodu &amp; domas &amp;
laga, ðe Drihten gesette betwux him &amp; Israhela folce on Sinai dune.

Num
B8.1.4.4.
Numbers (London, British Library, MS. Cotton Claudius B.IV): Crawford 1922, 304-32.



 0.1. Her ongynð seo boc, ðe is genemned on Ebreisc <foreign>Valedaber</foreign>,
ðæt is on Leden <foreign>Numerus</foreign>, and on Englisc Getel, for ðan ðe Israhela
bearn wæron on ðære getealde.
 1.1. DRIHTEN spræc witodlice to Moyse on Sinai dune, on
ðære halgan stowe, on ðam forman dæge ðæs æftran monðes, on
þam oðrum geare, þe hi foron of Egypta lande.
 1.1. Nim &amp; telle Israhela folc, swa hwæt swa wæpnedhades
sy: Fram twentigum wintrum &amp; ofer ðæt, ealle ða strengeston of
Israhela folce, telle ðu &amp; Aaron heapmælum.
 1.4. &amp; ðæra mægða ealdras beoð mid inc mid heora
hiredum, ðe ðis synd heora naman: of Rubene, Elisur, Sedeures sunu.
 1.6. Of Simeon, Salamiel Surisaddais sunu.
 1.7. Of Iuda, Naason Aminadabis sunu; of Isachar, Nathanael Suares
sunu; of Zabulon, Eliab Elonis sunu; Iosepes bearna of Efraim, Elisama Amiiudes
sunu; on Mannase, Gamaliel Phadasures sunu; of Beniamin, Abidan Gedeonis sunu;
of Dan, Abiezer Amisadaies sunu; of Aser, Pheziel Ochranes sunu; of Gad,
Eliazapha Dueles sunu; of Neptalim, Ahyra Enananys sunu.
 1.16. Ðis synd ða, ðe wæron ða æðelostan ealdras
geond ða scira, &amp; Israhela heafodmenn.
 1.17. Moyses &amp; Aaron gegaderodon ealle ðas on ðam forman
dæge ðæs æftran monðes, &amp; demdon him, swa Drihten bebead
Moyse, &amp; hi man tealde on Sinai westene.
 1.45. Ðus fela wæs ðæra manna, ðe Moyses &amp; Aaron
&amp; ða <foreign>xii</foreign> Israhela ealdras getealdon fram twentigum wintrum &amp; bufan
þam, þæra ðe to gefeohte faran mihton, sixhund ðusenda &amp; ðreo
ðusenda &amp; fifhundred &amp; fiftig.
 1.47. Þa sacerdas mid heora hirede næron getealde mid him, for
ðan ðe Drihten bebead Moyse: Ne telle ðu Leuies mægðe; ne sete ðu
hi mid Israhela folce, ac sete hi to ðære halgan stowe &amp; to ðam
ðingon ðe ðærto belimpað.
 1.54. Israhela bearn dydon neah eallon ðingon þe Drihten bebead
ðurh Moysen.
 2.32. &amp; EALLES heora heres wæs, ða he todæled wæs,
fifhund ðusenda &amp; þreo &amp; hundeahtatig ðusenda &amp; fif hundredo
&amp; fiftig.
 2.34. Hig foron flocmælum mid heora hiredum.
 3.2. ÐIS synd Aarones bearna naman, þe to sacerdum gehalgode
wæron: Nadab his frumcenneda sunu &amp; Abiud &amp; Eleazar &amp; Iðamar.
 3.4. Nadab &amp; Abiud wurdon deade, þa hi brohton þæt
ungehalgode fyr beforan Drihtnes gesihðe on Sinai westene, butan bearnum;
Eleazar &amp; Iðamar brucon sacerdhades beforan heora fæder Aarone.
 3.5. Drihten spræc to Moyse, &amp; cwæð: Nim Leuies
mægðe &amp; sete hi under Aarone, ðæt hi ðenion him &amp; healdon
&amp; begymon ðæra ðinga ðe to ðære halgan eardungstowe
belimpað.
 3.9. Beon hi ðenas under Aarone &amp; his sunum.
 3.10. Gesete Aaron &amp; his suna to sacerdum: gyf hwylc utacymen
man begynne to ðenigenne, swelte he deaðe.
 3.12. Ic nam Leuies cynn æt Israhela folce for ðam ælc
frumcenned, &amp; hi synd mine ðenas.
 3.13. Min bið ælc frumcenned, syððan ic sloh ða
frumcennedan on Egypta lande, ægðer ge on mannum ge on nytenum.
 3.14. Drihten cwæð to Moyse on Sinai westene: Tele ælcne
wæpnedman on Leuies mægðe fram anum monðe &amp; bufan ðam.
 3.16. Moyses ða tealde, swa Drihten him bebead.
 3.17. Leuies ðry suna: Gerson &amp; Caath &amp; Merari.
 3.21. Gersones hiredes wæron seofon ðusenda &amp; fif
hundrydu, þa heoldon ða halgan eardungstowe on westhealfe.
 3.27. Caathes hiredes wæron eahta ðusenda &amp; six hundrydu
þa heoldon ða halgan eardungstowe on suþhealfe.
 3.33. Meraries hiredes wæron six þusend &amp; twa hundrydu
þa heoldon þa halgan stowe on norðhealfe.
 3.38. Moyses &amp; Aaron &amp; heora bearn gymdon ðæs temples
on middan Israhela folce.
 3.39. Þa Moyses &amp; Aaron þa Leuite geteald hæfdon, eal
swa Drihten him bebead, þa wæron heora twa &amp; twentig ðusenda.
 6.22. DRIHTEN spræc to Moyse, &amp; cwæð: Sprec to Aarone
&amp; to his sunum: þonne ge bletsion Israhela folc, cweðað þus:
Gebletsie eow God &amp; gehealde eow, &amp; ætywe eow Drihten his ansyne
&amp; gemiltsie eow; &amp; gewende Drihten his andwlitan to eow &amp; sylle eow
sibbe.
 6.27. Clipion minne naman &amp; ic bletsie hi.
 8.20. ISRAHELA bearn dydon neah ðam ðe Drihten him bebead
þurh Moysen.
 10.28. ÐA hi ut foron of Egypta lande, swa him God wissode, ða
cwæð Moyses to Iobabe his mæge, Ragueles suna þam Madianitiscean: We
willað faran to ðam lande, þe God us syllan wile: far mid us, ðæt we
ðe weligne gedon, for ðan ðe Drihten behet god Israhela folce.
 10.30. He andswarode, &amp; cwæð: Ne fare ic mid eow, ac ic
gewende to minum earde þær ic geboren wæs, ða cwæð Moyses: Ne
forlæt ðu us; þu canst wegas geond þæt westen; ac beo ure ladman.
 10.32. &amp; þonne ðu mid us cymst, we þe syllað swa
hwæt swa ðær selost bið of þam æhtum ðe Drihten us sylð.
 10.33. Hi foron of Drihtnes munte þreora daga færeld, &amp;
Drihtnes earc for beforan him ðry dagas sceawiende þa wicstowe.
 10.34. Drihtnes genip for ofer hi on dæg, þonne hi foron.
 10.35. Ðonne seo earc wæs up ahafen, ðonne cwæþ Moyses:
Aris, Drihten, &amp; todrif þine fynd, þæt ða fleon fram þinre
ansyne, þe þe hatedon.
 10.36. &amp; þonne heo aset wæs, he cwæþ: Gewend Drihten
to Israhela folce.
 11.1. GEMANG ðam aras micel murcnung on ðam folce ongean
Drihten, &amp; hi wæron sarie for heora geswince; þa he þæt gehyrde,
ða wearð he yrre, &amp; Drihtnes fyr wearð onæled &amp; forbærnde
þone ytemestan dæl þæs folces.
 11.2. Þa clypode þæt folc to Moyse, &amp; Moyses gebæd to
Drihtne, &amp; þæt fyr geswac.
 11.3. &amp; he nemde þære stowe naman, Onal, for þan þe
Drihtnes fyr wæs ðær onæled ongean þæt folc.
 11.4. Ðæt gemengede folc wearð gefylled mid gyfernysse,
&amp; sæton &amp; weopon mid Israhela folce, &amp; cwædon: Hwa sylð us
flæsc to etanne?
 11.5. We gemunon hu fela fixa we hæfdon to gyfe on Egypta lande,
&amp; we hæfdon cucumeres, þæt sind eorðæpla, &amp; pepones &amp;
porleac &amp; enneleac &amp; manega oþre þingc.
 11.6. Nu we synd hlæne; nabbe we nan þincg to etene butan
man.
 11.7. Swa hi heton þone heofonlican mete þe hi God mid fedde;
þæt wæs swilce coriandran sæd, hwites bleos swa cristalla.
 11.8. Þæt hi gaderodon &amp; grundon on cwyrne oððe
brytton &amp; sudon on croccan &amp; worhton hlafas ðærof: þa wæron
swylce hi wæron elebacene.
 11.9. Þonne ðæt deaw com on niht, ðonne com ðærmid se
heofonlica mete þe hi man heton.
 11.10. Moyses gehyrde ðæt ðæt folc weop, ælc æt his
geteldes dura, &amp; Godes yrre astah swyðe, &amp; hit ðuhte Moyse swyðe
hefityme.
 11.11. &amp; he cwæð to Drihtne: Hwi geswenctest ðu þinne
ðeow; Hwi nabbe ic nane gyfe beforan ðe, &amp; hwi settest ðu þises
folces swarnysse uppan me?
 11.12. Cwyst ðu, geeacnode ic hi ealle oþþe acende ic hi,
þæt ðu me bude þæt ic hi bære on minum bosme, swa fostormodor
deð cild, &amp; þæt ic bære on þæt land, þe ðu hyra
fæderum foreswore?
 11.13. Hwanan sceolde me cuman flæsc, ðæt ic sylle ðison
folce; Hi wepað ongean me, &amp; cweðað: Syle us flæsc to etanne.
 11.14. Ne mæg ic ana acuman eall þis folc; hit is me swyðe
hefig.
 11.15. Butan ðu elles wylle, ic bidde ðe ðæt ðu me
ofslea &amp; ic hæbbe gyfe beforan ðe, þæt ic ne sy mid swa miclum
yfele geswenct.
 11.16. Drihten cwæð to Moyse: Geceos me hundseofontig manna of
Israhela folces, ealdrum ðe ðu wite þæt synd staðolfæste &amp;
lareowas, &amp; læd hi to ðære eardungstowe dura, þæt hi standon
ðær mid ðe, Oð þæt ic nyðer astige &amp; wið ðe sprece;
&amp; ic nime of ðinum gaste &amp; sylle him, &amp; hi underfoð þis folc
mid ðe, þæt ðu ne sy ana gehefegod.
 11.18. Sege þam folce: Beoð geheorte; to merigen ge etað
flæsc, for ðan ðe ge weopon beforan me &amp; hi cwædon: Hwa sylð us
flæsc; Wel us wæs on Egypta lande; Drihten eow sylð flæsc &amp; ge
etað Næs to anum dæge, ne to twam, ne to fifon, ne to tynon, ne to
twentigum, ac fulne monað, oð hit gæð ðurh eowre næsðyrlu &amp;
si gewend to wlættan, for ðam ðe ge gremedon Drihten &amp; weopon
beforan him &amp; cwædon: Hwi foron we ut of Egypta lande?
 11.21. Moyses cwæð to Drihtne: þises folces is sixhund
þusend gangendra manna, &amp; þu segst: Ic sylle him flæsc fulne
monað.
 11.22. Cwyst ðu, bið sceapa oððe hryðera swa fela
ofslagen, þæt hi genoh habbon, oððe beoð ealle sæfixas gegaderod
tosomne, þæt hi gefyllon þis folc?
 11.23. Drihten him andswarode, &amp; cwæð: Cwyst ðu, is
Drihtnes hand unmihtig; Nu rihte ðu gesyhst hwæðer min word beo mid
weorce gefylled.
 11.24. Moyses com &amp; rehte ðam folce Godes word; he gegaderode
hundseofontig manna of Israhela folce; ða he let standan ymbeutan ða
eardungstowe.
 11.25. Drihten astah nyðer þurh genip, &amp; spræc to him,
&amp; nam of ðam gaste ðe wæs on Moyse, &amp; sealde ðam
hundseofontigum mannum; ða se gast gereste on him, hi witegodon &amp;
syððan ne geswicon.
 11.26. Ða belifon twegen men on ðam wicstowum; ðæra oðer
hatte Eldad &amp; oþer Meldad; ofer ða se gast gereste; hi wæron
awritene &amp; ne eodon ut to ðære eardungstowe.
 11.27. Ða hi witegodon on wicstowe, ða arn an cnapa, &amp;
cwæð to Moyse: Eldad &amp; Meldad witegiað on wicstowum.
 11.28. &amp; Iosue, Nunes sunu, cwæð: Hlaford min Moyses,
forbeod him þæt.
 11.29. Ða cwæð Moyses: Ne ofðince ðe ðæt Drihten
sylle his gyfe ðam ðe he wille.
 11.30. Moyses &amp; Israheles folces ealdras cyrdon to ðam
wicstowum.
 11.31. Wind com fram Drihtne &amp; brohte ofer sæ ða fugelas,
ðe man <foreign>coturnices</foreign> hateð, &amp; sende on ða wicstowa, swa feorr swa man
on anum dæge gefaran mæg, on ælce healfe ymbeutan ða wicstowa; hi
flugon on twegra elna heahnysse bufan eorðan.
 11.32. Ða aras ðæt folc &amp; gaderode ealne dæg &amp;
ealle ða niht micle mænigeo ðæra fugela; se ðe lytel gegaderode, he
hæfde tyn gemetu ðæs gemetes, ðe hi <foreign>chorus</foreign> hatað, &amp; hi
behwurfon hi buton ðære wicstowe.
 11.33. Þa gyt wæs flæsc on heora toðum; ne ateorode him
ðyllic mete; ða wearð Drihten yrre, &amp; sloh ðæt folc mid swyðe
miclum wite.
 11.34. &amp; hi genemdon ða stowe Gewylnunga Byrgena, ðær hi
byrigdon ðæt folc; &amp; hi foron ðanon &amp; wunedon on Asteroth.
 12.1. MARIA &amp; Aaron ciddon wið Moyses for his Sigelhearwenan
wife, &amp; cwædon: Segst ðu, spræc Drihten wið Moyses anne; ne
spræc he eac wið us; ða Drihten ðæt gehyrde, ða yrsode he
swyðe.
 12.3. Moyses soðlice wæs se bylewitesta man ofer ealle men
ðe on eorðan wunedon.
 12.4. &amp; he cwæð to him &amp; to Aarone &amp; to Marian:
Gað ut ge ðreo to ðære eardungstowe; þa hi wæron ut agane,
Drihten astah nyðer on genipe &amp; stod on ðære stowe dura &amp;
clypode Aaron &amp; Marian; ða hi eodon, ða cwæð he to him: Gyf hwylc
man of eow bið Drihtnes witega, ic him æteowe on gesyhðe oððe ðurh
swefen ic sprece to him.
 12.7. Nis nan man Moyses gelica, mines ðeowan, on minum huse, se
is me ealra getreowost.
 12.8. Ic sprece to him muðe to muðe &amp; openlice, næs
ðurh rædelsas ne ðurh hiwwinge: ondræde ge eow ðæt ge ciddon
wið Moyses, minne ðeow.
 12.9. &amp; he gewat yrre ongean hi, &amp; ðæt genip geswac.
 12.10. Ða ætywde hrædlice on Marian scinende hreofnys swa
hwit swa snaw; ða Aaron hi beheold, &amp; geseah ðæt hire lichama wæs
afylled mid hreoflan, ða cwæð he to Moyse: Ic bidde ðe, hlaford min,
ðæt ðu ne asette on unc ðas synne, þeah wit dyslice dydon, ðæt
Maria, uncer swustor, ne forwurðe; nu is healf hire lichama mid hreofnysse
fornumen.
 12.13. Moyses ða clypode to Drihtne, &amp; cwæð: Drihten
God, ic bidde ðe, hæl hi.
 12.14. Drihten him andswarode, &amp; cwæþ: Gyf hyre fæder
spigette on hyre nebb, hu ne sceolde hyre huru þinga sceamian <foreign>vii</foreign> dagas;
Beo heo asyndrod <foreign>vii</foreign> dagas fram oðrum mannum, &amp; clypie hi man
syððan ongean.
 12.15. Maria wæs belocen <foreign>vii</foreign> dagas butan ðære wicstowe,
&amp; ðæt folc ne styrode na hwider, ær þam þe Maria wearð hal
geworden.
 13.1. ÆFTER ðam ðe Moyses, se mæra heretoga, mid Israhela
folce, swa swa him God bebead, ofer ða Readan Sæ ferde, &amp; Farao
adrenced wæs, &amp; syððan se ælmihtiga God him æ geset hæfde,
ða ða seo fyrd com to Pharan ðam westene, ða cwæð se heofonlica
God to ðam halgan Moyse: Ceos ðe nu men þæt magon sceawian ðone eard
Chanaan landes, ðe ic Israhela folce forgyfan wille to heora gewealde, &amp;
asend twelf heafodmen of ðam twelf mægðum.
 13.4. Ða dyde Moyses swa God him bebead, &amp; sende of ðam
westene, ðe is genemned Pharan, twelf sceaweras, þe heora naman her synd
awritene: Of Ruben, Semmua Sechores sunu; of Simeon, Sephath Vries sunu; of
Iudas, Chaleb Ieppones sunu; of Efraim, Osee Nunes sunu; of Isachar, Igal
Iosepes sunu; of Beniamin, Psalthi Raphues sunu; of Zabulon, Iedidel Sodiys
sunu; of Ioseph, Gaddi Susius sunu; of Dan, Amihel Iemallies sunu; of Aser,
Stur Michaheles sunu; of Neptalim, Naabdi Vaphsies sunu; of Gad, Guel Mathies
sunu.
 13.17. Ðis synd ðara manna naman, ðe Moyses sende to
sceawigenne Chanaan land.
 13.18. &amp; ðus cwæð: Farað geond ðone suðdæl,
&amp; sceawiað ðæt land, hwæðer hit wæstmbære sy &amp; mid
wudum gemencged, &amp; ða burga gebette oððe butan weallum, &amp;
hwæðer ðæt landfolc sy to gefeohte stranglic oððe untrumlic,
feawa on getele hwæðer ðe fela.
 13.21. &amp; feriað mid eow of ðære eorðan wæstmum,
ðonne ge eft cumað; Hit wæs ða se tima ðe winberian ripodon.
 13.22. &amp; hi ferdon ða sona &amp; sceawodon þone eard, &amp;
geond feowertig daga embferdon ðone eard.
 13.24. &amp; of ðam winbogum mid berium mid ealle &amp; æpplum
&amp; ofætum eft mid him brohton.
 13.27. &amp; comon to Moyse, þær he mid ðære fyrde
wæs, on Pharan ðam westene.
 13.28. &amp; ðas word him to cwædon: We comon to ðam earde
þe ge us heton faran, þe flewð witodlice meolce &amp; hunie, swa swa ge
of ðisum wæstmum wel oncnawon magon.
 13.29. Ac þa strengstan weras wuniað on ðam lande &amp;
micele burga ðær synd &amp; mærlice geweallode: ðær we gesawon
Enachus cynryn.
 13.30. Amalech eac swylce eardað on ðam suðdæle, Etheus on
ðam muntlandum, &amp; Iebuseus &amp; Amorreus, Chananeus wið ða sæ
&amp; ymb ða ea Iordan.
 13.31. Hwæt ða Israhela bearn endemes hrymdon ongean Moysen
miclum ceorodon; ac Caleph hi gestilde, &amp; cwæð mid gebylde: Vton faran
to þam earde, &amp; geagnian us ðæt land, for ðan ðe we magon mid
mihte hit begytan.
 13.32. Ða oðre soðlice cwædon, þe mid him asende
wæron: Ne mage we faran nateshwon to ðam folce þus, for ðan þe hi
synd strengran þonne we.
 13.34. &amp; we ðær gesawon of ðam entcynne Enachys bearna
micelra wæstma, ðam we ne synd ðe gelicran ðe lytle gærstapan.
 13.33. &amp; hi tældon ðæt land mid heora teonwordum.
 14.1. HWæT ða, eal seo mæniu endemes weop sona, &amp;
miclum ceorodon ongean Moysen, &amp; cwædon: We wisceað ðæt we on
Egypta lande wæron ær deade &amp; na on ðisum westene, &amp; we
wisceað swyðor þæt we forwurðon her &amp; us Drihten ne læde in
to ðam lande, þæt we ðær licgon ofslagene &amp; ure wif &amp; cyld
wurðon gehergode; Nis us, la, betere þæt we bugon ongean to Egypta
lande?
 14.4. &amp; ælc cwæð to oðrum: Vton us gesettan efne nu
heretogan &amp; uton gecyrran to Egypta lande.
 14.5. Moyses ða &amp; Aaron miclum wurdon astyrode &amp; feollon
astrehte ætforan ðære mæniu.
 14.6. Caleph ða &amp; Iosue cwædon to ðam folce: þæt
land ðe we sceawodon is swyðe ðearle god.
 14.8. Gyf Drihten us arfæst bið, he us in gelæt to ðam,
&amp; sylð us ða moldan þe meolce &amp; hunie flewð.
 14.9. Ne beo ge wiðerræde wið eowerne Drihten, ne ge ne
ondrædon eow; Drihten is mid us.
 14.10. Ða hrymde eal seo mæniu &amp; mid stanum woldon hi
oftorfian; ac Godes wuldor wearð sona wundorlice æteowod ofer ðæt
Godes scrin, þær hi on locodon.
 14.11. &amp; God cwæð to Moyse: Hu lange tælð þis folc
me, &amp; hu lange ne gelyfað hi me on eallum ðam tacnum þe ic ætforan
him dyde?
 14.12. Ic ofslea hi mid cwylde &amp; hi fordo mid cwealme, &amp; ic
ðe gesette syððan to heretogan ofer micele ðeode strengran þonne
ðeos.
 14.13. Moyses ða clypode, &amp; ðus cwæð to Drihtne: Gyf
ða Egyptiscean gehyrað, &amp; ða ðe her eardiað abutan, þæt ðu
þas mæniu ofslihst swa swa anne mannan, þonne secgað hi sona þæt
ðu ofsloge hi for ði, þæt ðu ne mihtæst hi gelædan to ðam
lande ðe ðu him behete.
 14.17. Ac sy þin strengð gemærsod, swa swa ðu swore.
 14.19. Drihten, ic ðe bidde ðæt ðu forgyfe þises folces
synna æfter micelnisse þinre mildheortnysse.
 14.20. Drihten cwæð to Moyse: Ic hit forgyfe æfter ðinum
worde.
 14.22. Swa ðeah soðlice ealle þa ðe gesawon mine
mægnðrymnysse &amp; ða miclan tacna, ðe ic worhte on Egypta lande
&amp; on þisum westene, &amp; costnodon me nu tyn siðon &amp; mine stemne
ne gehyrsumodon, ne geseoð hi ðæt land, þe ic foreswor heora
fæderum, ne nan þæra ðe me tælde ne gesihð ðæt land.
 14.30. Caleph &amp; Iosue cumað to þam lande.
 14.31. Eowre bearn ic læde to þam lande soðlice.
 14.32. &amp; eowre lic sceolan licgan on þisum westene.
 14.33. Eowre bearn beoð worigende on þisum westene feowertig
wintra &amp; eower forligr berað, oð ðæt heora fædera hreaw beon
fornumene.
 14.34. Æfter ðæra feowertigra daga getæle, þe ge
ðæt land besceawodon, ger bið for dæge geteald, &amp; on feowertigum
gearum ge underfoð eowre unrihtwisnyssa, þæt ge witon mine wrace.
 14.36. Ða wurdon sona ofslagene on Godes gesihðe ða tyn
sceaweras, þe sceawodon ðæt land, &amp; deade nyðer feollon, for ðan
ðe hi þæt folc mistihton &amp; þæt land tæl.
 14.38. &amp; ða twegen leofodan, Iosue &amp; Caleph, &amp; hi
comon to þam lande.
 14.39. Ða weop þæt folc sare, &amp; sona on ærnemerien
astigon gewæpnode up to ðære dune, &amp; cwædon: We synd gearwe nu
to gewinnenne þæt land be ðam ðe Drihten spræc, for ðan þe we
syngodon.
 14.41. Ða cwæð Moyses to andsware: Hwi ofergæge ge Godes
word; Hit ne becymð eow na to nanre spede.
 14.42. Ne fare ge, ic bidde, for ðan þe God nis mid eow,
þæt ge ne feallon ætforan eowrum feondum.
 14.44. Hi swa ðeah ablende beotlice astygon to ðæs muntes
cnæppe.
 14.45. &amp; ða comon heora fynd, Amalechitisc folc &amp;
Chananeus samod, þe eardedon on ðam munte, &amp; hi miclum slogon &amp;
ehtende adrifon oþ ðæt hi comon to Horma.
 14.44. &amp; Moyses wæs stille on þære wicstowe; God
gesette ða Moyse mænifealde beboda.
 16.1. &amp; æFTER ðam færlice arison feower weras, Chore
&amp; Hon, Dathan &amp; Abiron, ongean Moysen miclum astyrode, &amp; ðridde
healf hund manna of ðam yldstum mannum; &amp; cwædon to Moyse &amp; to
Aarone þam sacerde: Eall ðeos mæniu soðlice syndon haligra bearn &amp;
God wunað on him: Hwi synd ge ahafene ofer Drihtnes folc?
 16.4. &amp; Moyses feoll astreht sona to eorðan.
 16.5. &amp; to ðam folce cwæð: To mergen geswutelað God
hwilce he gecyst to him.
 16.6. Nime eower ælc his storcyllan &amp; stere ætforan Gode;
&amp; þone þe he gecyst, beo se halig.
 16.18. Hi dydon swa on mergen mid miclum gedwylde &amp; brohton
heora storcyllan, standende æt ðam getelde.
 16.27. Ac Dathan &amp; Abiron stodon on heora geteldum.
 16.12. &amp; cwædon to Moyse mid miclum graman: Is ðe, la,
lytel geðuht þæt ðu alæddest us of ðam lande þe weol meolce
&amp; hunige, þæt ðu us ofsloge on þisum westene, butan þu eac ure
gewealde?
 16.14. Witodlice þu gelæddest us in to ðam lande þe eall
flewð on riðum meolce &amp; huniges &amp; sealdest us land &amp; æhta
&amp; wingeardas ðær; oððe wilt ðu, la, ut apytan ure eagan?
 16.19. Ða æteowde Godes wuldor.
 16.20. &amp; God cwæð to Moyse: Asyndriað eow fram ðisre
scyldigan gegaderunge, þæt ic hi færlice fordon mæge.
 16.31. Hwæt ða færlice geopenode seo eorðe hi sylfe &amp;
forswealh ða weras mid wifum &amp; cildum, Dathan &amp; Abiron, mid heora
geteldum &amp; eallum æhtum, þæt hi in to helle cuce siðodon mid
sande ofhrorene.
 16.34. &amp; þæt folc fleah afyrht for heora hreame.
 16.35. Eac swylce færlice fyr com fram Gode &amp; ofsloh ða
oþre þe offrodon ðone stor, ðridde healf hund manna, þær hi
heoldon þa recelsfata.
 16.41. Eft on ðam oðrum dæge eall seo mæniu ceorode
ongean Moysen &amp; Aaron, cweðende: Ge ofslogon Godes folc.
 16.42. &amp; seo sacu ða aras.
 16.43. &amp; Moyses &amp; Aaron efston mid fleame to Godes getelde,
&amp; þa ða hi in agan wæron, ða ætywde Godes wuldor.
 16.44. &amp; God cwæð to Moyse: Gewitað aweg fram ðisre
mæniu; nu ic hi adylgie.
 16.46. &amp; Moyses cwæð to Aarone: Nim ðin recelsfæt
&amp; efst to ðam folce &amp; for hi gebide, for ðan ðe Godes yrre is
ofer hi &amp; his wite reðegað.
 16.47. Aaron ða ardlice arn to ðam folce &amp; sterde mid
thimiama standende betwynan ðam cucuan &amp; ðam deadum, &amp; bæd for
ðæt folc; ðæt wite ða geswac.
 16.49. &amp; þær wæron ofslagene feowertyne ðusenda of
ðæs folces mæniu &amp; seofonhund manna butan ðam ðe ðær
ofslagene wæron on Chores ceaste.
 16.50. Aaron eode ða eft to Moyse to Drihtnes getelde.
 17.1. &amp; Drihten cwæð to Moyse: Nim nu twelf gyrda æt
ðam twelf mægðum fram þære mægða ealdrum, &amp; heora ælces
naman awrit on his gyrde &amp; Aarones nama beo on Leuies mægðe, &amp;
lege ða gyrda on ðam getelde þær ic ðe to sprece.
 17.5. &amp; þone þe ic geceose, þonne sprytt his gyrd, &amp;
ic gestille fram me Ysrahela ceorunge.
 17.7. Moyses ða dyde swa swa Drihten him bebead.
 17.8. &amp; eode on ærnemerien in to ðam getelde, &amp; efne
ða wæs growende Aarones gyrd on blostmum &amp; on leafum on hnutbeames
wisan.
 17.9. He bær ða ða gyrda to Ysrahela bearnum, &amp; hi
gesawon hwæt þær geswutelod wæs; ælc nam þa his gyrde.
 17.10. &amp; God cwæð eft to Moyse: Ber Aarones gyrde in to
ðam getelde, ðæt heo sy gehealden Israhele to tacne &amp; heora ceorung
geswice, þæt hi ne swelton.
 17.11. &amp; Moyses dyde swa swa him Drihten bebead.
 18.1. GOD geceas Aaron him to sacerde &amp; of his ofsprincge to
his offrunge symle &amp; of Leuies mægðe manega to Leuita Aarone to fylste
to ðam ælicum onsægednyssum, &amp; God sylf him sealde ða
gesetnyssa.
 20.1. ÆFTER þisum comon Israhela bearn to ðam westene Sin,
&amp; ðær sweolt Maria, Aarones swustor, &amp; is ðær bebyrged.
 20.2. Ða næs ðær nan wæter on þam westene þam
folce.
 20.3. &amp; hi ða ciddon swiðe wið Moysen.
 20.6. He clypode ða to Gode.
 20.7. &amp; God cwæð to him: Gang ðu &amp; Aaron &amp;
gegaderiað þis folc geond to ðam stane; &amp; se stan eow sylþ
wæter.
 20.10. Hi comon ða to ðam flinte.
 20.11. &amp; he ætforan him eallon sloh mid ðære gyrde tua
þone flint, &amp; þær fleow sona of ðam flinte wæter swa
genihtsumlice, þæt heora nytena druncon &amp; eall Israhela folc of
ðære anre riðe.
 20.14. Ða sende Moyses ærendracan to Edom þam cynincge;
Bæd þæt he moste faran forð ofer his land be rihtum wege &amp; ne
reppan his nan þingc.
 20.18. Edom ða andwyrde þam ærendracum, &amp; cwæð: Ne
fare ge ðurh me.
 20.20. &amp; he ferde ða sona mid eallon his folce to gefeohte
gearu: &amp; forwyrnde Israhele þæt oferfæreld þurh his land; Hi
gewendon þa aweg, &amp; gewicodon wið ðone munt, þe is Or gehaten.
 20.28. Þær Aaron forðferde &amp; Eleazarus, his sunu, wæs
sacerd for hine.
 20.30. &amp; hi ealle beweopon Aarones forðsið geond <foreign>xxx</foreign> daga
geomriende swyðe.
 21.1. CHANANEUS þa wann wið Israhela bearn, &amp; sige on him
gewann.
 21.2. Ac hi wendon to Gode mid ealre heortan.
 21.3. &amp; hi gehyrde God, &amp; him sige forgeaf, þæt hi
ofslogon þone cyningc &amp; his folc samod mid swurdes ecge &amp; heora burga
towendon.
 21.4. &amp; gewendon him ham ðanon ofer langne weg, þæt hi
þæt land embferdon; þæt folc wearð ða aðryt &amp; ðearle
geswenct mid ðam siðfæte.
 21.5. &amp; ceorodon ongean Godd &amp; ongean Moysen miclum, &amp;
cwædon: Hwi læddest ðu, la, us of Egypta lande, þæt we swulton on
þisum westene; We nabbað naðor ne hlaf ne wæter, &amp; us wlataþ nu
for ðisum leohtostan mete.
 21.6. For ðam ðingon þa sona sende God him to fyrene
næddran, &amp; hi ðæt folc totæron &amp; manega adyddon.
 21.7. &amp; hi to Moyse cwædon: We syngodon swyðe, for ðan
ðe we swa spæcon ongean God &amp; ðe; ac gebide for us, þæt he
afyrsige fram us ða fyrene næddran; Moyses ða gebæd for ðæt
folc.
 21.8. &amp; God cwæð to him: Wyrc ane ærene næddran
&amp; sete upp to tacne, &amp; se ðe tosliten beo, beseo upp to ðære
næddran, &amp; he leofoð sona swa he besyhð on hi.
 21.9. Moyses ða worhte ða ærenan næddran, &amp; sette to
tacne; &amp; þa ðe toslitene wæron beheoldon to ðære næddran
&amp; wurdon gehælede.
 21.10. Hi ferdon ða ðanon mid heora fyrdwicum.
 21.21. &amp; Moyses sende ða to Seon, ðam cyninge Amoreiscre
ðeode, ðisum wordum, &amp; cwæð: Ic bidde ðæt ðu me lyfe ofer
ðin land to farene; Ne reppe we ðine æceras oððe wineardas, eowwer
wæterpyttas; ac swa swa se weg lið we farað, gyf we moton, forð ofer
ðin land.
 21.23. Ða nolde Seon, se cyningc, nateshwon him tiðian þæt
Israhel ferde forð ofer his gemæru, ac gegaderode his folc &amp; ferde him
togenes &amp; feaht swyðe ongean, oð ðæt he feol ofslagen, &amp; his
folc samod, mid swurdes ecge.
 21.25. Hi geeodon ða his land &amp; ealle his burga, &amp;
Israhel wunode þa on þam widgillan lande.
 21.32. Moyses ða sende &amp; het sceawian Azer; þære wic hi
geeodon &amp; ahton þone eard.
 21.33. Hi gewendon ða ðanon &amp; woldon to Basan, ac Og, se
cyning, com him togeanes mid eallum his folce to gefeohte gearu.
 21.34. Drihten cwæð to Moyse: Ne ondræd ðu hine; ic hine
sealde to þinum gewealde &amp; eall his folc &amp; land.
 21.35. &amp; hi fuhton ða swyðe, &amp; Israhel ofsloh Og þone
cyningc, &amp; his suna, &amp; his folc eall to forwyrde, &amp; geahton his
land &amp; ealle his burga.
 22.1. MOYSES ða ferde to Moab mid ðam folce.
 22.2. &amp; se cyningc Balac cwæð to his leode: Swa adylegað
þis folc mid heora fyrdcræfte ealle ða ðe eardiað on urum
gemærum, swa swa oxa gewunaþ to awestenne gærs oð ða wyrtruman
eorðslihtes/ mid toðum.
 22.5. He sende þa his bodan to Balaam ðam witegan, Beores suna
&amp; bæd ðæt he come to wyrigenne þæt folc þe fundode wið
his, &amp; cwæð: Ic wat þæt se bið gebletsod, ðe ðu gebletsast,
&amp; se bið awyrged þe ðu wyrigst.
 22.7. Ða bodan ða comon to Balaan mid sceattum.
 22.18. Balaam andwyrde þam ærendracum &amp; cwæð: ðeah
Balaac me sylle goldes &amp; seolfres an hus full, ic ne mæg awendan Godes
word.
 22.19. Ac beoð her to niht &amp; bidað andsware.
 22.20. Ða com God on niht to Balaam, &amp; cwæð: Nu ðas
men þe feccað; far mid him, swa ðæt ðu do þæt ic ðe bebeode.
 22.21. Balaam ða ferde forð mid ðam bodum on assan ridende.
 22.22. &amp; efne Godes encgel forstod þone weg ðær he wolde
ridan mid atogenum sweorde, swilce he hine slean wolde.
 22.23. Se assa geseah ðone encgel standende, &amp; Balaam ne
geseah; þa forbeah se assa þæs engles swurd, &amp; eode of ðam wege;
Hwæt þa Balaam beot þone assan, wolde ðæt he eode innon þone
weg.
 22.25. Ða fleah se assa gyt forht for þam encgle, &amp; ðyde
his hlafordes fot ðearle to ðam hege; Balaam þa gyt beot þone assan.
 22.26. &amp; se encgel eode in to anum nyrwette, þe he ne mihte
forbugan on naðre healfe, for ðan þe þær nan bige næs.
 22.27. Ða feol se assa adune afyrht for ðam engle, &amp; Balaam
wearð yrre &amp; beot hine gyt swyðor.
 22.28. Ða geopenode Drihten þæs assan muð, &amp; he
cwæð: Hwi beatst ðu me swa swyðe?
 22.29. &amp; Balaam andwyrde: For ðam ðe ðu me beswice, &amp;
ic ðe ofslean wolde, gyf ic swurd hæfde.
 22.30. Ða sæde se assa: Ne eom ic na þin assa þe ðu on
ridst symble; Sege hwænne ic æfre ær þyllic ðe gebude.
 22.31. God þa geopenode Balaames eagon, þæt he geseah þone
engel þe se assa forbeah, mid nacodum swurde, &amp; he hnah to eorðan,
&amp; aleat wið ðæs engles.
 22.32. &amp; se encgel cwæþ: Hwi beote ðu þinne assan efne
nu þrywa?
 22.33. Ic þe ofsloge sona &amp; se assa ne leofode, gyf he ne
forbuge me.
 22.34. &amp; Balaam cwæð: Ic syngode nytende; nyste þæt
ðu stode ongean me, &amp; gyf ðe min færeld mislicað, ic fare eft
ongean.
 22.35. Se encgel cwæð to him: Farr mid þisum mannum, &amp;
warna þæt ðu nan þinc elles ne sprece buton þæt ic þe bebeode;
&amp; Balaam þa rad forð.
 22.36. Se cyning ða, Balac, com him togeanes.
 23.1. &amp; HE arærde sona seofon weofoda; &amp; þær lac
geoffrode on ða ealdan wisan.
 23.8. &amp; cwæð to Balac: Hu mæg ic awyrian þone ðe
God bletsode; &amp; he witegode ða, swa him wissode God, &amp; bletsode
Israhel.
 23.11. &amp; Balac cwæð to him: Ic ðe fette for ði,
þæt ðu mine fynd wyrigdest, &amp; þu hi bletsast.
 23.12. Balaam cwæð ða: Cwyst ðu, mæg ic oþer sprecan
buton ðæt Drihten het?
 23.13. Ða cwæð Balac him to: Cum to oðre stowe mid me.
 23.14. &amp; he eft arærde oðre seofan weofoda, &amp; bletsode
Israhel.
 23.25. &amp; Balac cwæð: Ne ðu hine wyrige, ne ðu hine
bletsa.
 23.26. Ða cwæð Balaam to Balaace ðus: Hu ne sæde ic
ðe þæt swa hwæt swa God me bebude, þæt ic ðæt dyde?
 23.27. &amp; Balac cwæð: Cum, ic ðe læde to oðre stowe,
gyf Gode swa gelicie þæt ðu hi ðanon gewyrige.
 23.28. Hi eodon ða begen up to ðam munte; &amp; he sona
arærde seofan weofoda, &amp; lac geoffrode.
 24.1. &amp; ISRAHEL bletsode, &amp; þa ðingc witegode þe him
gewissode God.
 24.2. He mihte geseon Israhel of ðam munte þanon.
 24.10. Ða yrsode Balac wið Balaam, &amp; cwæð: Ic ðe het
feccan, þæt ðu mine fynd wyrigdest, &amp; þu nu ðrywa hi
bletsodest.
 24.11. Far ðe nu ham: ic hæfde gemynt ðe to arwurðienne on
æhtum &amp; on feo, ac God ðe benæmde ðæs wurðmyntes.
 25.1. HIT stent on oðrum bocum, þæt Balaam swa ðeah
tæhte þam cyningce hu he cuman mihte þæt he hi beswice; &amp; he eac
swa dyde; he beswac hi swa, þæt he sette wifmen æt his hæðengylde
gehende ðam folce, þær hi on locodon; &amp; hi eodon ða to manega of
ðam folce to ðam myltystrum &amp; wið hi hæmdon; &amp; to ðam
hæðengylde bugon.
 25.3. God wearð ða yrre Israhela bearnum, &amp; het Moyses ahon
þa ðe ðæt man dydon.
 25.5. Moyses þa het ða manfullan ofslean, ealle ða ðe bugon
to Belphegor.
 25.8. &amp; þær wurdon ofslagene mid swurdes ecge feower &amp;
twenti ðusenda of ðæs folces mæniu; &amp; Godes yrre geswac &amp; he
him syððan mildsode.
 25.16. God bebead syþþan Moyse, &amp; cwæð: Wrec Israhela
bearn on ðam Madianitiscum &amp; ofsleaþ hi, for ðam þe hi beswicon
eow.
 31.6. MOYSES ða sende sona twelf ðusenda gewæpnodra manna,
to ðam wige caflice.
 31.7. &amp; hi ða ferdon &amp; ðæt folc ofslogon, &amp;
þone cyningc Balac &amp; Balaam samod; &amp; ðæt land aweston &amp; ða
wif heoldon; &amp; comon to Moyse mid micelre huðe.
 31.14. Moyses ða yrsode; &amp; axode hwi hi heoldon ða wifmen
to life, ðe hi forlærdon ær æt ðam hæðengylde.
 31.17. &amp; het hi ða acwellan ealle ða wif ðe weras
hæfdon.
 31.18. &amp; het healdan þa mædena; Hi didon þa swa &amp;
sige hæfdon syððan; &amp; comon to ðam lande þe hi to lædde God,
ðe he Abrahame behet &amp; his ofsprincge.
 26.2. MOYSES getealde ðæs folces mæniu ðe on ðam
westene wæron accennede wigendra manna fram twentigwintre, &amp; sume eac
yldran.
 26.51. &amp; þær soðlice wæron sixhund ðusenda &amp;
feower &amp; twentig ðusenda &amp; seofonhund manna &amp; ðrittig manna.
 26.64. Heora fæderas ealle forðferdon on ðam westene, buton
Caleph &amp; Iosue; hi comon to ðam lande, &amp; mid Israhela bearnum þone
eard geeodon &amp; him betwynan dældon, swa swa him dihte Iosue.
