Mk (WSCp)
B8.4.3.2.
Mark (Cambridge, Corpus Christi College, MS. 140): Skeat 1871-87, 8-134.



 1.1. Her ys godspellys angyn Hælyndes Cristes Godes suna.
 1.2. Swa awriten is on þæs witegan bec Isaiam, nu ic asende
minne engel beforan þinre ansyne, Se gegearwað þinne weg beforan ðe.
 1.3. Clypiende stefn on þam westene gegearwiað drihtnes weg,
doð rihte his siðas.
 1.4. Iohannes wæs on westene fulligende &amp; bodiende
dædbote fulwiht on synna forgyfenesse.
 1.5. &amp; to him ferde eall Iudeisc rice, &amp; ealle
Hierosolimaware, &amp; wæron fram him gefullode on Iordanes flode hyra synna
anddettenne.
 1.6. And Iohannes wæs gescryd mid oluendes hærum, &amp;
fellen gyrdel wæs ymbe his lendenu, &amp; gærstapan &amp; wudu hunig he
æt.
 1.7. &amp; he bodude &amp; cwæð, strengra cymð æfter me,
þæs ne eom ic wyrðe þæt ic his sceona þwanga bugende uncnytte.
 1.8. Ic fullige eow on wætere, he eow fullað on halgum gaste.
 1.9. &amp; on ðam dagum com se Hælend fram Nazareth Galilee
&amp; wæs gefullod on Iordane fram Iohanne.
 1.10. &amp; sona of ðam wætere he geseah opene heofonas, &amp;
haligne gast swa culfran astigende &amp; on him wunigende.
 1.11. &amp; þa wæs stefn of heofenum geworden, þu eart min
gelufoda sunu, on þe ic gelicode.
 1.12. And sona gast hine on westen genydde.
 1.13. &amp; he on westene wæs feowertig daga &amp; feowertig
nihta, &amp; he wæs fram Satane gecostnod; &amp; he mid wilddeorum wæs
&amp; him englas þenodon.
 1.14. Syððan Iohannes geseald wæs, com se Hælend on
Galileam Godes rices, godspell bodigende.
 1.15. &amp; þus cweðende, witodlice tid is gefylled &amp;
heofena rice genealæcð; Doð dædbote &amp; gelyfaþ þam godspelle.
 1.16. &amp; þa he ferde wið þa Galileiscan Sæ, he geseah
Simonem &amp; Andream his broðor hyra nett on þa sæ lætende;
Soðlice hi wæron fisceras.
 1.17. And þa cwæð se Hælend, cumað æfter me &amp; ic
do inc þæt gyt beoð sawla onfonde.
 1.18. &amp; hi þa hrædlice him fyligdon, &amp; forleton heora
net.
 1.19. &amp; ðanon hwon agan he geseah Iacobum &amp; Zebedei &amp;
Iohannes his broðor, &amp; hi on heora scype heora nett logodon.
 1.20. &amp; he hi sona clypode, &amp; hi heora fæder Zebedeo on
scipe forleton mid hyrlingum.
 1.21. &amp; ferdon to Cafarnaum &amp; sona restedagum he lærde
hi on gesamnunge ingancgende.
 1.22. &amp; hi wundredon be his lare; Soþlice he wæs hi
lærende swa se þe anweald hæfð, næs swa boceras.
 1.23. &amp; on heora gesamnunge wæs sum man on unclænum gaste
&amp; he hrymde.
 1.24. &amp; cwæð, eala Nazarenisca Hælend, hwæt is us
&amp; þe; Com ðu us to forspillanne; Ic wat þu eart Godes halga.
 1.25. Ða cidde se Hælend him &amp; cwæð, adumba, &amp; ga
of þisum men.
 1.26. &amp; se unclæna gast hine slitende &amp; mycelre stefne
clypiende him of eode.
 1.27. Þa wundredon hi ealle swa þæt hi betwux him cwædon,
hwæt ys þis; Hwæt is þeos niwe lar, þæt he on anwealde
unclænum gastum bebyt, &amp; hi hyrsumiað him?
 1.28. &amp; sona ferde his hlisa to Galilea rice.
 1.29. Hrædlice of hyra gesamnunge hi comon on Simonis &amp;
Andreas hus, mid Iacobe &amp; Iohanne.
 1.30. Soðlice þa sæt Simonis swegr hriðigende &amp; hi him
be hyre sædon.
 1.31. &amp; genealæcende he hi up ahof hyre handa gegripenre,
&amp; hrædlice se fefor hi forlet, &amp; heo þenode him.
 1.32. Soðlice þa hit wæs æfen geworden þa sunne to
setle eode, hi brohton to him ealle þa unhalan, &amp; þa ðe wode
wæron, &amp; eall seo burhwaru wæs gegaderod to þære duran.
 1.34. &amp; he manega gehælde þe missenlicum adlum gedrehte
wæron, &amp; manega deofolseocnyssa he ut adraf; &amp; hi sprecan ne let,
forþam hi wiston þæt he Crist wæs.
 1.35. And swiðe ær arisende he ferde on weste stowe &amp; hine
þar gebæd.
 1.36. &amp; him fyligde Simon &amp; þa ðe mid him wæron.
 1.37. &amp; þa hi hine gemetton hi sædon him, eall þis folc
ðe secð.
 1.38. Þa cwæð he, fare we on gehende tunas &amp; ceastra
þæt ic ðar bodige; Witodlice to ðam ic com.
 1.39. &amp; he wæs bodigende on heora gesamnungum &amp; ealre
Galilea, &amp; deofolseocnessa ut adrifende.
 1.40. And to him com sum hreofla hine biddende, &amp; gebigedum
cneowum him to cwæþ, Drihten, gif þu wylt ðu miht geclænsian me.
 1.41. Soðlice se Hælend him gemiltsode, &amp; his hand
aþenode &amp; hine æthrinende &amp; þus cwæð, Ic wylle; Beo ðu
geclænsod.
 1.42. &amp; þa he ðus cwæð sona seo hreofnys him fram
gewat, &amp; he wæs geclænsod.
 1.43. &amp; sona he bead him.
 1.44. &amp; cwæð, warna þæt ðu hit nanum men ne secge,
ac ga &amp; ætyw ðe þara sacerda ealdre, &amp; bring for ðinre
clænsunga þæt Moyses bebead him on gewitnesse.
 1.45. &amp; he þa utgangende ongan bodian &amp; widmærsian
þa spræce, swa þæt he ne mihte openlice on þa ceastre gan, ac beon
ute on westum stowum, &amp; hi æghwanon to him comon.
 2.1. &amp; eft æfter dagum he eode into Cafarnaum; &amp; hit
wæs gehyred þæt he wæs on huse.
 2.2. &amp; manega togædere comon, &amp; he to heom spræc.
 2.3. &amp; hi comon anne laman to him berende, þone feower men
bæron.
 2.4. &amp; þa hi ne mihton hine inbringan for þære
mænigu, hi openodon þone hrof þar se Hælend wæs, &amp; hi þa
inasendan þæt bed þe se lama on læg.
 2.5. Soðlice ða se Hælend geseah heora geleafan, he
cwæð to þam laman, Sunu þe synt þine synna forgyfene.
 2.6. Þar wæron sume of ðam bocerum sittende, &amp; on heora
heortum þencende.
 2.7. Hwi spycð þes þus; He dysegað; Hwa mæg synna
forgyfan buton god ana?
 2.8. Ða se Hælend þæt on his gaste oncneow þæt hi
swa betwux him þohton, he cwæð to him, hwi ðence ge þas ðing on
eowrum heortan?
 2.9. Hwæðer is eðre to secgenne to þam laman, þe synd
ðine synna forgyfene, hwæðer þe cweðan, aris, nim ðin bed &amp;
ga?
 2.10. Þæt ge soðlice witon þæt mannes sunu hæfð
anweald on eorðan synna to forgyfanne, He cwæð to þam laman.
 2.11. Þe ic secge aris, nim þin bed &amp; ga to þinum huse.
 2.12. &amp; he sona aras, &amp; beforan him eallum eode, Swa
þæt ealle wundredon &amp; þus cwædon, næfre we ær þyllic ne
gesawon.
 2.13. Eft he ut eode to ðære sæ, &amp; eall seo menigeo him
to com &amp; he hi lærde.
 2.14. &amp; þa he forð eode he geseah Leuin Alphei sittende
æt his cepsetle, &amp; he cwæð to him, folga me; þa aras he &amp;
folgode him.
 2.15. &amp; hit gewearð þa he sæt on his huse þæt
manega manfulle sæton mid þam Hælende &amp; his leorningcnihtum;
Soðlice manega þa ðe him fyligdon wæron boceras &amp; farisei, &amp;
cwædon, witodlice he ytt mid manfullum &amp; synfullum; &amp; hi cwædon
to his leorningcnihtum, hwi ytt eower lareow &amp; drincð mid manfullum &amp;
synfullum?
 2.17. Þa se Hælend þis gehyrde he sæde him, ne beþurfon
na ða halan læces, ac ða þe untrume synt; Ne com ic na þæt ic
clypode rihtwise ac synfulle.
 2.18. &amp; þa wæron Iohannes leorningcnihtas &amp; Pharisei
fæstende; &amp; þa comon hi &amp; sædon him, Hwi fæstað Iohannes
leorningcnihtas &amp; Phariseorum, &amp; þine ne fæstað?
 2.19. Ða cwæð se Hælend, cweðe ge sceolan þæs
brydguman cnihtas fæstan swa lange swa se brydguma mid him is; Ne magon hi
fæstan swa lange tide swa hi ðone brydguman mid him habbað?
 2.20. Soðlice þa dagas cumað þonne se brydguma him bið
framacyrred, &amp; þonne hi fæstað; On þam dagum.
 2.21. Nan man ne siwaþ niwne scyp to ealdum reafe elles he
afyrð þone niwan scyp of þam ealdan reafe &amp; biþ mare slite.
 2.22. &amp; nan man ne deð niwe win on ealde bytta, elles
þæt win tobrycð þa bytta, &amp; þæt win bið agoten &amp; þa
bytta forwurðaþ; ac niwe win sceal beon gedon on niwe bytta, þonne beoð
butu gehealden.
 2.23. Eft wæs geworden þa he restedagum þurh æceras eode,
his leorningcnihtas ongunnon þa ear pluccigean.
 2.24. Þa cwædon Pharisei to him, loca nu hwæt þine
leorningcnihtas doð, þæt him alyfed næs on restedagum?
 2.25. Þa sæde he him, ne rædde ge næfre hwæt dyde
Dauid þa hine hingrode &amp; þa ðe mid him wæron, hu he in Godes huse
eode, under Abiathar þara sacerda ealdre, &amp; he æt þa ofrunghlafas,
þe him ne alyfede næron to etanne, buton sacerdon anum, &amp; he sealde
þam ðe mid him wæron?
 2.27. &amp; he sæde him, restedæg wæs geworht for þa
men, næs se man for ðam restedæge.
 2.28. Witodlice drihten is mannes sunu eac swylce restedæges.
 3.1. And eft he eode on gesamnunge &amp; þar wæs an man
forscruncene hand hæbbende.
 3.2. &amp; hi gymdon hwæþer he on restedagum gehælde,
þæt hi hine gewregdon?
 3.3. Ða cwæð he to ðam men þe forscruncene hand
hæfde, aris gemang him.
 3.4. Þa cwæð he alyfð restedagum wel to donne hweþer
ðe yfele, sawla gehælan, hweþer ðe forspillan; &amp; hi suwodon.
 3.5. &amp; hi besceawiende mid yrre ofer hyra heortan blindnesse
geunret cwæð to þam men, Aþene þine hand; &amp; he aþenede hi,
þa wearð his hand gehæled sona.
 3.6. Þa Pharisei mid Herodianiscum utgangende þeahtedon ongen
hine, hu hi hine fordon mihton.
 3.7. &amp; þa ferde se Hælend to þære sæ mid his
leorningcnihton, &amp; mycel menigeo him fyligde fram Galilea, &amp; Iudea.
 3.8. &amp; Hierusalem, &amp; fram Iudea &amp; begeondan Iordane,
&amp; to him com mycel menegeo ymbe Tirum &amp; Sidone gehyrende þa ðing
þe he worhte.
 3.9. &amp; he cwæð to his cnihtum þæt hi him on scipe
þenodon, for þære menigu þæt hi hine ne ofþrungon.
 3.10. Soþlice manega he gehælde, swa þæt hi æthrinon
his, &amp; swa fela swa untrumnessa.
 3.11. &amp; unclæne gastas hæfdon; þa hi hine gesawon, hi
toforan him astrehton, &amp; þus cweðende clypedon, þu eart Godes sunu.
 3.12. &amp; he him swyðe forbead, þæt hi hine ne
geswutelodon.
 3.13. &amp; on anne munt he ferde &amp; to him geclypode þa ðe
he wolde &amp; hi to him comon.
 3.14. &amp; he dyde þæt hi twelfe mid him wæron, &amp; he
hi asende godspell to bodigenne.
 3.15. &amp; he him anweald sealde untrumnessa to hælanne, &amp;
deofolseocnessa ut to adrifanne.
 3.16. &amp; he nemde Simon Petrum.
 3.17. &amp; Iacobum Zebedei, &amp; Iohannem his broðor, &amp; him
naman onsette Boaneries, þæt is ðunres bearn.
 3.18. &amp; Andream, &amp; Philippum, &amp; Bartholomeum &amp;
Thomam, &amp; Iacobum Alphei, &amp; Taddeum, &amp; Simonem Chananeum.
 3.19. &amp; Iudam scarioth, se hine sealde.
 3.20. &amp; eft him to com swa micel menigu þæt hi næfdon
hlaf to etanne.
 3.21. &amp; þa hi hine gehyrdon hi ferdon þæt hi hine namon
&amp; þus cwædon, Soðlice he is on hatheortnesse gewend.
 3.22. &amp; þa boceras þe wendon fram Hierusalem cwædon,
Soþlice he hæfð Beelzebub &amp; on deofla ealdre he deofulseocnessa ut
adrifð.
 3.23. &amp; he hi togædere geclypode &amp; on bigspellum him to
cwæð, Hu mæg Satanas Satanan ut adrifan?
 3.24. &amp; gif his rice on him sylfum bið todæled, hu mæg
hit standan?
 3.25. &amp; gif þæt hus ofer hit sylf ys todæled, hu mæg
hit standan?
 3.26. &amp; gif satanas winð ongen hine sylfne he bið
todæled &amp; he standan ne mæg ac hæfð ende.
 3.27. Ne mæg man þone strangan his æhta &amp; his fatu
bereafian &amp; on his hus gan, buton man þone strangan ærest gebinde,
&amp; þonne his hus reafige.
 3.28. Soðlice ic eow secge þæt ealle synna synd manna
bearnum forgyfene, &amp; bysmorunga þam ðe hi bysmeriað.
 3.29. Soþlice ic eow secge, se þe ðone halgan gast
bysmerað, se næfð on ecnysse forgyfenesse, ac bið eces gyltes
scyldig.
 3.30. Forþam þe hi cwædon he hæfð unclænne gast.
 3.31. Þa com to him his modor &amp; his gebroðra, &amp;
þarute stodon &amp; to him sendon, &amp; to him clypedon.
 3.32. &amp; mycel menigu ymb hine sæt and to him cwædon, her
is þin modor &amp; þine gebroðra ute &amp; secaþ þe.
 3.33. He þa him andswarode &amp; cwæð, hwylc is min modor
&amp; mine gebroþru?
 3.34. &amp; he cwæþ ða behealdende þe him abuton sæton,
her is min modor &amp; mine gebroðru.
 3.35. Soðlice se ðe deþ Godes willan, se is min modor &amp;
min broðor &amp; swustor.
 4.1. &amp; eft he ongan hi æt þære sæ læran, &amp;
him wæs mycel menegu togegaderod, swa þæt he on scip eode, &amp; on
þære sæ wæs, &amp; eall seo menegu ymbe þa sæ wæron on
lande.
 4.2. &amp; he hi fela on bigspellum lærde, &amp; him to
cwæð on his lare.
 4.3. Gehyrað; Ut eode se sædere his sæd to sawenne.
 4.4. &amp; þa he sew sum feoll wið þone weg, &amp; fugelas
comon &amp; hit fræton.
 4.5. Sum feoll ofer stanscyligean þar hit næfde mycele
eorðan, &amp; sona up eode, &amp; forþam hit næfde eorþan
þiccnesse.
 4.6. Þa hit upeode, seo sunne hit forswælde, &amp; hit
forscranc, forþam hit wyrtruman næfde.
 4.7. &amp; sum feoll on þornas, þa stigon ða þornas &amp;
forðrysmodon þæt, &amp; hit wæstm ne bær.
 4.8. &amp; sum feoll on god land &amp; hit sealde uppstigende &amp;
wexende wæstm; &amp; an brohte þritigfealdne, sum syxtigfealdne, sum
hundfealdne.
 4.9. And he cwæð, gehyre se ðe earan hæbbe to gehyranne.
 4.10. &amp; þa he ana wæs hine axodon þæt bigspell þa
twelfe þe mid him wæron.
 4.11. &amp; he sæde him, eow is geseald to witanne Godes rices
gerynu; þam þe ute synt ealle þing on bigspellum gewurþað.
 4.12. Þæt hi geseonde geseon &amp; na ne geseon &amp;
gehyrende gehyren &amp; ne ongyten þe læs hi hwænne syn gescyrede,
&amp; him sin hyra synna forgyfene.
 4.13. Ða sæde he him, ge nyton þis bigspell, &amp; hu mage
ge ealle bigspell witan?
 4.14. Se þe sæwð, word he sæwð.
 4.15. Soðlice þa synt wið þone weg þar þæt word is
gesawen, &amp; þonne hi hit gehyrað; Sona cymð Satanas &amp; afyrð
þæt word þe on heora heortan asawen ys.
 4.16. &amp; þa synt gelice þe synt ofer þa stanscylian
gesawen; Sona þænne hi þæt word gehyrað, &amp; þæt mid blisse
onfoð.
 4.17. &amp; hi nabbað wyrtruman on him, ac beoð
unstaðolfæste, &amp; syþþan upcymð deofles costnung &amp; his ehtnys
for þam worde.
 4.18. Hi synd on þornum gesawen, þæt synd þa ðe þæt
word gehyrað.
 4.19. &amp; ofyrmðe &amp; swicdome woroldwelene, &amp; oðra
gewilnunga þæt word ofþrymsað, &amp; synt buton wæstme gewordene.
 4.20. &amp; þa ðe gesawene synt ofer þæt gode land, þa
synd þe þæt word gehyrað &amp; onfoð, &amp; wæstm bringað, sum
þritigfealdne, sum syxtigfealdne, &amp; sum hundfealdne.
 4.21. He sæde him, cwyst þu cymð þæt leohtfæt
þæt hit beo under bydene asett, oððe under bedde; Witegere þæt
hit sy ofer candelstæf asett.
 4.22. Soðlice nis nan ðing behydd þe ne sy geswutelod; ne nis
digle geworden, ac þæt hit openlice cume.
 4.23. Gehyre gif hwa earan hæbbe to gehyranne.
 4.24. &amp; he cwæð to him, warniað hwæt ge gehyran,
&amp; on þam gemete, þe ge metað eow bið gemeten &amp; eow bið
geict.
 4.25. Þam bið geseald þe hæfð &amp; þam ðe
næfð, eac þæt he hæfð him bið ætbroden.
 4.26. &amp; he cwæð godes rice ys swylce man wurpe god sæd
on his land.
 4.27. &amp; sawe &amp; arise dæges &amp; nihtes, &amp; þæt
sæd growe &amp; wexe þonne he nat.
 4.28. Soðlice sylfwilles seo eorðe wæstm berað ærest
gærs syððan ear, syþþan fullne hwæte on þam eare.
 4.29. And þonne se wæstm hine forðbringð, sona he sent his
sicol forþam þæt rip ætis.
 4.30. &amp; eft he cwæð, for hwam geanlicie we heofena rice,
oððe hwylcum bigspelle wiðmete we hit?
 4.31. Swa swa senepes sæd, þonne hit bið on eorðan
gesawen, hit is ealra sæda læst þe on eorðan synt.
 4.32. &amp; þonne hit asawen bið hit astihþ, &amp; bið
ealra wyrta mæst &amp; hæfð swa mycele bogas þæt heofenes fugelas
eardian magon under his sceade.
 4.33. &amp; manegum swylcum bigspellum he spræc to him þæt
hi mihton gehyran.
 4.34. Ne spæc he na butan bispelle; eall he his leorningcnihtum
asundron rehte.
 4.35. &amp; sæde him þonne æfen bið, uton faran agen.
 4.36. And þas menigu forlætan, hi onfengon hine swa he on
scipe wæs, &amp; oþre scipu wæron mid him.
 4.37. &amp; þa wæs mycel yst windes geworden; &amp; yþa he
awearp on þæt scyp þæt hit gefylled wæs.
 4.38. &amp; he wæs on scipe ofer bolster slapende, &amp; hi
awehton hine &amp; cwædon, ne belimpð to þe þæt we forwurþað.
 4.39. &amp; he aras &amp; þam winde bebead &amp; cwæð to
ðære sæ, Suwa &amp; gestille; &amp; se wind geswac þa, &amp; wearð
mycel smyltnes.
 4.40. &amp; he sæde him, hwi synt ge forhte; Gyt ge nabbað
geleafan.
 4.41. &amp; hi micclum ege him ondredon, &amp; cwædon ælc to
oðrum, hwæt wenst þu, hwæt is ðes þæt him wyndas &amp; sæ
hyrsumiað?
 5.1. Ða comon hi ofer þære sæs muðan on þæt rice
Hierasenorum.
 5.2. &amp; him of scipe gangendum him sona agen arn an man of þam
byrgenum on unclænum gaste.
 5.3. Se hæfde on byrgenum scræf &amp; hine nan man mid
racenteagum ne mihte gebindan.
 5.4. Forþam he oft mid fotcoppsum &amp; racenteagum gebunden,
toslat þa raceteaga &amp; þa fotcoppsas tobræc, &amp; hine nan man
gewyldan ne mihte.
 5.5. &amp; symle dæges &amp; nihtes he wæs on byrgenum and on
muntum, hrymende &amp; hine sylfne mid stanum ceorfende.
 5.6. Soðlice ða he þone Hælend feorran geseah, he arn
&amp; hine gebæd.
 5.7. &amp; mycelre stemne hrymende &amp; þus cwæð, eala
mæra Hælend Godes sunu, hwæt is me &amp; þe; Ic halsige þe ðurh
God þæt ðu me ne þreage.
 5.8. Þa cwæð se Hælend, eala unclæna gast, ga of
ðysum men.
 5.9. Ða ahsode he hine, hwæt is þin nama; þa cwæð he,
min nama is Legio, forþam we manega synt.
 5.10. &amp; he hine swyðe bæd þæt he hine of þam rice
ne dyde.
 5.11. Þar wæs embe þone munt mycel swyna heord læsgende.
 5.12. &amp; þa unclænan gastas hine bædon &amp; cwædon,
send us on þas swyn þæt we on hi gegan.
 5.13. &amp; þa lyfde se Hælend sona, &amp; ða eodon þa
unclænan gastas on þa swyn, &amp; on myclum hryre seo heord wearð on
sæ besceofen twa þusendo &amp; wurdon adruncene on ðære sæ.
 5.14. Soþlice þa ðe hi heoldon flugon &amp; cyddon on
þære ceastre &amp; on lande &amp; hi ut eodon þæt hi gesawon hwæt
þar gedon wære.
 5.15. &amp; hi comon to þam Hælende &amp; hi gesawon þone
ðe mid deofle gedreht wæs, gescrydne sittan, &amp; hales modes, &amp; hi
him ondredon.
 5.16. &amp; hi rehton him þa ðe hit gesawon hu hit gedon
wæs, be þam ðe deofolseocnesse hæfde &amp; be þam swynum.
 5.17. &amp; hi bædon þæt he of hyra gemærum fore.
 5.18. Þa he on scip eode hine ongan biddan se ðe ær mid
deofle gedreht wæs, þæt he mid him wære.
 5.19. Him þa se hælend ne getiðode, ac he sæde him, ga to
þinum huse to þinum hiwum &amp; cyð him hu mycel drihten gedyde &amp; he
gemiltsode þe.
 5.20. And he ða ferde &amp; ongan bodigean on Decapolim hu fela
se Hælend him dyde, &amp; hig ealle þæs wundredon.
 5.21. And þa se hælend eft on scype ferde ofer þone muþan
him com to mycel menigu &amp; wæs ymbe þa sæ.
 5.22. &amp; ða com sum of heahgesamnungum Iairus hatte, &amp;
þa he hine geseah he astrehte hine to his fotum.
 5.23. &amp; hine swyðe bæd, &amp; he cwæð, Min dohtor is
on ytemestum siðe, cum &amp; sete þine hand ofer hi þæt heo hal sy
&amp; lybbe.
 5.24. Ða ferde he mid him &amp; him fyligde mycel menigeo &amp;
þrungon hine.
 5.25. &amp; þa þæt wif ðe on blodryne twelf winter
wæs.
 5.26. &amp; fram manegum læcum fela þinga þolode, &amp;
dælde eall þæt heo ahte, &amp; hit naht ne fremode, ac wæs þe
wyrse.
 5.27. Þa heo be ðam Hælende gehyrde heo com wiðæftan
þa menigu &amp; his reaf æthran.
 5.28. Soðlice heo cwæð, gif ic furþon his reafes
æthrine ic beo hal.
 5.29. And þa sona wearð hyre blodes ryne adruwod, &amp; heo on
hire gefredde þæt heo of þam wite gehæled wæs.
 5.30. And þa se Hælend oncneow on him sylfum þæt him
mægen ofeode; He cwæð bewend to þære menigu, hwa æthran mines
reafes?
 5.31. Þa cwædon his leorningcnihtas þu gesyxst þas menigu
þe ðringende, &amp; þu cwyst, hwa æthran me?
 5.32. And þa beseah he hine þæt he gesawe þæne ðe
þæt dyde.
 5.33. Ðat wif þa ondrædende &amp; forhtigende com &amp;
astrehte hi beforan him &amp; sæde him eall þæt riht.
 5.34. Þa cwæð se Hælend, dohtor þin geleafa þe hale
gedyde; Ga þe on sibbe &amp; beo of ðisum hal.
 5.35. Him þa gyt sprecendum hi comon fram þam heahgesamnungum
&amp; cwædon, ðin dohtor is dead; Hwi drecst þu leng þone lareow?
 5.36. Þa he gehyrde þæt word þa cwæð se Hælend, ne
ondræd þu, ðe gelyf for an.
 5.37. And he ne let him ænigne fyligean buton Petrum &amp;
Iacobum &amp; Iohannem, Iacobes broðor.
 5.38. &amp; hi comon on þæs heahealdres hus, &amp; he geseah
mycel gehlyd wepende &amp; geomriende.
 5.39. And þa he ineode, he cwæð, hwi synd ge gedrefede &amp;
wepað; Nis þis mæden na dead ac heo slæpð.
 5.40. Ða tældon hi hine; He þa eallum ut adrifenum; Nam
petrum &amp; þæs mædenes modor, &amp; þa ðe mid him wæron, &amp;
inneodon suwiende þar þæt mæden wæs.
 5.41. &amp; hire hand nam &amp; cwæð, <foreign>thalimthacumi,</foreign>
þæt is on ure geþeode gereht, mæden þe ic secge aris.
 5.42. &amp; heo sona aras &amp; eode; Soðlice heo wæs twelf
wintre, &amp; ealle hi wundredon mycelre wundrunge.
 5.43. &amp; he him þearle bebead þæt hi hyt nanum men ne
sædon &amp; he het hire etan syllan.
 6.1. And þa he ðanon eode he ferde on his eðel, &amp; him
folgodon his leorningcnihtas.
 6.2. &amp; gewordenum restedæge he ongann on gesamnunge læran
&amp; manege gehyrdon &amp; wundrodon on his lare &amp; cwædon, hwanon synd
þyssum ealle þas ðincg and hwæt is se wisdom þe him geseald is,
&amp; swylce mihta þe ðurh his handa gewordene synd?
 6.3. Hu nys þys se smið Marian sunu, Iacobes broðor, &amp;
Iosepes, &amp; Iude &amp; Simonis; Hu ne synt his swustra her mid us; &amp;
þa wurdon hi gedrefede.
 6.4. Þa cwæð se Hælend, soðlice nis nan witega buton
wurðscipe, buton on his eðele &amp; on his mægðe, &amp; on his huse?
 6.5. And he ne mihte þar ænig mægen wyrcan, buton feawa
untrume onasettum his handum he gehælde.
 6.6. &amp; he wundrode for heora ungeleafan; He ða lærende
þa castel beferde.
 6.7. &amp; him twelfe togeclypode, &amp; agan hi sendan twam &amp;
twam, &amp; him anweald sealde unclænra gasta.
 6.8. &amp; him bebead þæt hi naht on wege ne namon buton gyrde
ane, ne codd ne hlaf, ne feoh on heora gyrdlum.
 6.9. Ac gesceode mid calcum &amp; þæt hi mid twam tunecum
gescrydde næron.
 6.10. And he cwæð to him, swa hwylc hus swa ge ingað,
wuniað þar oð þæt ge utgan.
 6.11. &amp; swa hwylce swa eow ne gehyrað; þonne ge þanon ut
gað asceacað þæt dust of eowrum fotum, him on gewitnesse.
 6.12. And utgangende hi bodedon þæt hi dædbote dydon.
 6.13. &amp; hi manega deofolseocnessa utadrifon, &amp; manega
untrume mid ele smyredon &amp; gehældon.
 6.14. And þa gehyrde Herodes se cyng þæt; Soþlice his nama
wæs swutol geworden &amp; he cwæð, witodlice Iohannes se fulluhtere of
deaðe aras, &amp; on him synd forþam mægenu geworht.
 6.15. Sume cwædon he is Elias, sume cwædon he is witega,
swylce an of þam witegum.
 6.16. Ða Herodes þæt gehyrde he cwæð, se Iohannes þe
ic beheafdode se aras of deaðe.
 6.17. Soðlice Herodes sende &amp; het Iohannem gebindan on
cwerterne, for þære Herodiadiscan his broðor lafe Philippus, for þam
ðe he nam hi.
 6.18. Þa sæde Iohannes Herode, nys þe alyfed to hæbbenne
þines broðer wif.
 6.19. Ða syrwde Herodias ymbe hine &amp; wolde hine ofslean &amp;
heo ne mihte.
 6.20. Soðlice Herodes ondred Iohannem &amp; wiste þæt he
wæs rihtwis &amp; halig, &amp; he heold hine on cwerterne, &amp; he gehyrde
þæt he fela wundra worhte &amp; he luflice him hyrde.
 6.21. Þa se dæg com Herodes gebrydtide he gegearwode mycele
feorme his ealdormannum, &amp; þam fyrmestum on Galilea.
 6.22. &amp; þa ða þære Herodiadiscan dohtor inneode &amp;
tumbode, hit licode Herode, &amp; eallum þam ðe him mid sæton; Se cing
cwæð þa to ðam mædene, bide me swa hwæt swa þu wylle &amp; ic
þe sylle.
 6.23. And he swor hire, soðes ic þe sylle swa hwæt swa þu
me bitst, þeah þu wylle healf min rice.
 6.24. Ða heo ut eode heo cwæð to hyre meder, hwæs bidde
ic; þa cwæþ heo, Iohannes, heafod þæs fulluhteres.
 6.25. Sona þa heo mid ofste inn to þam cinincge eode, heo
bæd &amp; þus cwæð, ic wylle þæt ðu me hrædlice on anum
disce sylle Iohannes heafod.
 6.26. Þa wearð se cinincg geunret for þam aðe, &amp; for
þam ðe him mid sæton; Nolde þeah hi geunretan.
 6.27. Ac sende ænne cwellere &amp; bebead þæt man his
heafod on anum disce brohte; And he hine þa on cwerterne beheafdode.
 6.28. &amp; his heafod on disce brohte &amp; hit sealde þam
mædene, &amp; þæt mæden hit sealde hire meder.
 6.29. Ða his cnihtas þæt gehyrdon hi comon &amp; his lic
namon, &amp; hine on byrgene ledon.
 6.30. Soðlice þa ða apostolas togædere comon, hi cyddon
þam Hælende eall þæt hi dydon &amp; hi lærdon.
 6.31. &amp; he sæde him, cumað &amp; uton gan onsundron on
weste stowe, &amp; us hwon restan; Soðlice manega wæron þe comon &amp;
agenhwyrfdon &amp; fyrst næfdon þæt hi æton.
 6.32. &amp; on scype stigende, hi foron onsundran on weste stowe.
 6.33. &amp; gesawon hi farende, &amp; hi gecneowon manega; And
gangende of þam burgum þyder urnon, &amp; him beforan comon.
 6.34. And þa se Hælend ðanon eode, he geseah mycele menegu,
&amp; he gemiltsode him for þam þe hi wæron swa swa scep þe nanne
hyrde nabbað, and he ongan hi fela læran.
 6.35. &amp; þa hit mycel ylding wæs, his leorningcnihtas him
to comon &amp; cwædon, þeos stow is weste &amp; tima is forð agan.
 6.36. Forlæt þas menegu, þæt hi faran on gehende tunas,
&amp; him mete bicgan, þæt hi eton.
 6.37. Þa cwæð he, sylle ge him etan; ða cwædon hi uton
gan, &amp; mid twam hundred penegon hlafas bicgan, &amp; we him etan syllað.
 6.38. Ða cwæð he, hu fela hlafa hæbbe ge; Gað &amp;
lociað; &amp; þa hi wiston hi cwædon, fif hlafas &amp; twegen fixas.
 6.39. &amp; þa bebead se Hælend þæt ðæt folc sæte
ofer þæt grene hig.
 6.40. &amp; hi þa sæton hundredon &amp; fiftigon.
 6.41. &amp; fif hlafum &amp; twam fixum onfangenum, he on heofon
locode &amp; hi bletsode, &amp; þa hlafas bræc, &amp; sealde his
leorningcnihtum, þæt hi toforan him asetton, &amp; twegen fixas him eallon
dælde.
 6.42. &amp; hi æton þa ealle &amp; gefyllede wurdon.
 6.43. And hi namon þara hlafa &amp; fixa lafe twelf wilian
fulle.
 6.44. Soðlice fif þusend manna þara etendra wæron.
 6.45. Ða sona he nydde his leorningcnihtas on scyp stigan,
þæt hi him beforan foron ofer þæne muþan to Bethsaida, oþ he
þæt folc forlete.
 6.46. And þa he hi forlet he ferde on þone munt &amp; hine ana
þar gebæd.
 6.47. And þa æfen wæs þæt scyp wæs on middre sæ,
&amp; he ana wæs on lande.
 6.48. &amp; he geseah hi on rewette swincende, him wæs
wiðerweard wind; And on niht embe þa feorþan wæccan he com to him ofer
þa sæ gangende, &amp; wolde hi forbugan.
 6.49. Þa hi hine gesawon ofer þa sæ gangende hi wendon
þæt hit unfæle gast wære, &amp; hi clypedon.
 6.50. Hi ealle hine gesawon, &amp; wurdon gedrefede &amp; sona he
spræc to him &amp; cwæð, gelyfaþ ic hit eom, ne þurfon ge eow
ondrædan.
 6.51. &amp; he on scyp to him eode, &amp; se wind geswac &amp; hi
þæs þe ma betwux him wundredon.
 6.52. Ne ongeton hi be þam hlafon; Soðlice heora heorte wæs
ablend.
 6.53. And þa hi ofersegledon, hi comon to Genesar, &amp; þar
wicedon.
 6.54. &amp; þa hi of scipe eodon, sona hi hine gecneowon.
 6.55. And eall þæt rice befarende hi on sæccingum bæron
þa untruman, þar hi hine gehyrdon.
 6.56. And swa hwar swa he on wic oþþe on tunas eode, on
stræton hi þa untruman ledon, &amp; hine bædon þæt hi huru his
refes fnæd æthrinon, &amp; swa fela swa hine æthrinon hi wurdon hale.
 7.1. Þa comon to him Pharisei &amp; sume boceras cumende fram
Hierusalem.
 7.2. &amp; þa hi gesawon sume of his leorningcnihton besmitenum
handum, þæt is, unþwogenum handum, etan; Hi tældon hi &amp;
cwædon.
 7.3. Pharisei &amp; ealle Iudeas ne etað buton hi hyra handa
gelomlice þwean, healdende hyra yldrena gesetnessa.
 7.4. &amp; on stræte hi ne etað buton hi geþwegene beon;
&amp; manega oþre synd þe him gesette synt, þæt is calicea frymða
&amp; ceaca &amp; arfata &amp; mæstlinga.
 7.5. And þa axodon hine Pharisei &amp; þa boceras, hwi ne gað
þine leorningcnihtas æfter ure yldrena gesetnysse, ac besmitenum handum
hyra hlaf þicgað?
 7.6. Ða andswarode he him, wel witegod Isaias be eow licceterum
swa hit awriten is, þis folc me mid welerum wurðað; Soðlice hyra heorte
is feor fram me.
 7.7. On idel hi me wurðiað, &amp; manna lare &amp; bebodu
lærað.
 7.8. Soþlice ge forlætað godes bebod, &amp; healdað manna
laga, þweala ceaca &amp; calica &amp; manega oþre þylce ðing ge doð.
 7.9. Ða sæde he him, wel ge on idel dydon godes bebod þæt
ge eower laga healdon.
 7.10. Moyses cwæð, wurða þinne fæder &amp; þine
modor; &amp; se ðe wyrigþ his fæder &amp; his modor, swelte se deaþe.
 7.11. Soðlice ge cweþað, gif hwa segð his fæder &amp;
meder <foreign>corban</foreign>, þæt is, on ure geðeode gyfu, gif hwylc is of me þe
fremað.
 7.12. &amp; ofer þæt ge ne lætað hine ænig þing don
his fæder oððe meder.
 7.13. Toslitende godes bebod for eower stuntan lage þe ge
gesetton; &amp; manega oþre þing ðysum gelice ge doð.
 7.14. And eft þa menegu he him toclypode &amp; cwæð,
gehyraþ me ealle &amp; ongytað.
 7.15. Nis nan þing of þam men on hine gangende þæt hine
besmitan mæge; Ac þa ðing þe of ðam men forðgað þa hine
besmitað.
 7.16. Gif hwa earan hæbbe gehlyste me.
 7.17. And þa se hælend fram þære menegu eode his
leorningcnihtas hine an bigspell ahsodon.
 7.18. Þa cwæð he, &amp; synt ge þus ungleawe ne ongyte ge
þæt eall þæt utan cymð on þone man gangende ne mæg hine
besmitan.
 7.19. Forþam hit ne gæð on his heortan ac on his innoð;
&amp; on forðgang gewiteð ealle mettas clænsigende.
 7.20. Ða sæde he him þæt ða þing ðe of þam men
gað þa hine besmitað.
 7.21. Innan of manna heortan yfele geþancas cumað,
unrihthæmedu &amp; forligeru, manslihtas.
 7.22. Gytsung, man, facnu, sceamleast, yfel gesihð, dysinessa,
ofermodignessa, stuntscipe.
 7.23. &amp; ealle þas yfelu of þam innoðe cumað &amp;
þone man besmitað.
 7.24. Ða ferde he þanon on þa endas Tiri &amp; Sidonis; &amp;
he inagan on þæt hus; He nolde þæt hit ænig wiste, &amp; he ne
mihte hit bemiðan.
 7.25. Sona þa an wif be him gehyrde þære dohtor hæfde
unclæne gast; Heo ineode &amp; to his fotum hi astrehte.
 7.26. Soðlice þæt wif wæs hæðen sirofenisces cynnes;
&amp; bæd hine þæt he ðone deofol of hyre dehter adrife.
 7.27. Þa sæde he hire, læt ærust þa bearn beon
gefylled; Nis na god þæt man nime þara bearna hlaf &amp; hundum worpe.
 7.28. Ða andswarode heo &amp; cwæð, Drihten þæt is
soð; Witodlice þa hwelpas etað under þære mysan of ðara cilda
cruman.
 7.29. Þa sæde he hyre for þære spræce, ga nu; Se
deofol of ðinre dehter gewit.
 7.30. And þa heo on hyre hus eode heo gemette þæt mæden
on hyre bedde licgende &amp; þone deofol utgan.
 7.31. And eft he eode of Tira gemærum &amp; com þurh Sidonem
to þære Galileiscan Sæ betwux midde endas Decapoleos.
 7.32. &amp; hi læddon him ænne deafne &amp; dumbne, &amp;
hine bædon þæt he his hand him on sette.
 7.33. Ða nam he hine onsundran of þære menigu, &amp; his
fingras on his earan dyde &amp; spætende his tungan onhran.
 7.34. &amp; on þone heofon behealdende geomrode &amp; cwæð,
Effeta, þæt is, on ure geþeode sy þu ontyned.
 7.35. And sona wurdon his earan geopenode, &amp; his tungan bend
wearð unslyped &amp; he rihte spræc.
 7.36. And he bead him þæt hi hit nanum men ne sædon;
Soþlice swa he him swiþor bebead, swa hi swiðor bodedon.
 7.37. &amp; þæs þe ma wundredon &amp; cwædon, ealle
þing he wel dyde; &amp; he dyde þæt deafe gehyrdon &amp; dumbe
spræcon.
 8.1. Eft on þam dagum him wæs mid micel menigu &amp; næfdon
hwæt hi æton.
 8.2. Þa cwæþ he tosomne geclypedum his leorningcnihtum, ic
gemiltsige þysse menegu forþam hi þry dagas me geanbidiað &amp;
nabbað hwæt hi eton.
 8.3. Gif ic hi fæstende to hyra husum læte, be wege hi
geteorigeað.
 8.4. Sume hi comon feorran.
 8.4. &amp; þa andswarodan him his leorningcnihtas, hwanon mæg
ænig man þas mid hlafum on þisum westene gefyllan?
 8.5. Þa axode he hi, hu fela hlafa hæbbe ge; Hi cwædon,
seofan.
 8.6. Ða het he sittan þa menegu ofer þa eorþan; And nam
þa seofon hlafas &amp; Gode þancode; &amp; hi bræc &amp; sealde his
leorningcnihtum þæt hi toforan him asetton, &amp; hi swa dydon.
 8.7. And hi næfdon buton feawa fixa, &amp; he þa bletsode,
&amp; het beforan him settan.
 8.8. &amp; hi æton &amp; wurdon gefyllede; &amp; hi namon
þæt of þam brytsenum belaf seofon wilian fulle.
 8.9. Soðlice þa ðe þar æton wæron fif þusend; &amp;
he hi þa forlet.
 8.10. And sona he on scyp mid his leorningcnihtum astah, &amp; com
on þa dælas Dalmanuða.
 8.11. And þa ferdon ða pharisei, &amp; ongunnon mid him
smeagean, &amp; tacen of heofone sohton &amp; his fandedon.
 8.12. Þa cwæð he geomriende on his gaste, hwi secð þeos
cneoris tacen; Soþlice ic eow secge, ne bið þisse cneorisse tacen
geseald.
 8.13. &amp; hi þa forlætende eft on scyp astah, &amp; ferde
ofer þone muðan.
 8.14. &amp; hi ofergeton þæt hi hlafas ne namon, &amp; hi
næfdon on scype mid him buton ænne hlaf.
 8.15. &amp; he him bead &amp; cwæð, lociað &amp; warniað
fram Pharisea &amp; Herodes hæfe.
 8.16. Þa þohton hi betwux him &amp; cwædon, næbbe we nane
hlafas.
 8.17. Þa se hælend þæt wiste he cwæð, hwæt
þence ge forþam ge hlafas nabbað; Gyt ge ne oncnawað ne ne ongytað;
Gyt ge habbað eowre heortan geblende?
 8.18. Eagan ge habbað &amp; ne geseoð, &amp; earan &amp; ne
gehyrað; Ne ge ne þencaþ.
 8.19. Hwænne ic bræc fif hlafas &amp; twegen fixas &amp; hu
fela wyligena ge namon fulle; Hi cwædon, þa twelfe.
 8.20. And hwænne seofon hlafas feower þusendum &amp; hu fela
wyligena brytsyna ge namon; Hi sædon, seofon.
 8.21. Ða sæde he him, hwi ne ongyte ge gyt?
 8.22. And hi comon þa to Bedzaida, &amp; hi brohton him þa
ænne blindne, &amp; hine bædon þæt he hine æthrine.
 8.23. &amp; þa æthran he þæs blindan hand, &amp; lædde
hine butan þa wic; &amp; spætte on his eagan, &amp; his hand onasette,
&amp; hine axode hwæþer he aht gesawe.
 8.24. Ða cwæð he þa ða he hine beseah; Ic geseo men
swylce treow gangende.
 8.25. Eft he asette his handa ofer his eagan &amp; he geseah þa,
&amp; wearð geedniwod, swa þæt he beorhtlice eall geseah.
 8.26. Ða sende he hine to his huse &amp; cwæð, ga to þinum
huse, &amp; ðeah þu on tun ga nænegum þu hit ne sege.
 8.27. Ða eode he &amp; his leorningcnihtas on þæt castel
Cesareæ Philippi; &amp; he on wege his leorningcnihtas ahsode, hwæt
secgað men þæt ic sy?
 8.28. Þa andswarodon hi, sume Iohannem þone Fulluhtere, sume
Heliam, sume sumne of þam witegum.
 8.29. Ða cwæð he, hwæt secge ge þæt ic sy; þa
andswarude Petrus him &amp; cwæð, ðu eart Crist.
 8.30. &amp; ða bead he him þæt hi nænegum be him ne
sædon.
 8.31. Ða ongan he hi læran þæt mannes sunu gebyreð fela
þinga þolian &amp; beon aworpen fram ealdormannum &amp; heahsacerdum &amp;
bocerum &amp; beon ofslegen &amp; æfter þrim dagum arisan.
 8.32. &amp; spræc þa openlice; &amp; þa nam Petrus hine,
&amp; ongan hine þreagean.
 8.33. Þa bewende he hine &amp; cidde Petre &amp; cwæð, ga
onbæc Satanas forþam þu nast þa ðing þe synd Godes ac þa ðing
þe synd manna.
 8.34. Þa cwæð he togædere geclypedre menegu mid his
leorningcnihtum, gif hwa wyle me fyligean, wiðsace hine sylfne &amp; nime his
cwylminge &amp; folgige me.
 8.35. Se ðe wyle his sawle hale gedon, se hi forspilð; Se ðe
forspilð his sawle for me &amp; for þam godspelle se hi gehælð.
 8.36. Hwæt fremað men ðeah he eallne middaneard gestryne
&amp; do his sawle forwyrd?
 8.37. Oþþe hwylc gewryxl sylð se man for his sawle?
 8.38. Soðlice se þe me forsyhð &amp; mine word on þisre
unrihthæmedan &amp; synfulran cneorisse, ðone mannes sunu forsyhþ
ðonne he cymð on his Fæder wuldre mid halgum englum.
 9.1. Þa sæde he him soðlice, ic secge eow þæt syme synt
her wuniende þe deað ne onbyrigeað ær hi geseon Godes rice on mægne
cuman.
 9.2. Ða æfter syx dagum nam se Hælend Petrum &amp; Iacobum
&amp; Iohannem &amp; lædde hi sylfe onsundran on sumne heahne munt &amp;
wearð beforan him oferhiwud.
 9.3. &amp; his reaf wurdon glitiniende swa hwite swa snaw swa nan
fullere ofer eorðan ne mæg swa hwite gedon.
 9.4. Þa ætywde him Helias mid Moyse &amp; to him spræcon.
 9.5. Ða andswarode Petrus him &amp; cwæð, Lareow, god is
þæt we her beon; &amp; uton wyrcan her þreo eardungstowa, þe ane &amp;
Moyse ane &amp; Helie ane.
 9.6. Soðlice he nyste hwæt he cwæð, he wæs afæred
mid ege.
 9.7. And seo lyft hi ofersceadewude, &amp; stefn com of þære
lyfte &amp; cwæð, þes is min leofesta sunu; Gehyrað hine.
 9.8. And sona ða hi besawon hi nanne hi mid him ne gesawon buton
þone Hælend sylfne mid him.
 9.9. And þa hi of þam munte astigon he bead him þæt hi
nanum ne sædon þa ðing þe hi gesawon buton þonne mannes sunu of
deaðe arise.
 9.10. Hi þa ðæt word geheoldon betwux him &amp; smeadon
hwæt þæt wære þonne he of deaðe arise.
 9.11. And hi hine ahsodon þa, hwæt secgað Pharisei &amp;
þa boceras þæt gebyrað æryst Helias cume?
 9.12. Ða sæde he him andswariende, Helias ealle þing
geedniwað þonne he cymð; Swa be mannes suna awriten is þæt he fela
ðolige &amp; si oferhogod.
 9.13. Ac ic secge eow þæt Helias com, &amp; hi dydon him swa
hwæt swa hi woldon swa be him awriten is.
 9.14. And þa he com to his leorningcnihtum he geseah mycele
menegu abutan hi, &amp; boceras mid him sprecende.
 9.15. &amp; sona eall folc þæne Hælend geseonde wearð
afæryd &amp; forht, &amp; hine gretende him to urnon.
 9.16. Þa ahsode he hi, hwæt smeage ge betwux eow?
 9.17. Him andswarode an of þære menigu, Lareow, ic brohte
minne sunu dumbne gast hæbbende.
 9.18. Se swa hwær swa he hine gelæcð forgnit hine, &amp;
toðum gristbitað &amp; forscrincþ; &amp; ic sæde þinum
leorningcnihtum þæt hi hine ut adrifon &amp; hi ne mihton.
 9.19. Ða andswarode he him, eala ungeleaffulle cneorys, swa lange
swa ic mid eow beo swa lange ic eow þolige; Bringað hine to me.
 9.20. Þa brohton hi hine; &amp; þa he hine geseah sona se gast
hine gedrefde, &amp; on eorðan forgnyden fæmende he tearflode.
 9.21. And þa ahsode he his fæder, hu lang tid is syððan
him þis gebyrede; þa cwæð, he of cildhade.
 9.22. He hine gelomlice on fyr &amp; on wæter sende þæt he
hine forspilde; Ac gif þu hwæt miht gefylst us ure gemiltsud.
 9.23. Ða cwæð se Hælend, gif þu gelyfan miht ealle
þing synd gelyfedum mihtlice.
 9.24. Ða sona hrymde þæs cildes fæder &amp; wepende
cwæð, drihten, ic gelyfe; Gefylst minre ungeleaffulnysse.
 9.25. And þa se Hælend geseah þa toyrnendan menegu, he
bebead þam unclænan gaste þus cweðende, eala deafa &amp; dumba gast,
ic beode þe ga of him &amp; ne ga þu leng on hine.
 9.26. He ða hrymende &amp; hine swyþe slitende eode of him;
&amp; he wæs swylce he dead wære swa þæt manega cwædon, soðlice
he is dead.
 9.27. Þa nam se Hælend his hand &amp; hine up ahof &amp; he
aras þa.
 9.28. And þa he into þam huse eode his leorningcnihtas hine
digollice ahsodon, hwi ne mihton we hine ut adrifan?
 9.29. Ða sæde he, þis cynn ne mæg of nanum men ut gan
buton þurh gebedu &amp; on fæstene.
 9.30. Þa hi þanon ferdon hi forbugon Galileam; He nolde
þæt hit ænig man wiste.
 9.31. Soðlice he lærde his leorningcnihtas &amp; sæde,
soþlice mannes sunu bið geseald on synfulra handa þæt hi hine ofslean,
&amp; ofslagen þam ðriddan dæge he arist.
 9.32. Ða nyston hi þæt word &amp; hi adredon hine ahsiende.
 9.33. Þa comon hi to Capharnaum &amp; þa hi æt ham wæron
he ahsode hi, hwæt smeade ge be wege?
 9.34. &amp; hi suwodon; Witodlice hi on wege smeadon hwylc hyra
yldost wære.
 9.35. Þa he sæt he clypode hi twelfe &amp; sæde him, gif
eower hwylc wyle beon fyrmest, beo se eaðmodust &amp; eower ealra þen.
 9.36. Þa nam he anne cnapan &amp; gesette on hyra middele; þa
he hine beclypte he sæde him.
 9.37. Swa hwylc swa anne of þus geradum cnapum on minum naman
onfehð se onfehþ me; And se þe me onfehð he ne onfehþ me ac þone
þe me sende.
 9.38. Ða andswarode Iohannes &amp; cwæð, lareow, sumne we
gesawon on þinum naman deofolseocnessa ut adrifende se ne fyligð us, &amp;
we him forbudon.
 9.39. Þa cwæð he, ne forbeode ge him; Nis nan þe on minum
naman mægen wyrce &amp; mæge raðe be me yfele specan.
 9.40. Se þe nis agen eow se is for eow.
 9.41. Soðlice se ðe sylð drinc eow calic fulne wæteres on
minum naman forþam ge Cristes synt ic eow soþ secge, ne forlyst he his
mede.
 9.42. And swa hwa swa gedrefð ænne of þyssum lytlingum on me
gelyfendum betere him wære þæt an cweornstan wære to his swuran
gecnyt &amp; wære on sæ beworpen.
 9.43. And gif þin hand þe swicað, ceorf hi of; Betere þe is
þæt þu wanhal to life ga þonne þu twa handa hæbbe &amp; fare on
helle &amp; on unacwencedlic fyr.
 9.44. Þar hyra wyrm ne swylt &amp; fyr ne bið acwenced.
 9.45. And gif ðin fot swicað þe, ceorf hine of; Betere þe
is þæt þu healt ga on ece lif þonne þu hæbbe twegen fet &amp; si
aworpen on helle unacwencedlices fyres.
 9.46. Þar hyra wyrm ne swylt ne fyr ne bið adwæsced.
 9.47. Gif þin eage þe swicað, weorp hit ut; Betere þe is
mid anum eagan gan on godes rice þonne twa eagan hæbbende sy aworpen on
helle fyr.
 9.48. Þar hyra wyrm ne swylt ne fyr ne bið acwenced.
 9.49. Soðlice ælc man bið mid fyre gesylt &amp; ælc
offrung bið mid sealte gesylt.
 9.50. God is sealt gif þæt sealt unsealt biþ on þam þe
ge hit syltað; Habbað sealt on eow &amp; habbað sibbe betwux eow.
 10.1. And þanon he com on Iudeisce endas of Iordane; þa comon
eft menigu to him &amp; swa swa he gewunode he hi lærde eft sona.
 10.2. Ða genealæhton him Pharisei &amp; hine axodon
hwæþer alyfð ænegum men his wif forlætan his þus fandigende.
 10.3. Þa andswarode he him, hwæt bead Moyses eow?
 10.4. Hi sædon, Moyses lyfde þæt man write hiwgedales boc
&amp; hi forlete.
 10.5. Ða cwæð se Hælend, for eower heortan heardnesse he
eow wrat þis bebod.
 10.6. Fram fruman gesceafte God hi geworhte wæpnedman &amp;
wimman.
 10.7. &amp; cwæð, for þam se mann forlæt his fæder
&amp; modor &amp; hine his wife geþeot.
 10.8. &amp; beoð twegen on anum flæsce; Witodlice ne synt na
twegen ac an flæsc.
 10.9. Þæt god gesamnode ne syndrige þæt nan man.
 10.10. And eft innan huse his leorningcnihtas hine be þam ylcan
ahsodon.
 10.11. Ða cwæð he, swa hwylc mann swa his wif forlæt
&amp; oþer nimð unrihthæmed he wyrcð þurh hi.
 10.12. And gif þæt wif hire were forlæt &amp; oþerne
nimð heo unrihthæmð.
 10.13. And hi brohton him hyra lytlingas þæt he hi æthrine;
þa ciddon his leorningcnihtas þam ðe hi brohton.
 10.14. Þa se Hælend hi geseah unwurðlice he hit forbead
&amp; sæde him, lætað þa lytlingas to me cuman &amp; ne forbeode ge
him; Soðlice swylcera is heofona rice.
 10.15. Soþlice ic secge eow swa hwylc swa godes rice ne onfehð
swa lytling ne mæg he þæt.
 10.16. Ða beclypte he hi &amp; his handa ofer hi settende
bletsode hi.
 10.17. And þa he on wege eode, sum him to arn &amp; gebigedum
cneowe toforan him cwæð &amp; bæd hine, la goda lareow, hwæt do ic
þæt ic ece lif age?
 10.18. Þa cwæð se Hælend, hwi segst þu me godne; Nis
nan mann god buton god ana.
 10.19. Canst þu ða bebodu, ne unrihthæm þu, ne slyh þu,
ne stel þu, ne sege þu lease gewitnesse facen ne do ðu, wurða þinne
fæder &amp; þine modor?
 10.20. Ða andswarode he, goda Lareow, eall ðis ic geheold of
minre geoguðe.
 10.21. Se Hælend hine þa behealdende lufode &amp; sæde him,
an þing þe is wana; Gesyle eall þæt ðu age &amp; syle hit þearfum;
þonne hæfst þu goldhord on heofonum &amp; cum &amp; folga me.
 10.22. And for þam worde he wæs geunret &amp; ferde
gnornigende for þam he hæfde mycele æhta.
 10.23. Þa cwæð se Hælend to his leorningcnihton hine
beseonde, swyþe earfoðlice on godes rice gað þa þe feoh habbað.
 10.24. Ða forhtodon his leorningcnihtas be his wordum; Eft se
Hælend him andswariende cwæð, eala, cild, swyðe earfoðlice þa
ðe on heora feo getruwigeað gað on godes rice.
 10.25. Eaþere ys olfende to farenne þurh nædle þyrel
þonne se rica &amp; se welega on godes rice ga.
 10.26. Hi þæs ðe ma betwux him wundredon &amp; cwædon,
&amp; hwa mæg beon hal?
 10.27. Þa beheold se Hælend hi &amp; cwæð, mid mannum hit
is uneaþelic ac na mid Gode; Ealle þing mid Gode synt eaðelice.
 10.28. Þa ongan Petrus cweþan, Witodlice we ealle þing
forleton &amp; folgodon þe.
 10.29. Ða andswarode him se Hælend, nis nan þe his hus
forlæt oððe gebroþru oþþe geswustra oððe fæder oþþe
modor oððe bearn oþþe æceras for me &amp; for þam godspelle.
 10.30. Þe hundfeald ne onfo nu on þisse tide, hus &amp;
broðru &amp; swustru fæder &amp; modor &amp; bearn &amp; æceras mid
ehtnessum, &amp; on toweardre worulde, ece lif.
 10.31. Manega fyrmeste beoð ytemeste, &amp; ytemeste fyrmyste.
 10.32. Soþlice hi ferdon on wege to Hierusalem, &amp; se
Hælend him beforan eode, &amp; hi adredon him hine &amp; him fyligdon; &amp;
eft he nam hi twelfe &amp; ongan him secgan þa ðing þe him towearde
wæron.
 10.33. Þæt we nu astigað to Hierusalem &amp; mannes sunu
bið geseald sacerda ealdrum &amp; bocerum &amp; ealdrum; &amp; hi hine
deaðe genyþeriað &amp; hi hine þeodum syllað.
 10.34. &amp; hi hine bysmirað &amp; hi him on spætað &amp;
hine swingað &amp; ofsleað hine; &amp; he arist on þam þriddan
dæge.
 10.35. Him þa genealæhton to Iacobus &amp; Iohannes Zebedeis
suna &amp; cwædon, lareow, we wyllað þæt þu us do swa hwæt swa
we biddað.
 10.36. Þa cwæð he, hwæt wylle gyt þæt ic inc do?
 10.37. Þa cwædon hi, syle unc þæt wyt sitton on þinon
wuldre, an on þine swyðran healfe &amp; oþer on þine wynstran.
 10.38. Ða cwæð se Hælend, gyt nyton hwæt gyt biddað;
Mage gyt drincan þone calic þe ic drince &amp; beon gefullod on þam
fulluhte þe ic beo gefullod?
 10.39. Þa cwædon hi, wyt magon; ða cwæð se Hælend,
gyt drincað þone calic þe ic drince; gyt beoð gefullode þam fulluhte
ðe ic beo gefullod.
 10.40. Soðlice nis hit na min inc to syllene þæt gyt sitton
on mine swyðran healfe oððe on þa wynstran ac þam þe hit gegearwod
ys.
 10.41. Þa gebulgon þa tyne hi be Iacobe &amp; Iohanne.
 10.42. Ða clypode se Hælend hi &amp; cwæð, wite ge
þæt þa ðe on þeodum ealdorscype habbað þæt hyra ealdras
anweald ofer hi habbað.
 10.43. Soðlice on eow hit nis swa, ac swa hwylc swa wyle mid eow
yldest beon se byð eower þen.
 10.44. &amp; se ðe wyle on eow fyrmest beon se byþ ealra
þeow.
 10.45. Soðlice ne com mannes sunu þæt him man þenode ac
þæt he þenode &amp; his sawle sealde for manegra alysednysse.
 10.46. Þa comon hi to Gericho &amp; he ferde fram Gericho &amp;
his leorningcnihtas &amp; mycel menegu; Timeus sunu Bartimeus sæt blind
wið þone weg wædla.
 10.47. Þa he gehyrde þæt hit wæs se Nazareniscea
Hælend, he ongan þa clypian &amp; cweðan, Hælend, Dauides sunu,
gemiltsa me.
 10.48. Þa budon him manega þæt he suwode; He clypode þa
þæs ða ma, miltsa me, Dauides sunu.
 10.49. Ða ætstod se Hælend &amp; het hine clypian; þa
sædon hi þam blindan, beo geheortra &amp; aris; Se Hælend þe
clypað.
 10.50. He þa awearp his reaf &amp; forð ræsde &amp; to him
com.
 10.51. Ða cwæð se Hælend, hwæt wylt þu þæt ic
þe do; þa cwæð he, Lareow, þæt ic geseo.
 10.52. Þa cwæð se Hælend to him, ga, þin geleafa þe
halne gedyde; &amp; he sona geseah &amp; him fyligde on wege.
 11.1. Ða he genealæhte Hierusalem &amp; Bethania to Oliuetes
Dune, he sende his twegen leorningcnihtas.
 11.2. &amp; cwæð to him, faraþ to þam castele þe inc ys,
and gyt þar sona gemetað assan folan getigedne ofer þæne nan man gyt
ne sæt; Untigeað hine &amp; to me gelædað.
 11.3. And gyf hwa to inc hwæt cwyð, secgað þæt drihten
hæfð his neode &amp; he hine sona hider læt.
 11.4. &amp; þa hi utferdon hi gemetton þone folan ute on
twycenan beforan dura getigedne; þa untigdon hi hine.
 11.5. &amp; sume þe þar stodon þus sædon him, Hwæt do
gyt þone folan untigende?
 11.6. Þa cwædon hi, swa se Hælend unc bead, &amp; hi leton
hi þa.
 11.7. Ða læddon hi þone folan to þam Hælende, &amp; hi
hyra reaf on aledon &amp; he on sæt.
 11.8. Manega hyra reaf on þone weg strehton, sume þa boceras of
þam treowum heowon &amp; streowodon on þone weg.
 11.9. &amp; þa ðe beforan eodon &amp; þa ðe
æfterfolgodon cwædon þus, osanna, sy gebletsod se þe com on Drihtnes
naman.
 11.10. Si gebletsod þæt rice þe com ures fæder Dauides,
osanna on heahnessum.
 11.11. And he eode þa on Hierosolima templ &amp; ealle þing he
besceawode; þa æfentima wæs he ferde to Bethaniam mid his twelf
leorningcnihtum.
 11.12. And oþrum dæge þa hi ferdon fram Bethania hine
hingrode.
 11.13. Ða he feorran geseah an fictreow þe leaf hæfde, he
com &amp; sohte hwæþer he þar on aht funde; þa he him to com ne funde
he þar buton leaf ane; Soðlice hit wæs þæs fictreowes tima.
 11.14. Þa cwæð he, heonon forð on ecnesse ne ete ænig
mann wæstm of þe; &amp; his leorningcnihtas þæt gehyrdon.
 11.15. Þa comon hi eft to Hierusalem &amp; þa he on þæt
templ eode he ongann drifan of þam temple syllende &amp; bicgende, &amp;
mynetera þrocu &amp; heahsetlu þe þa culfran cypton he to bræc.
 11.16. &amp; he ne geþafode þæt ænig man ænig fæt
ðurh þæt templ bære.
 11.17. &amp; he þa lærende ðus cwæð to him, nis hit
awriten þæt min hus fram eallum þeodum bið genemned gebedhus;
Soðlice ge dydon þæt to sceaðena scræfe.
 11.18. Ða þæra sacerda ealdras &amp; þa boceras ðis
gehyrdon, hi þohton hu hi hine forspildon; þeh hi him adredon hine forðam
eall seo menigu wundrode be his lare.
 11.19. And þa hit æfen wæs he eode of þære ceastre.
 11.20. On merigen þa hi ferdon hi gesawon þæt fictreow
forscruncen of þam wyrtruman.
 11.21. Þa cwæð Petrus, Lareow, loca hu forscranc þæt
fictreow þe ðu wyrigdest.
 11.22. Ða cwæð se Hælend him andswarigende, habbað
Godes truwan.
 11.23. Ic secge eow to soðe, swa hwylc swa cwyþ to ðisum
munte, si þu afyrred &amp; on sæ aworpen, &amp; on his heortan ne twynað
ac gelyfð swa hwæt swa he cwyð gewurðe þis þæt gewyrð.
 11.24. Forþam ic eow secge, swa hwæt swa ge gyrnende biddað
gelyfað þæt ge hit onfoð, &amp; hit eow becymð.
 11.25. And þonne ge standað eow to gebiddenne, forgifaþ gif
ge hwæt agen ænigne habbað, þæt eow eower synna forgyfe eower
heofonlica fæder se ðe on heofonum ys.
 11.26. Gif ge ne forgyfað, ne eow eower synna ne forgyfð eower
heofonlica fæder.
 11.27. Ða com he eft to Hierusalem; &amp; þa he on þam temple
eode, him to genealæhton þa heahsacerdos &amp; boceras &amp; ealdras.
 11.28. &amp; þus cwædon, on hwylcum anwealde dest þu ðas
þing; &amp; hwa sealde þe ðisne anweald þæt þu ðis do?
 11.29. Þa cwæð se Hælend, &amp; ic ahsige eow anre
spræce; Andswariað me, &amp; ic secge eow þonne on hwylcum anwealde ic
þis do.
 11.30. Hweðer wæs Iohannes fulluht, þe of heofone þe of
mannum; Andswariað me.
 11.31. Ða þohton hi &amp; cwædon betweox him, gif we
secgað of heofone, he segð us hwi ne gelyfde ge him.
 11.32. Gif we secgað of mannum, we ondrædaþ þis folc;
Ealle hi hæfdon Iohannem þæt he wære soðlice witega.
 11.33. Þa andswaredon hi þam Hælende &amp; cwædon, we
nyton; ða cwæð se Hælend, ne ic eow ne secge on hwylcum anwealde ic
þas þing do.
 12.1. Ða ongan he him bigspell reccan; Sum mann him plantode
wingeard &amp; betynde hine &amp; dealf anne seað &amp; getimbrode ænne
stypel &amp; gesette hine mid eorðtilium; &amp; ferde on elþeodignysse.
 12.2. Þa sende he to þam tiligum his þeow on tide þæt he
þæs wingeardes wæstm onfenge.
 12.3. Ða swungon hi þæne &amp; forleton hine idelhende.
 12.4. And eft he him sende oðerne þeow &amp; hi þone on
heafde gewundodon &amp; mid teonum geswencton.
 12.5. And eft he him sumne sende &amp; hi þæne ofslogon &amp;
manega oþre; Sume hi beoton, sume hi ofslogon.
 12.6. Þa hæfde he þa gyt ænne leofostne sunu; þa sende
he æt nehstan him þæne &amp; cwæð, witodlice minne sunu hig
forwandiað.
 12.7. Ða cwædon þa tilian him betweonan, her is se yrfenuma;
Uton ofslean hine, þonne bið ure seo yrfeweardnes.
 12.8. Hi þa ofslogon hine &amp; wurpon wiðutan þone
wingeard.
 12.9. Hwæt deð þæs wingeardes hlaford; He cymð &amp;
fordeð þa tiligean &amp; sylð oþron þone wingeard.
 12.10. Ne rædde ge þis gewrit; Se stan þe þa wyrhtan
awurpon, þes ys geworden on þære hyrnan heafod.
 12.11. Þis ys fram drihtne geworden &amp; hit is wundorlic on
uron eagum.
 12.12. Þa smeadon hi þæt hi gefengon hine &amp; hi ondredon
þa menigu; Hi oncneowon þa þæt he þis bigspell to him sæde; Hi
ferdon þa &amp; hine forleton.
 12.13. Þa sendon hi to him sume of Phariseum &amp; Herodianum
þæt hi befengon hine on his worde.
 12.14. Ða comon hi &amp; þus mid facne cwædon, lareow, we
witon þæt þu eart soðfæst &amp; þu ne recst be ænegum menn ne
besceawast þu manna ansyne, ac þu godes weg lærst on soðfæstnysse;
Alyfð gaful to syllanne þam Casere.
 12.15. Hwæðer þe we ne syllað; þa cwæð he &amp;
heora lotwrencceaste wiste, hwi fandige min; Bringað me þone pening
þæt ic hine geseo.
 12.16. Þa brohton hi him þa sæde he him, hwæs is þeos
anlicnys &amp; þis gewrit; Hi cwædon, ðæs Caseres.
 12.17. Ða cwæð se Hælend to him, agyfað þam Casere
þa ðing þe þæs Caseres synd, &amp; Gode þa ðe Godes synd; þa
wundrodon hi be þam.
 12.18. Þa comon him to Sadcei þa secgað þæt ærist ne
sy &amp; hine ahsodon &amp; þus cwædon.
 12.19. Lareow, Moyses us wrat, gif hwæs broðor dead bið
&amp; læfð his wif &amp; næfð nan bearn þæt his broðor nime
his wif &amp; his broðor sæd wecce.
 12.20. Eornostlice seofon gebroþru wæron &amp; se æresta
nam wif &amp; wearð dead na læfedum sæde.
 12.21. And þa nam se oðer hi &amp; wearð dead ne se sæd ne
læfde; Gelice se þridda.
 12.22. &amp; ealle seofon hi hæfdon &amp; sæd ne læfdon;
Ealra æftemest þa forðferde þæt wif.
 12.23. On þam æriste, hwylces þara seofona bið þæt
wif; Hi ealle hi hæfdon.
 12.24. Þa andswarode him se Hælend, hu ne dweligað ge
forþam þe ge nyton þa halgan gewritu ne Godes mægen?
 12.25. Soðlice þonne hi of deaðe arisaþ ne wifiaþ hi ne
ne gyftigeað, ac hi synt swylce godes englas on heofonum.
 12.26. Be þam deadum þæt hi arison, ne rædde ge on Moyses
bec hu God to him cwæþ ofer þone gorstbeam, ic eom Abrahames God &amp;
Isaaces God &amp; Iacobes God.
 12.27. Nis God deadra ac he hys lybbendra; Soðlice swyþe ge
dweligeað.
 12.28. Ða genealæhte him an of þam bocerum þe he gehyrde
hi smeagende &amp; geseah þæt he him wel andswarode &amp; ahsode hine,
hwæt wære ealra beboda mæst?
 12.29. Þa andswarode &amp; him, þæt is þæt mæste
bebod ealra, Israhel, gehyr, urne Drihten god he is.
 12.30. And lufa þinne Drihten God of ealre þinre heortan &amp;
of ealre þinre sawle eallum þinum mode &amp; of eallum þinum mægene;
þæt is þæt fyrmeste bebod.
 12.31. Soðlice is oðer þissum gelic, lufa þinne nehstan swa
þe sylfne; Nys oðer mare bebod.
 12.32. Ða cwæþ se bocere, Lareow, well þu on soþe
cwæde þæt an God is &amp; nis oðer butan him.
 12.33. &amp; ðæt he si gelufod of ealre heortan &amp; of
eallum andgyte &amp; of ealre sawle &amp; of ealre strengðe, &amp; lufigean
his nehstan swa hine sylfne; þæt is mare eallum onsægdnyssum &amp;
offrungum.
 12.34. Ða se Hælend geseah þæt he him wislice andwyrde he
sæde him, ne art þu feorr fram Godes rice; &amp; hine ne dorste nan mann
ahsian.
 12.35. Ða cwæþ se Hælend on þam temple lærende, hu
secgað þa boceras þæt Crist sy Dauides sunu?
 12.36. Dauid sylf cwæþ to þam halgan gaste; Drihten
cwæþ to minum Drihtne, site on mine swyðran healfe oð ic þine fynd
asette to fotsceamole þinra fota.
 12.37. Dauid sylf nemde hine Drihten, &amp; hwanon is he his sunu;
And mycel menegu hine luflice gehyrde.
 12.38. Þa sæde he him on his lare, warniað fram bocerum þa
wyllað on gegyrlum gan &amp; beon on strætum grete.
 12.39. &amp; on fyrmestum lareowsetlum sittan on gesamnungum &amp;
þa fyrmestan setl on gebeorscipum.
 12.40. Þa ðe wudewena hus forswelgað mid heora langsuman
gebede; þa onfoð lengestne dom.
 12.41. Ða sæt se Hælend ongen þone tollsceamol &amp;
geseah hu þæt folc hyra feoh torfude on þone tollsceamul &amp; manega
welige torfudon fela.
 12.42. Þa com an earm wuduwe and wearp twegen feorðlingas.
 12.43. Ða clypode he his leorningcnihtas &amp; sæde him,
soþlice ic eow secge þæt þeos earme wuduwe eallinga mæst sealde
þara þe on tollsceamul sealdon.
 12.44. Ealle sendon of þam þe hi genoh hæfdon; Soðlice
þeos of hyre yrmþe eall þæt heo hæfde sealde ealle hyre andlyfene.
 13.1. Ða he of þam temple eode, þa cwæð an of his
leorningcnihtum to him, Lareow, loca hwylce stanas her synt &amp; hwylce
getimbrunga þisses temples.
 13.2. Þa cwæð se Hælend, ne geseoge ealle þas mycelan
getimbrunga; Ne bið her læfed stan ofer stan þe ne beo toworpen.
 13.3. Þa hi sæton on Oliuetes Dune ongen þæt tempel,
synderlice hine Petrus &amp; Iacobus &amp; Iohannes &amp; Andreas ahsodon.
 13.4. Sege us hwænne þas þing gewurdon &amp; hwylc tacen
bið þænne ealle þas ðing onginnað beon geendud?
 13.5. Þa ongan se Hælend him andswarigende to cweðan,
warniað þæt eow nan mann ne beswice.
 13.6. Soþlice manega cumað on minum naman &amp; cweþað, ic
eom Crist, &amp; beswicað manega.
 13.7. &amp; þonne ge gehyrað gefeohtu &amp; gefeohta hlisan, ne
ondræde ge eow; Hit gebyrað þæt hit gebelimpe, ac þonne gyt nis
ende.
 13.8. Soðlice þeod arist agen þeode &amp; rice ongen rice,
&amp; beoð eorþan styrunga geond stowa &amp; hungor; þis synd sara
angin.
 13.9. Warniað eow sylfe; Hi syllað eow on geþeahte &amp;
swingað on gesamnungum, &amp; ge standað beforan demum &amp; cyningum for
minum naman him on gewitnesse.
 13.10. &amp; on ealle þeoda; ærest gebyrað beon þæt
godspel gebodud.
 13.11. &amp; þonne hi syllende eow læþað, ne foresmeage ge
hwæt ge specan ac specað þæt eow on þære tide geseald bið; Ne
synd ge na specende ac se Halga Gast.
 13.12. Soðlice se broðor þone broþor to deaðe sylð
&amp; se fæder his sunu &amp; þa bearn arisað agen hyra magas &amp; mid
deaðe hi gewæceað.
 13.13. &amp; ge beoð eallum on hatunge for minum naman; Soðlice
se bið hal se þe oð ende þurhwunað.
 13.14. Ðonne ge geseoð þære toworpednysse asceonunge
standan þar heo ne sceal, þonne ongyte se þe ræt fleon þonne on
muntas þa ðe synt on Iudea.
 13.15. &amp; se ðe is ofer þecene ne stige he on his hus ne he
in ne ga þæt he aht on his huse nime.
 13.16. &amp; se ðe bið on æcere ne cyrre he ongean þæt
he his reaf nime.
 13.17. Wa cennedum on þam dagum.
 13.18. Biddað þæt ðis on wintra ne gewurðe.
 13.19. Soþlice on þam dagum beoð swylce gedrefednessa swylce
ne gewurdon of frymmðe þære gesceafte þe god gesceop oð nu ne na ne
gewurþað.
 13.20. And gif Drihten þas dagas ne gescyrte, nan flæsc ne
wurde hal, ac for þam gecorenum þe he geceas he gescyrte þa dagas.
 13.21. And gif eow hwylc segð, witodlice her is Crist, witodlice
þær he is, ne gelyfe ge.
 13.22. Soðlice lease cristas &amp; lease witegan arisað &amp;
wyrcað forebeacnu to beswicanne eac, gif hit beon mæg, þa gecorenan.
 13.23. Warniað eow nu ealle þing þe ic eow foresæde.
 13.24. Ac on þam dagum æfter þære geswencednysse bið
sunne aþeostrod &amp; se mona his beorhtnesse ne sylð.
 13.25. &amp; heofones steorran beoð feallende &amp; beoð
astyrode þa megenu þe on heofonum synt.
 13.26. Ðonne geseoð hi mannes sunu cumendne on genipum mid
mycelum mægene &amp; wuldre.
 13.27. Þonne sent he his englas &amp; hi gaderiað his gecorenan
of feower windum of eorþan heanesse oþ heofones heahnesse.
 13.28. Leorniað an bigspell be þam fictreowe; þonne his twi
bið mearu &amp; leaf beoð acennede, ge witon þæt sumor is gehende.
 13.29. &amp; wite ge þonne ge þas ðing geseoð þæt he
is dura gehende.
 13.30. Soðlice ic eow secge þæt þeos cneores ne gewit
ærþam ealle þas ðing gewurðon.
 13.31. Heofon &amp; eorðe gewitað, witodlice mine word ne
gewitað.
 13.32. Be þam dæge &amp; þære tide nan mann nat ne englas
on heofone ne mannes sunu buton fæder ana.
 13.33. Warniað &amp; waciað &amp; gebiddaþ eow, ge nyton
hwænne seo tid ys.
 13.34. Swa se man ælþeodilice ferde forlet his hus &amp;
sealde his þeowum þæne anwald gehwylces weorces &amp; beode þam
durewearde þæt he wacige.
 13.35. Eornostlice wacigeað, ge nyton hwænne þæs huses
hlaford cymð þe on æfen þe on midre nihte þe on hancrede þe on
mergen.
 13.36. Þe læs he eow slapende gemete þonne he færinga
cymð.
 13.37. Soðlice þæt ic eow secge eallum, ic hit secge,
waciað.
 14.1. Soþlice þa æfter twam dagum wæron Eastron; &amp;
þa sohton þa heahsacerdas &amp; þa boceras hu hi hine mid facne namon
&amp; ofslogon.
 14.2. Ða cwædon hi, næs na on freolsdæge þe læs
þæs folces gehlyd wurde.
 14.3. And þa se Hælend wæs on Bethania on Simones huse anes
hreoflan &amp; þar sæt; þa com an wif &amp; hæfde hyre sealfbox
deorwyrþes nardes; &amp; tobrocenum sealfboxe ofer his heafod aget.
 14.4. Sume hit unwurðlice forbæron &amp; betwux him sylfum
cwædon, for hwi wæs þisse sealfe forspillednes geworden?
 14.5. Þeos sealf mihte beon geseald to þrim hund penegum &amp;
beon þearfum geseald; &amp; yrsydon agen hi.
 14.6. Ða cwæð se Hælend, lætað hi; Hwi synt ge hire
grame; God weorc heo on me worhte.
 14.7. Soðlice symble ge habbað þearfan mid eow &amp; þonne
ge wyllað ge magon him teala don; Me ge symble nabbað.
 14.8. Þeos sealde þæt heo hæfde; Heo com to smyrianne
minne lichaman on byrgene.
 14.9. Soðlice ic eow secge swa hwar swa þis godspell gebodad
bið on eallum middanearde bið gebodod þæt heo þis on his gemynde
dyde.
 14.10. Ða Iudas Scarioth, þæt is, wiþersaca, an of þam
twelfum, ferde to þam heahsacerdum þæt he hine belæwde.
 14.11. Þa hi þis gehyrdon hi fahnodon &amp; beheton him feoh to
syllanne &amp; he smeade hu he hine digellice sealde.
 14.12. And þam forman dæge azimorum þa hi Eastron offrodon
his leorningcnihtas him sædon, hwyder wylt þu þæt we faron &amp;
gegearwian þe þæt ðu Eastron ete?
 14.13. Ða sende he twegen of his leorningcnihtum &amp; sæde
him, gað on þa ceastre &amp; inc agen yrnð sum man berende sume
wæterflaxan; Folgiað him.
 14.14. &amp; swa hwyder swa he inngæð, secgað þæs huses
hlaforde, vre Lareow segð, hwar is min gysthus &amp; min gereord hwar ete is
Eastron mid minum leorningcnihtum?
 14.15. And he inc geswutelað mycele healle gedæfte &amp;
gegeearwiað us þara.
 14.16. Þa ferdon his leorningcnihtas &amp; comon on þa ceastre
&amp; fundon hit eall swa he sæde &amp; gegearwodon þa Eastron.
 14.17. Soðlice þa æfen com him twelfum mid him.
 14.18. Sittendum &amp; etendum sæde se Hælend, soðlice ic
eow secge þæt eower an þe mid me yt gesylð me.
 14.19. Ða ongunnon hi beon dreorige &amp; betwux him cweðan,
cwyst þu com ic hit?
 14.20. Þa sæde he him, an of eow twelfum me sylð se ðe his
hand on disce mid me dypð.
 14.21. And witodlice mannes sunu gæð swa be him awriten is; Wa
þam menn þurh þone þe mannes sunu geseald bið, betere him wære
þæt se mann acenned nære.
 14.22. Him þa etendum afeng se Hælend hlaf &amp; hine
bletsiende bræc &amp; sealde him &amp; þus cwæð, nimað; ðis ys
min lichama.
 14.23. &amp; onfeng calice &amp; Gode þancas dyde &amp; sealde
him &amp; ealle him ofdruncon.
 14.24. Þa sæde he him, ðis ys min blod þære niwan
cyðnesse þæt bið for manegum agoten.
 14.25. Soðlice ic eow secge þæt ic heonon forð ne drince
of þyses wingeardes cynne oð þone dæg þonne ic hine niwne drince on
godes rice.
 14.26. And gecwedenum lofe hi ferdon on elebergena Munt.
 14.27. Ða cwæð se Hælend, ealle ge beoð geuntreowsode
on þisse nihte forþam þe hit awriten is, ic slea þæne hyrde &amp;
beon þa scep todræfede.
 14.28. Ac æfter þam þe ic arise, ic cume beforan eow on
Galileam.
 14.29. Þa sæde Petrus him, þeah ðe ealle swicion ne
swicige ic þe na.
 14.30. Ða cwæð se Hælend, soþlice ic þe secge
þæt ðu on þisse nihte ær hana tuwa crawe þriwa wiðsæcst
min.
 14.31. &amp; he þæs ðe mare spræc, &amp; þeah me
gebyrige mid þe to sweltene, ne ætsace ic þin; &amp; swa hi cwædon
ealle.
 14.32. Þa comon hi to anum tune þæs nama wæs Gezemani,
&amp; he cwæð to his leorningcnihton, sittað her oð þæt ic me
gebidde.
 14.33. And he nam þa mid him Petrum &amp; Iacobum &amp; Iohannem;
þa ongan he forhtian &amp; sargian.
 14.34. &amp; sæde him, unrot is min sawl oð deað; Gebidað
her &amp; waciað.
 14.35. Ða he lythwon forðstop, he astrehte hine ofer þa
eorðan &amp; he bæd gif hit beon mihte þæt he on þære tide fram
him gewite.
 14.36. And þa cwæð he, Abba, þæt is fæder on ure
geþeode, ealle þing þe synt mihtiglice; Afyrr þysne calic fram me, ac
na þæt ic wylle ac þæt þu.
 14.37. Þa com he &amp; funde hi slæpende; &amp; cwæð to
Petre, Simon, slæpst þu; Ne mihtest ðu ane tide wacian?
 14.38. Waciað &amp; gebiddað þæt ge on costnunge ne gan;
Witodlice se gast is gearu ac þæt flæsc is untrum.
 14.39. And eft he gebæd þa ylcan spræce.
 14.40. &amp; þa he hine eft agen bewende, he funde hi
slæpende; Hyra eagan wæron gehefegode &amp; hi nyston hwæt hi him
andswaredon.
 14.41. Ða com he þriddan siðe &amp; sæde him, slapað nu
&amp; restað; Genoh hit ys; Tima ys cumen nu is mannes sunu geseald on
synfulra handa.
 14.42. Arisaþ, uton gan; Nu is gehende se ðe me sylð.
 14.43. Him þa ða gyt sprecendum com Iudas Scarioth, þæt
ys, wiþersaca, an of þam twelfum, &amp; mid him mycel menegeo mid swurdum
&amp; mid sahlum fram heahsacerdum, bocerum &amp; ealdrum.
 14.44. Soðlice his læwa him tacen sealde &amp; þus
cwæð, swa hwylcne swa ic cysse he hit is; Nimað &amp; lædað hine
wærlice.
 14.45. &amp; sona swa he com he genealæhte him to &amp;
cwæð, Lareow, &amp; cyste hine.
 14.46. &amp; hi hyra handa on hine wurpon &amp; namon hine.
 14.47. Soðlice an of þam þe ðar embeuton stodon his swurde
abræd &amp; sloh þæs sacerdes þeow &amp; his eare of acearf.
 14.48. Þa cwæð se Hælend him andswariende, swa swa to
anum sceaðan ge ferdon mid swurdon &amp; treowum me gefon.
 14.49. Þonne ic dæghwamlice mid eow wæs on temple
lærende &amp; ge me ne namon, ac þæt þa gewritu syn gefyllede.
 14.50. Ða forleton his leorningcnihtas ealle hine &amp; flugon.
 14.51. Sum iungling him fyligde mid anre scytan bewæfed nacod
&amp; hi namon hine.
 14.52. Ða aworpenre þære scytan nacod he him fram fleah.
 14.53. And hi læddon þæne Hælend to þam heahsacerde,
&amp; comon ealle sacerdas &amp; boceras &amp; ealdras togædere.
 14.54. Petrus him fyligde feorran oþ ðæs heahsacerdes
cafertun, &amp; he sæt mid þam ðenum &amp; wyrmde hine æt þam
fyre.
 14.55. Þa heahsacerdas sohton &amp; eall geþeaht tale agen
þone Hælend þæt hi hine to deaðe sealdon &amp; hi ne fundon.
 14.56. Manega sædon lease gecyðnysse agen hine &amp; þa
cyðnessa næron þæslice.
 14.57. Ða arison sume &amp; sædon lease cyðnesse agen hine
&amp; þus sædon.
 14.58. Soðes we gehyrdon hine secgan, ic towurpe þis handworhte
tempel &amp; æfter þrim dagum ic oðer unhandworht getimbrie.
 14.59. &amp; hyra cyþnys næs þæslic.
 14.60. Þa aras sum heahsacerd on hyra midlene &amp; ahsode
þæne Hælend, ne andswarast þu nan ðing agen þæt þas þe
onwurpað?
 14.61. He suwode &amp; naht ne andswarode; Eft hine axode se
heahsacerd, eart þu Crist, þæs gebletsodan Godes sunu?
 14.62. Ða sæde se Hælend, ic eom, &amp; ge geseoð mannes
sunu on swyðran healfe sittan his mægenes &amp; cumende mid heofones
genipum.
 14.63. Þa cwæð se heahsacerd his reaf slitende, hwi
gewilnige we gyt cyðera?
 14.64. Ge gehyrdon his bysmer; Hwæt þincð eow; ða hyrwdon
hi ealle hine &amp; cwædon þæt he wære deaðes scyldig.
 14.65. And sume agunnon him on spætan &amp; oferwreon his ansyne
&amp; mid fystum hine beoton &amp; him to cwædon, aræd; And þa ðenas
hine mid handum beoton.
 14.66. And þa Petrus wæs on cafertune þa com to him an
þinen þæs heahsacerdes.
 14.67. &amp; þa heo geseah Petrum wyrmende þa cwæð heo,
þu wære mid ðam Nazareniscan Hælende.
 14.68. Ða ætsoc he &amp; cwæð, ic nat; Ne ne can hwæt
þu segst; And he eode þa of þam cafertune &amp; se hana creow.
 14.69. Eft þa hine gecneow oðer þinen; Heo ongan cweðan to
þam þe ðar abutan stodon, soðlice þes ys of þam.
 14.70. &amp; he eft ætsoc; &amp; eft þa ymbe lytel þa ða
ætstodon cwædon to Petre, soþlice þu eart of ðam, Galileisc þu
eart.
 14.71. Þa ongan he ætsacan &amp; swerian, soðes ne can ic
þæne man þe ge secgað.
 14.72. &amp; þa eft sona creow se hana; ða gemunde Petrus
þæs Hælendes worde þe he him sæde, ær se hana crawe tua þriwa
ðu me ætsæcst; þa ongan he wepan.
 15.1. Þa sona on mergen worhton þa heahsacerdas hyra gemot mid
ealdrum &amp; bocerum &amp; eallum werodum; &amp; læddon þæne Hælend
gebundenne &amp; sealdon hine Pilato.
 15.2. Ða axode Pilatus hine, eart þu Iudea cynincg; þa
andswarode he him, þu hit segst.
 15.3. Ða wregdon hine þa heahsacerdas on manegum þingum.
 15.4. Eft Pilatus hine axode, ne andswarast þu nan þing; loca
hu mycelum hi þe wregeað.
 15.5. Ða ne andswarode se Hælend him na mare swa þæt
Pilatus wundrode.
 15.6. On symmeldæge wæs his gewuna þæt he him forgeafe
ænne gebundenne swa hwylcne swa hi bædon.
 15.7. Þa bædon hi Barraban, se wæs gebunden mid þam
ræplingum se þurh swiccræft manslyht geworhte.
 15.8. &amp; þa he ferde þa ongan seo menegeo hine biddan swa
heo symle dyde.
 15.9. Ða cwæð Pilatus, wylle ge þæt ic eow forgyfe
Iudea cyning?
 15.10. He wiste þæt ðurh andan hine sealdon þa
heahsacerdas.
 15.11. Þa astyredon þa bisceopas þa menegu þæt he him
Barraban forgefe.
 15.12. Eft Pilatus him andswarode, hwæt do ic be Iudea cininge?
 15.13. Hi eft hrymdon &amp; cwædon, hoh hine.
 15.14. Ða sæde Pilatus, hwæt yfeles dyde he; Hi þæs
þe ma clypedon, ahoh hine.
 15.15. Pilatus wolde þa ðam folce gecweman &amp; forgef him
Barraban &amp; sealde him þone Hælend beswungenne þæt he ahangen
wære.
 15.16. Þa læddon þa cempan hine on þæs domernes
cafertun &amp; hi tosomne eall werod clypedon.
 15.17. &amp; scryddon hine mid purpuran &amp; him on setton
þyrnenne helm awundenne.
 15.18. &amp; ongunnon hine þus gretan, hal wes þu Iudea
cyning.
 15.19. &amp; beoton hine on þæt heafod mid hreode &amp;
spætton him on &amp; heora cneow bigdon &amp; hine geeaðmeddon.
 15.20. And syððan hi hine bysmrydon, unscryddon hine þam
purpuran &amp; scryddon hine mid his reafum &amp; læddon hine þæt hi
hine ahengon.
 15.21. &amp; genyddon sumne wegferendne Simonem Cireneum cumende of
þam tune, Alexandres fæder &amp; Rufi, þæt he his rode bære.
 15.22. &amp; hi læddon hine on ða stowe Golgoða, þæt is
on ure geþeode gereht, heafodpannena stow.
 15.23. &amp; sealdon him gebiterod win, &amp; he hit ne onfeng.
 15.24. And þa hi hine ahengon hi dældon his reaf &amp; hlotu
wurpon hwæt gehwa name.
 15.25. Þa wæs underntid &amp; hi ahengon hine.
 15.26. &amp; ofergewrit his gyltes wæs awriten, Iudea cyning.
 15.27. &amp; hi ahengon mid him twegen sceaðan, anne on his
swyðran healfe &amp; oþerne on his wynstran.
 15.28. Þa wæs þæt gewrit gefylled þæt cwyð, &amp;
he wæs mid unrihtwisum geteald.
 15.29. And þa ðe forðstopon hine gremedon &amp; hyra heafod
cwehton &amp; ðus cwædon, wala se towyrpð þæt tempel &amp; on
þrim dagon eft getimbrað.
 15.30. Gehæl ðe sylfne of þære rode stigende.
 15.31. Eallswa þa heahsacerdas bysmriende betwux þam bocerum
cwædon, oðre he hale gedyde, hine sylfne he ne mæg halne gedon.
 15.32. Crist Israhela cyning, astige nu of rode þæt we geseon
&amp; gelyfon; And þa ðe him mid hangodon wæron him mid gebundene.
 15.33. And þære syxtan tide wurdo þystru gewordene geond
ealle eorðan oð nontide.
 15.34. &amp; to nontide se Hælend clypode mycelre stemne, <foreign>heloi
heloi lema sabbattani,</foreign> þæt is on ure geðeode, min God min God, hwi
forlete þu me?
 15.35. &amp; sume þe ðar abuton stodon &amp; þis gehyrdon hi
cwædon, nu þes clypað Heliam.
 15.36. Þa arn hyra an &amp; fylde ane spingan mid ecede &amp; on
hreod sette &amp; him drincan sealde &amp; cwæð, lætað þæt we
geseon hwæðer Helias cume hine nyþer to settanne.
 15.37. Se Hælend þa asende his stefne &amp; forðferde.
 15.38. &amp; þæs temples wahrift wæs tosliten on twa of
ufewerdum oð neoþewerd.
 15.39. Þa se hundredman þe ðar stod agen geseah þæt se
Hælend swa clypiende forðferde he cwæð, soðlice þes man wæs
Godes sunu.
 15.40. And þa wif wæron feorran behealdende &amp; betwux þam
wæs seo Magdalenisce Maria &amp; Maria, Iacobes modor, &amp; Salomeæ.
 15.41. &amp; þa he wæs on Galilea hi fylidon him &amp; him
þenedon &amp; manega oðre þe him mid ferdon on Hierusalem.
 15.42. And þa æfen wæs geworden þæt wæs Parasceue
þæt is ær sæterdæge.
 15.43. Þa com iosep se æðela gerefa of Abarimathia se sylfa
godes rices geanbidode &amp; he dyrstiglice into pilate eode &amp; bæd
þæs hælendes lichaman.
 15.44. Ða wundrode Pilatus gif he þa gyt forðferde; þa
clypode he þæne hundredman &amp; hine ahsode hwæðer he dead wære.
 15.45. Ða he wiste þæt, þa agef he þone lichaman
Iosepe.
 15.46. Þa bohte Iosep ane scytan &amp; hine þaron befeold &amp;
on byrgene lede seo wæs of stane aheawen &amp; wylte anne stan to ðære
byrgenne dura.
 15.47. Ða com Maria Magdalene &amp; Iosepes Maria &amp; beheoldon
hwar he geled wære.
 16.1. &amp; ða sæternes dæg wæs agan, seo Magdalenisce
Maria &amp; Iacobes Maria &amp; Salome&e; bohton wyrtgemang þæt hi comon
&amp; hine smyredon.
 16.2. And swyðe ær anum restedæge comon to þære
byrgene upasprungenre sunnan.
 16.3. &amp; cwædon him betwynan, hwa awylt us ðysne stan of
þære byrgene dura?
 16.4. Þa hi hi besawon, hi gesawon þæne stan aweg awyltne;
Soðlice he wæs swyðe mycel.
 16.5. And þa hi eodon on þa byrgene, hi gesawon anne geongne on
þa swyðran healfe sittende hwitum gegyrlan oferwrohne &amp; hi þa
forhtodon.
 16.6. Ða cwæð he to him, ne forhtige ge na; Ge secað
þæne Nazareniscan Hælend ahangenne.
 16.7. He aras, nis he her; Her is seo stow þær hi hine ledon.
 16.7. Ac farað &amp; secgað his leorningcnihtum &amp; Petre
þæt he gæð toforan eow on Galileam; þar ge hine geseoð swa he eow
sæde.
 16.8. And hi ut eodon &amp; flugon fram þære byrgene &amp;
wæron afærede for þære gesyhðe þe hi gesawon; &amp; hig nanon
men naht ne sædon, soðlice hi him adredon.
 16.9. Þa he aras on ærnemorgen on restedæge; æryst he
ætywde þære Magdaleniscan Marian of ðære he ut adraf seofon
deofolseocnyssa.
 16.10. &amp; heo þa ut eode &amp; hit þam cydde þe mid him
wæron heofendum &amp; wependum.
 16.11. Þa hi gehyrdon þæt he leofode &amp; hi hine gesawon
þa ne gelyfdon hi him.
 16.12. Æfter þam him twam he wæs ætywed on oðrum hiwe
him on þone tun farendum.
 16.13. &amp; hi þa foron &amp; þæt oðrum cyddon &amp; hi
him ne gelyfdon.
 16.14. Ða æt nehstan he ætywde him twelfum þar hi
ætgædere sæton; &amp; tælde hyra ungeleaffulnesse &amp; hyra
heortan heardnesse forðam þe hi ne gelyfdon þam ðe hine gesawon of
deaþe arisan.
 16.15. &amp; he sæde him, farað into ealne middaneard &amp;
bodiað godspell ealre gesceafte.
 16.16. Se þe gelyfð &amp; gefullod bið, se biþ hal;
Soþlice se ðe ne gelyfð, se bið genyðerod.
 16.17. Þas tacnu fyliað þam ðe gelyfað, on minon naman hi
deofolseocnessa utdrifað, hi sprecaþ niwum tungum.
 16.18. Næddran hi afyrrað &amp; him ne derað þeah hi
hwæt deadbærlices drincan, ofer seoce hi hyra handa settað &amp; hi
beoð hale.
 16.19. And witudlice Drihten Hælend syððan he to him
spræc he wæs on heofonum afangen &amp; he sitt on Godes swiðran
healfe.
 16.20. Soþlice hi ða farende æghwar bodedon Drihtne
midwyrcendum &amp; trymmendre spræce æfterfyligendum tacnum.

 0.1. Lucas Boc ðæs Halgan Godspelleres.
 1.1. Forþam ðe witodlice manega þohton þara þinga race
geendebyrdan þe on us gefyllede synt, swa us betæhtun ða þe hyt of
frymðe gesawon; &amp; þære spræce þenas wæron.
 1.3. Me geþuhte geornlice eallum oð endebyrdnesse writan þe,
þu se selusta theophilus, þæt ðu oncnawe þara worda
soþfæstnesse of ðam ðe þu gelæred eart.
 1.5. On Herodes dagum, iudea cyninges, wæs sum sacerd on naman
Zacharias of Abian tune, &amp; his wif wæf of Aarones dohtrum, &amp; hyre
nama wæs Elizabeth.
 1.6. Soðlice hig wæron butu rihtwise beforan Gode, gangende on
eallum his bebodum &amp; rihtwisnessum butan wrohte.
 1.7. &amp; hig næfdon nan bearn, forðam ðe Elizabeth wæs
unberende, &amp; hy on heora dagum butu forðeodon.
 1.8. Soðlice wæs geworden þa Zacharias his sacerdes hades
breac on hys gewrixles endebyrdnesse beforan Gode.
 1.9. Æfter gewunan ðæs sacerdhades hlotes, he eode þæt
he hys offrunga sette; ða he on godes tempel eode eall werod þæs folces
wæs ute gebiddende on þære offrunga timan.
 1.11. Ða ætywde him drihtnes engel standende on þæs
weofodes swyðran healfe; ða wearð Zacharias gedrefed þæt geseonde
&amp; him ege onhreas.
 1.13. Ða cwæð se engel him to, ne ondræd þu þe,
Zacharias, forþam þin ben ys gehyred &amp; þin wif Elizabeth þe sunu
cenð, &amp; þu nemst hys naman Iohannes, &amp; he byð þe to gefean
&amp; to blisse, &amp; manega on his acennednysse gefagniað.
 1.15. Soðlice he byð mære beforan drihtne &amp; he ne
drincð win ne beor, &amp; he byð gefylled on haligum gaste, þonne gyt of
hys modor innoðe, &amp; manega Israhela bearna he gecyrð to Drihtne hyra
gode.
 1.17. &amp; he gæð toforan him on gaste, &amp; Elias mihte,
þæt he fædera heortan to heora bearnum gecyrre, &amp; ungeleaffulle to
rihtwisra gleawscype, drihtne fullfremed folc gegearwian.
 1.18. Ða cwæð Zacharias to þam engele, hwanun wat ic
þis; Ic eom nu eald &amp; min wif on hyre dagum forðeode.
 1.19. Ða andswarode him se engel, Ic eom Gabriel, ic þe stande
beforan Gode, &amp; ic eom asend wið þe sprecan, &amp; þe ðis bodian.
 1.20. And nu þu byst suwiende, &amp; þu sprecan ne miht, oð
þone dæg þe ðas ðing gewurðaþ, forþam þu minum wordum ne
gelyfdest, þa beoð on hyra timan gefyllede.
 1.21. And þæt folc wæs Zachariam geanbidiende &amp;
wundrodon þæt he on þam temple læt wæs.
 1.22. Ða he uteode ne mihte he him to sprecan, &amp; hig
oncneowon þæt he on þam temple sume gesihtðe geseah, &amp; he wæs
bicniende him &amp; dum þurhwunede.
 1.23. Ða wæs geworden þa his þenunga dagas gefyllede
wæron, he ferde to his huse.
 1.24. Soðlice æfter dagum Elizabeth his wif geeacnode &amp;
heo bediglude hig fif monþas &amp; cwæð, Soðlice me Drihten gedyde
þus, on þam dagum þe he geseah minne hosp betux mannum afyrran.
 1.26. Soþlice on þam syxtan monðe wæs asend Gabriel se
engel fram Drihtne on Galilea ceastre, þære nama wæs Nazareth, to
beweddudre fæmnan anum were, þæs nama wæs Iosep, of Dauides huse,
&amp; þære fæmnan nama wæs Maria.
 1.28. Ða cwæþ se engel ingangende, hal wes ðu mid gyfe
gefylled, Drihten mid þe; ðu eart gebletsud on wifum.
 1.29. Þa wearð heo on his spræce gedrefed, &amp; þohte
hwæt seo greting wære.
 1.30. Ða cwæð se engel, ne ondræd þu ðe Maria;
Soðlice þu gyfe mid gode gemettest.
 1.31. Soðlice nu þu on innoðe geeacnast, &amp; sunu censt
&amp; his naman Hælend genemnest.
 1.32. Se byð mære &amp; þæs hehstan sunu genemned, &amp;
him sylþ Drihten God his fæder, Dauides setl, &amp; he ricsað on ecnesse
on Iacobes huse, &amp; hys rices ende ne byþ.
 1.34. Ða cwæð Maria to þam engle: hu gewyrð þis
forðam ic were ne oncnawe?
 1.35. Ða andswarode hyre se engel; Se halga gast on þe becymþ
&amp; þæs heahstan miht þe ofersceadað, &amp; forðam þæt halige
ðe of þe acenned byð byþ Godes sunu genemned.
 1.36. &amp; nu Elizabeth þin mæge sunu on hyre ylde geeacnode,
&amp; þe monað ys hyre sixta, seo is unberende genemned, forþam nis
ælc word mid Gode unmihtelic.
 1.38. Ða cwæþ Maria, her is Drihtnes þinen, gewurþe me
æfter þinum worde; &amp; se engel hyre fram gewat.
 1.39. Soþlice on þam dagum aras Maria &amp; ferde on muntland
mid ofste, on Iudeisce ceastre &amp; eode into Zacharias huse &amp; grete
Elizabeth.
 1.41. Ða wæs geworden þa Elizabeth gehyrde Marian gretinge,
þa gefagnude þæt cild on hyre innoðe, And þa wearð Elizabeth
halegum gaste gefylled.
 1.42. &amp; heo clypode micelre stefne &amp; cwæþ; ðu eart
betwux wifum gebletsod, &amp; gebletsud ys þines innoðes wæstm, &amp;
hwanun is me ðis þæt mines drihtnes modor to me cume?
 1.44. Sona swa þinre gretinge stefn on minum earum geworden
wæs, þa fahnude min cild on minum innoþe.
 1.45. And eadig þu eart ðu þe gelyfdest þæt fulfremede
synd, þa ðing þe ðe fram Drihtne gesæde synd.
 1.46. Ða cwæð Maria, min sawl mærsaþ Drihten; And min
gast geblissude on Gode minum Hælende, forðam þe he geseah hys þinene
eadmodnesse.
 1.48. Soþlice heonunforð me eadige secgað ealle cneoressa,
forðam þe me micele þing dyde se ðe mihtig is, &amp; hys nama ys halig
&amp; hys mildheortnes of cneoresse on cneoresse hyne ondrædendum.
 1.51. He worhte mægne on hys earme, he todælde þa
ofermodan, on mode hyra heortan.
 1.52. He awearp þa rican of setle, &amp; ða eaðmodan up
ahof.
 1.53. Hingriende he mid godum gefylde, &amp; ofermode idele
forlet.
 1.54. He afeng Israhel hys cniht, &amp; gemunde hys
mildheortnesse.
 1.55. Swa he spræc to urum fæderum Abrahame &amp; hys sæde
on a woruld.
 1.56. Soþlice Maria wunude mid hyre swylce þry monþas, &amp;
gewende þa to hyre huse.
 1.57. Ða wæs gefylled Elizabethe cenningtid, &amp; heo sunu
cende.
 1.58. &amp; hyre nehcheburas &amp; hyre cuðan þæt gehyrdon
þæt drihten hys mildheortnesse mid hyre mærsude, &amp; hig mid hyre
blissodon.
 1.59. Ða on þam ehteoþan dæge hig comon þæt cild
ymsniþan, &amp; nemdon hyne hys fæder naman Zachariam.
 1.60. Ða andswarode his modor nese soþes, ac he byð Iohannes
genemned.
 1.61. Ða cwædon hig to hyre, nis nan on þinre mægðe
þyson naman genemned.
 1.62. Ða bicnodon hi to hys fæder hwæt he wolde hine
genemnedne beon.
 1.63. Þa wrat he gebedenum wexbrede, Iohannes is hys nama; ða
wundrodon hig ealle.
 1.64. Ða wearð sona hys muð &amp; hys tunge geopenod &amp; he
spræc Drihten bletsiende.
